āptānām mānanīyānām ādeśam anupālayan

original: pramāṇanirūpaṇapradhānaṃ prakaraṇamārabhamāṇaḥ prathamamāripsitasya prakaraṇasyābhidheyaprayojanaṃ darśayannavatārayati prakaraṇam -- ihetyādinā pramāṇaṃ nirṇetavyamityantena |
analyzed: pramāṇa nirūpaṇa pradhānam prakaraṇam ārabhamāṇaḥ prathamam āripsitasya prakaraṇasya abhidheya prayojanam darśayan avatārayati prakaraṇam iha ityādinā pramāṇam nirṇetavyam ityantena

original: svarūpato lakṣaṇataḥ phalaśca pramāṇanirṇayaḥ prakaraṇasyāsya sākṣātprayojanamiti gamyate |
analyzed: svarūpataḥ lakṣaṇataḥ phalaḥ ca pramāṇa nirṇayaḥ prakaraṇasya asya sākṣāt prayojanam iti gamyate
prakaraṇasya asya abhidheyam ca pramāṇam iti artha siddham
yadi api nibandha avasāne vaibhāṣika ādi mata bheda catuṣṭayam diś mātreṇa jñāpyate
atha api prādhānyam pramāṇasya

original: pramāṇapathaṃ nirṇīya pravarttamānānāṃ puruṣārthasiddhiriti paramaṃ prayojanaṃ 'sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusaradbhi' rityanena
analyzed: pramāṇa patham nirṇīya pravarttamānānām puruṣa artha siddhiḥ iti paramam prayojanam sarva puruṣa artha siddhi nimittam pramāṇam anusaradbhiḥ iti anena
ye yatante na te sarva iryam anu
artha vidhure pi mandānām ārambhaḥ hi dṛśyate
arthinaḥ api na sarve pramāṇam anusaranti
paśūnām iva pāmarāṇām bahūnām avicārita pramāṇa svarūpāṇām api arthāya pravṛttā dṛṣṭā

original: prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo'pi ye punaraptakāmā akāmā vā na teṣāṃ pramāṇāpekṣā |
analyzed: prekṣā pūrva kāriṇaḥ api ye punar apta kāmāḥ akāmāḥ vā na teṣām pramāṇa apekṣā

original: ye tu prekṣāparāyaṇā arthinaste puruṣārthasiddhaye pramāṇamanusareyureva |
analyzed: ye tu prekṣā parāyaṇāḥ arthinaḥ te puruṣa artha siddhaye pramāṇam anusareyuḥ eva
tat idam abhipretya āha prekṣā parāyana arthibhiḥ iti
prekṣāvatām nibandhe pravṛti aṅgam abhidheya prayojanam iti vyaktīkṛtam bhavati
yadi api puruṣa artha siddhaye prekṣāvadbhiḥ prameya svarūpam api nirṇetavyam

original: athāpi prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇādhīneti prameyanirṇayataḥ prāk pramāṇasvarūpaṃ nirṇetavyam,
analyzed: atha api prameya siddhiḥ pramāṇa adhīnā iti prameya nirṇayataḥ prāk pramāṇa svarūpam nirṇetavyam
idam abhipretya ucyate ādau iti

original: etena prameyasvarūpanirūpaṇaparānnibandhāt pramāṇasvarūpanirūpaṇaparasyāsya nibandhasya prādhānyaṃ gamyate |
analyzed: etena prameya svarūpa nirūpaṇa parāt nibandhāt pramāṇa svarūpa nirūpaṇa parasya asya nibandhasya prādhānyam gamyate
atha pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam āha pramāṇam samyak jñānam apūrva gocaram iti
pramāṇam iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ
samyak jñānam apūrva gocaram iti lakṣaṇa nirdeśaḥ
jñāne samyaktvam niravakti avisaṃvādakam iti
samyaktva viśeṣaṇasya prayojanam nirūpayan āha saṃśaya iti
saṃśaya viparyayau yadi api apūrva gocarau
atha api avisaṃvādaka tvam na asti iti na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: saṃśayaviparyayayoravisaṃvādakatā nāstītyetadupapādayannavisaṃvādakatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe -- gocare tu tatsthāne ghaṭādau satīti |
analyzed: saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ avisaṃvādaka tā na asti iti etat upapādayan avisaṃvādaka tvam vyācaṣṭe gocare tu tad sthāne ghaṭa ādau sati iti
pradarśitam arthe prāpayat jñānam avisaṃvādakam iti yāvat

original: jalādipratyakṣaṃ jalāya pravarttayat puruṣaṃ jalaṃ prāpayati |
analyzed: jala ādi pratyakṣam jalāya pravarttayat puruṣam jalam prāpayati

original: marīcikājalaṃbhramastu jalāya pravarttayat puruṣaṃ jalaṃ na prāpayati |
analyzed: marīcikā jalaṃbhramaḥ tu jalāya pravarttayat puruṣam jalam na prāpayati
atas na aprasaṅga atiprasaṅgau
prāpaṇa yogya tvam iti yogya tva niveśāt na avyāpti śaṅkā avakāśaḥ iti etad śaṅkā parihāra mukhena nirūpayati nanu ityādinā
kadācid asati lipsā ādau
prāpayat janayat vā prāpayet
pravartayat vā
yathā vidyā vivekam janayantī prāpayati

original: devadatto yajñadattaṃ karmasu pravarttayan dhanaṃ prāpayati |
analyzed: devadattaḥ yajñadattam karmasu pravarttayan dhanam prāpayati
tatra sataḥ ca ārya na samyak jñānena jananam
na api pravarttayat prāpayati aṃartham sarvam eva jñānam
avadhṛte pi arthe pravṛtti darśanāt
tat artha prāpti ādhāyaka tva rūpam avisaṃvādi tvam avyāptam iti bhāvaḥ
pariharati na ti
ayam bhāvaḥ avisaṃvādaka tvam na artha prāpti ādhāyaka tvam
api tu artha prāpaṇa yogya tvam eva
tat ca pravarttana śakta tā lakṣaṇam
sā ca artha nirṇaya ādhānam eva

original: yena nirṇayena pravṛttaḥ puruṣo'sati pratibandhe pradarśitamarthaṃ prāpnuyādeveti |
analyzed: yena nirṇayena pravṛttaḥ puruṣaḥ usati pratibandhe pradarśitam artham prāpnuyāt eva iti
āha ca dharmottara ācāryaḥ

original: na hi puruṣa iva haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam ' iti,
analyzed: na hi puruṣaḥ iva haṭhāt pravartayitum śaknoti vijñānam iti

original: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ -- avisaṃvāditvaṃ cārthakriyāsamarthāryaprāpaṇaśaktikatvaṃ na tvaryaprāpaṇameva' iti ( tattvasaṃgrahapañjikā pa. 312).
analyzed: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ avisaṃvādi tvam ca arthakriyā samartha ārya prāpaṇa śaktika tvam na tu arya prāpaṇam eva iti tattvasaṃgrahapañjikā
pramāṇa kāryam artha paricchitti viśeṣam nirūpayan tad ādhāna mātreṇa eva pramāṇasya arthakriyā samartha vastu prāpaṇa yogya tā sampattim upapādayati api tu evaṃbhūte smin ityādinā
evam sphuṭam avabhāsamāne ismin nirbhāsyamānaḥ ākāraḥ na anyasmin iti avadhāraṇam kāryam
idam eva avadhāraṇam pramāṇa kāryam iti bhavaḥ

original: āha ca kamalaśīlastatvasaṃgrahapañcikāyām ' pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamapi sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttamanalādikamarthaṃ tadākāranirbhāsotpattitaḥ paricchindadutpadyate tacca niyatarūpavastugrāhitvādvijātīyavyāvṛttavastvākārānugatattvācca tatraiva vastuni vidhipratiṣedhāvāvirbhāvayati ' analo'yaṃ nāsau kusumastabakādiriti' iti ( tattva. pa. pa. 390)
analyzed: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ tatvasaṃgrahapañcikāyām pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham api sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛttam anala ādikam artham tad ākāra nirbhāsa utpattitaḥ paricchindat utpadyate tat ca niyata rūpa vastu grāhi tvāt vijātīya vyāvṛtta vastu ākāra anugata ttvāt ca tatra eva vastuni vidhi pratiṣedhau āvirbhāvayati na asau kusuma stabaka ādiḥ iti iti  /

original: āha ca tatraivānupadam -- ' jñānaṃ hi viṣayākāramutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindadiva savyāpāramiva bhavati' ayamevārthaprāpaṇavyāpāro jñānasyeti
analyzed: āha ca tatra eva anupadam jñānam hi viṣaya ākāram utpadyamānam viṣayam paricchindat iva sa vyāpāram iva bhavati ayam eva artha prāpaṇa vyāpāraḥ jñānasya iti
ta tva sam pañci pa
idam ca āha uttaratra arthakriyā arthinaḥ abhimatam artham prāpayat pramāṇam ucyate

original: na cārthadeśaṃ puruṣamupasarpayadarthaṃ vā puruṣadeśamānayat prāpakaṃ bhavati,

api tu puruṣam pravarttayat

original: taṃ ca puruṣaṃ na hastena gṛhītvā pravarttayati, kiṃ tarhi ?

pravṛtti viṣayam upadarśayat

original: kvacitpravṛttyabhāvaḥ kvacitpravṛttāvapyarthālābhaḥ svasvasāmagryabhāvaprayukta iti pramāṇasya prāmāṇyamakṣatamevetyetadupapādayati -- puruṣastviti
analyzed: kvacid pravṛtti abhāvaḥ kvacid pravṛttau api artha alābhaḥ sva sva sāmagrī abhāva prayuktaḥ iti pramāṇasya prāmāṇyam akṣatam eva iti etat upapādayati puruṣaḥ tu iti
nirṇīte prayojana tva buddhiḥ pravṛttau kāraṇam

original: pravṛttāvapi tadalābhaḥ pratibandhāditi phalaphalibhāve bhedādalābhādapravṛttervā pramāṇasya prāmāṇyaṃ na pratirudhyata iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: pravṛttau api tad alābhaḥ pratibandhāt iti phala phali bhāve bhedāt alābhāt apravṛtteḥ vā pramāṇasya prāmāṇyam na pratirudhyate iti bhāvaḥ
idam eva abhipretya āha tadā jñānasya kim āyātam iti
āha ca śāntarakṣitaḥ
viṣaya adhigatiḥ ca atra pramāṇa phalam iṣyate iti
śaṅkate nanu idam iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ-purataḥ sannihitamavalokayataḥ sapadi bhavati pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanārahitaṃ nirvikalpakamanirdhāraṇātmakam,
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ puratas sannihitam avalokayataḥ sapadi bhavati pratyakṣam nāma jāti ādi kalpanā rahitam nirvikalpakam anirdhāraṇa ātmakam
idam idam eva iti niścayaḥ tu sa vikalpakaḥ pratyayaḥ

original: tat jātamātre pratyekṣe yatprāmāṇyasmavisaṃvādakatvamarthaprāpaṇayogyatvaṃ tadarthakriyāprāptimantareṇa na vijñāyate,
analyzed: tat jāta mātre pratyekṣe yat prāmāṇya sma visaṃvādaka tvam artha prāpaṇa yogya tvam tat artha kriyā prāptim antareṇa na vijñāyate
atha katham ucyate samyak jñānam iti
avagate hi samyaktave pravṛttiḥ bhavet iti
pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ iti
ayam āśayaḥ eṣaḥ jāta mātre pratyakṣe artha prāpaṇa yogya tva anavagamaḥ
doṣaḥ na
na hi tasya tāvatā naisargikam arthakriyā prāpaṇa yogya tvam apaiti
pravṛttiḥ tu artha prāpti saṃbhāvanayā bhavet eva

original: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ-yo mandabuddhiḥ jātamātre jalapratyakṣe na tasya prāmāṇyamavadhārayituṃ śaknoti;
analyzed: iyān tu viśeṣaḥ yaḥ manda buddhiḥ jāta mātre jala pratyakṣe na tasya prāmāṇyam avadhārayitum śaknoti
snāna pāna ādi kriyām dūrāt pareṣām paśyan avadhārayati jalam iti
bhavati ca artha prāpaṇa yogya tva grahaḥ

original: amandabuddhistu prakāśavaśadyena idamidameveti sapadyavadhārayati avadharayati ca sapadi prāmāṇyamiti |
analyzed: amanda buddhiḥ tu prakāśa vaśadyena idam idam eva iti sapadi avadhārayati avadharayati ca sapadi prāmāṇyam iti
śaṅkate nanu yadi api iti
ayam āśayaḥ yadi api cākṣuṣam pratyakṣam sva gocaram artham arthakriyā samartham prāpayati iti arthakriyā prāpaṇa lakṣaṇam avisaṃvādi tvam tasya asti

original: śrāvaṇe tu pratyakṣe na tad ghaṭate,
analyzed: śrāvaṇe tu pratyakṣe na tat ghaṭate
śrotreṇa avabhāsyate śabdaḥ kevalam

original: yadā kaścit kasmaicit kimapyupadiśati tadā tadvacanamavadhāryate kevalam,
analyzed: yadā kaścid kasmaicid kim api upadiśati tadā tad vacanam avadhāryate kevalam
cakṣuṣā prakāśite iva arthe na arthakriyā sthitiḥ kā api iti
pariharati na iti
ayam abhiprāyaḥ artha svabhāva nirdhāraṇam eva avisaṃvādi tvam sā eva kvacid arthakriyā sthitiḥ
candra sūrya megha citra ādīn avalokayataḥ bhavati candra ādi avabhāsaḥ

original: na tatra jalādiṣu dṛṣṭeṣu snānapānādikriyeva kā'pyarthakriyāsthitiḥ,
analyzed: na tatra jala ādiṣu dṛṣṭeṣu snāna pāna ādi kriyā iva kā api arthakriyā sthitiḥ
jñeya sva rūpa vidyā eva tatra iṣṭa kriyā sthitā
tathā eva śabda ākarṇana mātreṇa bhavati avabhāsya artha avadhāraṇam

original: tat cākṣuṣajñānasyeva śrāvaṇajñānasyāpi avabhāsyārthāvadhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ samānameveti |
analyzed: tat cākṣuṣa jñānasya iva śrāvaṇa jñānasya api avabhāsya artha avadhāraṇa lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam samānam eva iti

original: 'jñānānaṃ prāmāṇyāṃ svata eva gṛhyate' iti mīmāṃsakamataṃ nirasyannāha-ata eveti |
analyzed: prāmāṇyām svatas eva gṛhyate iti mīmāṃsaka matam nirasyan āha atas eva iti
yatas manda buddheḥ jāta mātre pratyakṣe anirdhārita viśeṣasya arthakriyā siddhi anantaram prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam

original: amandabuddhestu jātamātre pratyakṣe nirdhāritaviśeṣasya prathamata eva prāmāṇyagrahaḥ,
analyzed: amanda buddheḥ tu jāta mātre pratyakṣe nirdhārita viśeṣasya prathamatas eva prāmāṇya grahaḥ
atas eva iti arthaḥ
pratyakṣasya iti
kasyacid tu iti
manda buddheḥ iti yāvat
paratas arthakriyā ādinā liṅgena iti arthaḥ
yogi jñānasya iti

original: yogabalājjāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ hi viśadāvabhāsarūpameveti tasya prāmāṇyaṃ svata eva gṛhyate |
analyzed: yoga balāt jāyamānam pratyakṣam hi viśada avabhāsa rūpam eva iti tasya prāmāṇyam svatas eva gṛhyate
sva saṃvedya jñānasya ca iti
sukha ādi pratyakṣasya iti yāvat

original: na hi sukhe sākṣātkriyamāṇe tasmin saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: na hi sukhe sākṣātkriyamāṇe tasmin saṃśayaḥ
anumānasya tu niścaya ātmaka tvāt iti
nirdhārita viśeṣa tvāt iti yāvat

original: etena jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ svata eva gamyatta iti niyamo nāsmākamityuktaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: etena jñānasya prāmāṇyam svatas eva gamyate iti niyamaḥ na asmākam iti uktam bhavati
uktam ca śāntarakṣitena
yena ekaiḥ svatas evā iti prācyaiḥ niyamaḥ ucyate
kiñcid svatas nyatas kiñcid paraiḥ ca aniyamaḥ mataḥ iti
vyākhyātam ca kamalaśīlena ekaiḥ mīmāṃsakaiḥ
paraiḥ bauddhaiḥ

original: taiḥ kiñcit svataḥ pramāṇamiṣṭam yathā-svasaṃvedanaṃ yogijñānam arthakriyājñānam anumānam abhyāsavacca pratyakṣam |
analyzed: taiḥ kiñcid svatas pramāṇam iṣṭam yathā sva saṃvedanam yogi jñānam artha kriyā jñānam anumānam abhyāsavat ca pratyakṣam
tat hi svatas eva niścīte
abhyāsa balena apahastita bhrānti kāraṇa tvāt
kiñcid anyatas vivāda āspadībhūtam codanā janitam jñānam
pratyakṣam ca anapagata bhrānti nimittam iti
tattvasam pa
pramāṇa lakṣaṇe apūrva gocara tva niveśasya phalam āha prathamatas eva ityādinā
ayam āśayaḥ pramāṇasya hi prayojanam prekṣāvatām arthakriyāsu pravarttanam
pravarttaka tā ca artha pradarśaka tayā

original: arthapradarśakatā ca yadyapi prathamotpannajñānasyeva dhārāvāhini dvitīyādijñāne'pyaviśiṣṭā,
analyzed: artha pradarśaka tā ca yadi api prathama utpanna jñānasya iva dhārā vāhini dvitīya ādi jñāne pi aviśiṣṭā
atha api prathama utpanna jñānena eva arthaḥ paricchinnaḥ

original: ato dvitīyādijñānamanapekṣyaiva tata evaṃ pravarttate puruṣa iti dvitīyādijñānamanyathāsiddhaṃ pravṛttāvanaṅgamiti na tasya prāmāṇyam |
analyzed: atas dvitīya ādi jñānam an apekṣya eva tatas evam pravarttate puruṣaḥ iti dvitīya ādi jñānam anyathā asiddham pravṛttau anaṅgam iti na tasya prāmāṇyam
pramāṇa lakṣaṇe viśeṣaṇam iti
uktam ca dharmottara ācāryeṇa atas eva anadhigata viṣayam pramāṇam

original: yenaiva hi jñānena prathamamadhigato'rthastenaiva pravarttitaḥ puruṣaḥ,
analyzed: yena eva hi jñānena prathamam adhigataḥ ṛthaḥ tena eva pravarttitaḥ puruṣaḥ
prāpitaḥ ca arthaḥ
tatra eva arthe kim anyena jñānena adhikam kāryam iti

original: (nyā. bi. pa.4) vyākhyātaṃ caitadanyatrāsmābhiḥ-arthakriyāsu pravarttamānā anavagatatattatsamarthārthāstadarthāvagataye tadarthāvabhāsakaṃ pramāṇaṃ
analyzed: vyākhyātam ca etat anyatra asmābhiḥ arthakriyāsu pravarttamānāḥ anavagata tad tad samartha arthāḥ tad artha avagataye tad artha avabhāsakam pramāṇam
na tu adhigata arthāḥ
a kiñcitkaram hi teṣām tat

original: atha yattathāvidhamarthamavabhāsathadapanīya tadajñānamupakaroti tasmai puṃse tat taṃ pramātāramapekṣya tasminnarthe pramāṇam yattu na kiñcidapyupakaroti na tadarthāvabhāsakamapi pramāṇavyavahārapadamadhigacchati |
analyzed: atha yat tathāvidham artham avabhāsathat apanīya tat ajñānam upakaroti tasmai puṃse tat tam pramātāram apekṣya tasmin arthe pramāṇam yat tu na kiñcid api upakaroti na tad artha avabhāsakam api pramāṇa vyavahāra padam adhigacchati
idam eva tu pramāṇataḥ saṃpādyam phalam artha anavagati vidhūnanam

original: pramāṇādarthāvadhāraṇāt pūrvaṃ yā tadarthānavagatirajñānalakṣaṇā sā hi vināśyate prathamena pramāṇena tadarthāvadhāraṇalakṣaṇena |
analyzed: pramāṇāt artha avadhāraṇāt pūrvam yā tad artha anavagatiḥ ajñāna lakṣaṇā sā hi vināśyate prathamena pramāṇena tad artha avadhāraṇa lakṣaṇena
adhigata artha avabhā sakaḥ tu na tad phalam āpādyate
ajñānasya eva abhāvāt
tat akiñcitkara tayā apramāṇam ucyate iti
nanu sākṣātkāraḥ pramā
tad karaṇam indriyam tu pramāṇam

original: tatsādhāraṇaṃ tu pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyannāha-samyak jñānaṃ pramāṇamityukta iti |
analyzed: tad sādhāraṇam tu pramāṇa lakṣaṇam vaktavyam iti āśaṅkām nirasyan āha samyak jñānam pramāṇam iti uktaḥ iti
jaḍasya indriyasya prāmāṇyam eva anupapannam

artha paricchedaḥ ca jñānasya eva svabhāvaḥ
cakṣuḥ saṃyujyate kevalam arthena saha ālokaḥ iva
artha paricchedaḥ tu jñānena eva

original: atastasya pramāṇakoṭāvanantarbhāvānna tatsādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kāryamiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: atas tasya pramāṇakoṭau anantarbhāvān na tat sādhāraṇam lakṣaṇam kāryam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanvevaṃ sati sākṣātkāra eva pramāṇamityuktaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: nanu evam sati sākṣātkāraḥ eva pramāṇam iti uktam bhavati

original: idaṃ pramākaraṇaṃ yatpramāṇamucyate ityayaṃ phalaphalivibhāgo nopapadyeteti ced anupadaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇanirūpaṇāvasare vakṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: idam pramā karaṇam yat pramāṇam ucyate iti ayam phala phali vibhāgaḥ na upapadyeta iti ced anupadam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa nirūpaṇa avasare vakṣyāmaḥ
etena pramāṇa svarupe vipratipattiḥ nirastā
atha saṃkhyāyām vipratipattim nirasyan āha tat dvividham iti
pratyakṣa śabdasya vyutpattim āha pratigatam iti
pratigatam iti etat vyācaṣṭe āśritam iti

tādātmya tad utpattibhyām na aparaḥ vastunaḥ

original: nanu rūpadijñāne akṣāṇāmivārthānāmapi hetutvamastīti arthāśritatvamabhipretya pratyarthamiti kutona vyapadeśaḥ |

original: akṣeṇa tvasādhāraṇaḥ irti pratyakṣaśabdenaiva vyapadeśo yujyate |

original: asādhāraṇācca vyavahāro dṛśyate yathā yavaśabdo yavāṅkure' iti |

original: ayaṃ bhavaḥ- akṣāśritatvaṃ pratyakṣaśabdasya vyutpattau nimittaṃ na tu pravṛttinimittaṃ,

original: tena ca vyutpattinimittena ekārthasamavetaṃ pravṛttinimittaṃ sākṣātkāritvamupalakṣyate |

original: ataḥ saṃyogo nāma tābhyāmanyo vaiśiṣṭyapratītiniyāmakaḥ svīkāryaḥ,
analyzed: atas saṃyogaḥ nāma tābhyām anyaḥ vaiśiṣṭya pratīti niyāmakaḥ svīkāryaḥ
tathā eva gavaya śabda piṇḍa viśeṣayoḥ satoḥ api na samākhyā pratipattiḥ
yam samākhyā sambandham āpta atideśa vākya artha jñāna piṇḍa viśeṣa darśana samantaram pratipadyate iti
pratikṣipati tat na yuktam iti
sambaddha vastu dvayāt api iti
sambandha ākhya vastu antara nirapekṣāt vastu dvayāt eva iti arthaḥ

original: ayamāśayaḥ- sarveṣāmeva satāṃ kṣaṇikatvena saṃyuktapratītigocararyoviśliṣtapratītigocarābhyāṃ bhinnatvena tayoreva ca sambaddhapratyayahetutvena tābhyamatiriktasya sambaddasyānapekṣaṇād viśiṣṭabuddhiḥ sambandhamatiriktaṃ kalpayituṃ na prabhavatīti |
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ sarveṣām eva satām kṣaṇika tvena saṃyukta pratīti gocara ṛyaḥ viśliṣta pratīti gocarābhyām bhinna tvena tayoḥ eva ca sambaddha pratyaya hetu tvena tābhyam atiriktasya anapekṣaṇāt viśiṣṭa buddhiḥ sambandham atiriktam kalpayitum na prabhavati iti

original: idamatra bodhyam -- yo gosadṛśaḥ sa gavaya iti tu śvāvaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ |
analyzed: idam atra bodhyam yaḥ go sadṛśaḥ sa gavayaḥ iti tu śvāvaṇam pratyakṣam
tat tu śabda viśeṣa prakāśaka tayā śabda mātre pramāṇam

original: pīṇḍaviśeṣadarśanaṃ tu tadanantarabhāvi piṇḍaviśeṣaprakāśakatayā tanmātre pramāṇam |
analyzed: pīṇḍa viśeṣa darśanam tu tad anantara bhāvi piṇḍa viśeṣa prakāśaka tayā tanmātre pramāṇam

tat smṛti rūpa tayā gṛhīta grahīta tayā na pramāṇam

original: dṛṣṭe piṇḍaviśeṣe tataḥ paścād yaśca samākhyāsambandhagrahaḥ so'pi gavayasāmānye bauddha eva vastunīti smṛtito na bahirbhavati |

original: api ca samākhyāsambandhagrahopāyāścānye'pi santi yathā--kaṃ pika iti pṛṣṭe kaścidāha,

original: svayameva pramāṇāntarasiddhayoḥ sādṛśyapiṇḍayorviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvamātrasyopamānapramāṇaviṣayatāṃ bruvan sādṛśyaṃ kena pramāṇena siddhyatīti puṣṭe anenaivopamānapramāṇeneti kathaṃ bruyāt,

original: idamatra bodhyam-gosadṛśe gavaye dṛṣṭe anubhūtapūrve gavi etatsadṛśo gauritivat etadvisadṛśasturaga iti bhavatyanubhūtapūrve turage,

original: tadasyā vaisādṛśyapratīterapi pramānāntaratā kiṃ na syāt |

original: evaṃ taruśreṇyāṃ dṛśyamānāyāṃ prathamatarudarśane'nadhigatamādyatvaṃ dvitīyatarudarśanāntaraṃ dṛṣṭapūrve tarāvādyatvamadhigamyate 'sa tarurādya' iti |

anantaraḥ avyavahitaḥ avyavahita pūrvaḥ

original: uttaravijñāne hetubhūtasyaikasantānavartino jñānasya samanantara pratyaya ityeṣā saṃjñā |
analyzed: uttara vijñāne hetu bhūtasya eka santāna vartinaḥ jñānasya samanantara pratyayaḥ iti eṣā saṃjñā
vakṣyati ca sva santāna vartini upādāne jñāne rūḍhyā aprasiddhe iti

original: uparate cakṣurvyāpāre anukṣaṇaṃ yadvijñānaṃ tena cakṣurvijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakṛtenotpādyate,
analyzed: uparate cakṣuḥ vyāpāre anukṣaṇam yat vijñānam tena cakṣuḥ vijñānena sva viṣaya anantara viṣaya sahakṛtena utpādyate
tat mānasa pratyakṣam iti paryavasitam iti
avyavahāri tvam punar asya iti

original: asyoktalakṣaṇalakṣitasya mānasapratyakṣasya vyahārapathāgocaratvamityeṣa doṣo na bhavati |
analyzed: asya ukta lakṣaṇa lakṣitasya mānasa pratyakṣasya vyahāra patha agocara tvam iti eṣa doṣaḥ na bhavati
na hi atiprasaṅga uprasaṅgaḥ vā lakṣaṇasya
satyām sāmagryām vyavahāra patha gocara tā
asatyām ca na
tāvatā asya kovaguṇaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
vyavahāra agocaram vyavahāra anaṅga bhūtam kim iti iṣyate īti āśaṅkāyām āha āgama prasiddham iti
āgamaḥ eva tad sadbhāve pramānam iti yāvat
āgamam eva darśayati yathā uktam iti

original: nanu āgame vyavāhāre sarvathānupayuktasyāsyābhyupagamo nirarthaka ityāśayenāśaṅkate--nanviti |
analyzed: nanu āgame vyavāhāre sarvathā anupayuktasya asya abhyupagamaḥ nirarthakaḥ iti āśayena āśaṅkate nanu iti
pariharati īdṛś lakṣaṇā iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ -- nahi lokavyavahāre'nupayuktatāmātreṇa vastu apahnotuṃ śakyate |
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ nahi vastu apahnotum śakyate
asti ca idam pratyakṣam
vastu vivecanīyam tu lakṣaṇena

original: uktena ca lakṣaṇena tat pratyakṣaṃ vivecitaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: uktena ca lakṣaṇena tat pratyakṣam vivecitam bhavati

original: tadanena vivecanena āgame pareṣāmaviśuddhyāśaṅkāpi nirastā bhavatīti |
analyzed: tat anena vivecanena āgame pareṣām aviśuddhi āśaṅkā api nirastā bhavati iti
āha ca dharmottara ācāryaḥ etat ca siddhānta siddham mānasa pratyakṣam
na ca asya prasādhakam pramāṇam asti

original: evaṃjātīyakaṃ yadi syāt na kaścit doṣaḥ syāditi vaktuṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātamasyetī'ti |
analyzed: evaṃjātīyakam yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syāt iti vaktum lakṣaṇam ākhyātam asya iti iti
nyāyabi ṭīkā
atha sva saṃvedana pratyakṣam nirūpayati sarva citta caittānām ityādinā
yat citta caittānām ātma saṃvedanam bhavati tat eva sva saṃvedanam ucyate iti arthaḥ
tat etat vyācaṣṭe cittam ityādinā
vastu mātra grāhi iti nīla ādi bāhya vastu mātra grāhi pratyakṣam iti arthaḥ
citte bhavāḥ caittāḥ na ete bāhyāḥ

original: anya eva nīlādibhyo bāhyebhyaḥ sātādaya ābhyantarāḥ,
analyzed: anye eva nīla ādibhyaḥ bāhyebhyaḥ sāta ādayaḥ ābhyantarāḥ

original: dṛśyamānasya nīlādervastuno viśeṣāvasthāgrāhakā jñānaprabhedāḥ sukhaduḥkhopekṣālakṣaṇā nīlādivastuṣu sākṣātkriyamāṇeṣu jāyante,
analyzed: dṛśyamānasya nīla ādeḥ vastunaḥ viśeṣa avasthā grāhakāḥ jñāna prabhedāḥ sukha duḥkha upekṣā lakṣaṇāḥ nīla ādi vastuṣu sākṣātkriyamāṇeṣu jāyante

original: tānyetāni yena rūpeṇa saṃvedyante tat svasaṃvedanapratyakṣamucyate |
analyzed: tāni etāni yena rūpeṇa saṃvedyante tat sva saṃvedana pratyakṣam ucyate
hi kalpanā apoḍham abhra antam ca

original: idamabhihitaṃ bhavati--nīlādibāhyavastusākṣātkārasamaye sa sākṣātkāro nānavabhāsamānastiṣṭhati nīlādivat,
analyzed: idam abhihitam bhavati nīla ādi bāhya vastu sākṣātkāra samaye sa sākṣātkāraḥ na anavabhāsamānaḥ tiṣṭhati nīla ādi vat
tathā sāta ādikam api

original: tadeṣāmavabhāsaḥ svenaivotpanna iti svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣamucyate iti |
analyzed: tat eṣām avabhāsaḥ svena eva utpannaḥ iti sva saṃvedanam pratyakṣam ucyate iti
āha ca ācārya diṅnāgaḥ
cittam api artha rāga ādi sva saṃvid nirvikalpakam iti
vṛttiḥ ca cittam api rūpa ādīn upalabdhvā yat anubhava ākāreṇa vartate
tat nirvikalpakam eva

original: icchākrodhamohasukhaduḥkhādikaṃ hi indriyamanapekṣya bhavatīti svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣamiti |
analyzed: icchā krodha moha sukha duḥkha ādikam hi indriyam an apekṣya bhavati iti sva saṃvedanam pratyakṣam iti
pramāṇa samuccaya

original: nanu svasaṃvedanamityanena svenaiva svayaṃ saṃvedyata ityuktaṃ bhavati nacaikasyāmeva kriyāyāmekasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ copapadyate ityāśayena śaṅkate -- atra kecidāhuriti |
analyzed: nanu sva saṃvedanam iti anena svena eva svayam saṃvedyate iti uktam bhavati na ca ekasyām eva kriyāyām ekasya eva kartṛ tvam karma tvam ca upapadyate iti āśayena śaṅkate atra kecid āhuḥ iti
na avayava artha yogena ayam śabdaḥ utra pravartate
kintu prakāśaka antara nirapekṣa prakāśa svabhāva tām abhipretya sva saṃvedanam iti ucyate iti āśayena samādhatte atra ucyate ityādinā
vyavasthāpya vyavasthāpaka bhāvena iti

original: sarvameva vastu hetubalādutpadyamānaṃ bhinnabhinnasvabhāvamutpadyate iti vastūnāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣe vyavasthāpakastattaddhetureva,
analyzed: sarvam eva vastu hetu balāt utpadyamānam bhinna bhinna svabhāvam utpadyate iti vastūnām svabhāva viśeṣe vyavasthāpakaḥ tad tad hetuḥ eva
tasmāt vastu svabhāva vyavasthāpakaḥ hetu viśeṣaḥ
tad vyavasthāpyaḥ ca vastu svabhāva viśeṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
prakāśaka antara nirapekṣa prakāśa svabhāva tām upapādayati yathā ityādinā
naiyāyika abhimatām jñānasya jaḍa rūpa tām pratikṣipati na ca ityādinā

original: jñānasya jñānāntara prakāśyatve kiṃ samakālavartinā jñānāntareṇa prakāśyate uta bhinnakālavartineti vikalpya kramād dūṣayati--na tāvaditi |
analyzed: jñānasya jñāna antara prakāśya tve kim sama kāla vartinā jñāna antareṇa prakāśyate uta bhinna kāla vartinā iti vikalpya kramāt dūṣayati na tāvat iti
prakāśya prakāśaka bhāvaḥ hi upakārya upakāraka bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ
sa ca sama kāla bhāvinoḥ na ghaṭate

original: na hi vāmadakṣiṇaviṣāṇayormitha upakāryopakārakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: na hi vāma dakṣiṇa viṣāṇayoḥ mithas upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
na api iti

original: jñānaṃ svānantarotpannena jñānāntareṇa ahamidaṃ jānāmītyanuvyavasāyātmakenāvabhāsyate ityetannopapadyate |
analyzed: jñānam sva anantara utpannena jñāna antareṇa aham idam jānāmi iti anuvyavasāya ātmakena avabhāsyate iti etat na upapadyate

original: vastumātrasya kṣaṇikatvena dvitīyakṣaṇe tasya vināśāt kva prakāśāvasaraḥ,
analyzed: vastu mātrasya kṣaṇika tvena dvitīya kṣaṇe tasya vināśāt kva prakāśa avasaraḥ
atas jñāna mātram aprakāśa ātmakam syāt
kāṇādāḥ hi jñānasya kṣaṇa dvaya avasthāyi tvam abhyupagacchantaḥ anuvyavasāya gocara tvam upapādayanti
vastu mātrasya kṣaṇa bhaṅga samarthanena na tad vādasya avakāśaḥ
parokṣam yadi tat jñānam iti

original: kṣaṇikasyāsya jñānasya jñānāntarasaṃvedyatvāsaṃbhavāt svasaṃvedyatvasya cānabhyupagame ghaṭādivat parokṣatvāt ghaṭādibāhyārthasadharmatayā jñānamiti ko'yamarthavilakṣaṇo vyapadeśaḥ |
analyzed: kṣaṇikasya asya jñānasya jñāna antara saṃvedya tva asaṃbhavāt sva saṃvedya tvasya ca anabhyupagame ghaṭa ādi vat parokṣa tvāt ghaṭa ādi bāhya artha sadharmatayā jñānam iti kaḥ yam artha vilakṣaṇaḥ vyapadeśaḥ

original: parokṣasyāsya prakāśakaṃ na kimapīti tatsvarūpaṃ kena vā lakṣyetetyarthaḥ |
analyzed: parokṣasya asya prakāśakam na kim api iti tad svarūpam kena vā lakṣyeta iti arthaḥ
jñānasya sva saṃvedya tva anabhyupagamena iṣṭam prasañjayati api ca ityādinā
na a gṛhītā iti
viśiṣṭa jñāne viśeṣaṇa jñānasya hetu tvāt iti yāvat
nanu bhavati cākṣuṣam rūpam iti jñānam
cakṣuḥ ca a pratyakṣam
a gṛhītam api tat cakṣuḥ vijñāyate rūpasya viśeṣaṇa tayā
tat na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśiṣṭa buddhiḥ iti na ayam niyamaḥ

original: tasmādasaṃviditasyāpi jñānasya jñāto'rtha ityarthaviśeṣaṇatayā'vabhāso yujyata ityāśayena śaṅkate -- yaccoktamiti |
analyzed: tasmāt asaṃviditasya api jñānasya jñātaḥ ṛthaḥ iti artha viśeṣaṇa tayā avabhāsaḥ yujyate iti āśayena śaṅkate yat ca uktam iti
cākṣuṣam rūpam iti vijñāne na cakṣuḥ viśeṣaṇa tayā avabhāsate
api tu cakṣuḥ vijñānam

original: idaṃ ca vijñānasya svasaṃvedyatvamantarā nopapadyate iti naḥ pakṣa eva siddhyatītyāśayena pratividhatte -- tadasādhviti |
analyzed: idam ca vijñānasya sva saṃvedya tvam antarā na upapadyate iti naḥ pakṣaḥ eva siddhi atītya āśayena pratividhatte tat asādhu iti
jñānasya sva saṃvedya tvam na karma kartṛ bhāvena
kintu vyavasthāpya vyavasthāpaka bhāvena iti etat upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
āpta vacanam sva ukta arthe saṃvādayati yathā aktam iti
vijñānam jaḍa svarūpebhyaḥ nīla ādi arthebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam vilakṣaṇam ahaḍa rūpam eva prakāśa svabhāvam eva sva hetoḥ jāyate

original: asya jñānasya yeyamajaḍarūpatā saivāsya jñānasya ātmasaṃvittiḥ svasaṃvedyatetyarthaḥ |
analyzed: asya jñānasya yā iyam ajaḍa rūpa tā sā eva asya jñānasya ātma saṃvittiḥ sva saṃvedya tā iti arthaḥ
iyam ca kārikā śāntarakṣitasya tattvasaṃgraha
vyākhyātā ca kamalaśīlena na hi grāhaka bhāvena ātma saṃvedanam abhipretam
kim tarhi
svayam prakṛyā prakāśa ātma tayā nabhas tala āloka vat iti

original: nanu dīpasya paraprakāśakasya svaprakāśasvabhāvatevāstu nīlādibāhyārthaprakāśakasya jñānasya svaprakāśatā,
analyzed: nanu dīpasya para prakāśakasya sva prakāśa svabhāva tā iva astu nīla ādi bāhya artha prakāśakasya jñānasya sva prakāśa tā
artha an avabhāsakasya sukhasya sā katham
sukha ādayaḥ tu sva āśraya āśrita jñāna avabhāsyāḥ jñānataḥ bhinnāḥ
atrā ucyate rūpa ādi anubhava sama kālam eva bhavati sukha anubhavaḥ api
evam sati kena avabhāsyate sukham iti vaktavyam
nanu anena eva rūpa avabhāsena iti na vaktum śakyam
bāhya ālambanena anena ābhyantarasya sukha kyā avabhāsaḥ katham ghaṭeta

original: nanu mānasenānyena jñāneneticet jñānānāṃ kramikatvaniyamo'bhyupagato vihanyeta |
analyzed: nanu mānasena anyena jñānena iti ced jñānānām kramika tva niyamaḥ abhyupagataḥ vihanyeta
nanu nīla āvalabi vijñāna samanantaram mānasam vijñānam utpadyate
yena sukham avabhāsyate
jñānānām utpattau eva tu krama niyamaḥ
sthitiḥ tu yugapad api
bāhya rūpa anubhava sama kālam eva sukha anubhavaḥ bhavati iti api na upahatam iti na
vastu mātrasya kṣaṇika tvena tad anupapatteḥ
kiñca nīla ādi vat sukhasya jñāna antara avabhāsya tve nīla ādi vat vicchinna prabhāsi tvam āpadyeta
prapañcitam ca etat śāntarakṣitena
a vedakāḥ parasya amī sva vid bhājaḥ katham nu te
eka artha āśrita vijñāna vedyāḥ tu ete bhavanti ced
nairantarya pravṛtte hi bāhya vastu upalambhane

original: sukhādi vedyate kasmāt tasmin kāle nirantaram | (tattvasaṃ. 396)
analyzed: sukha ādi vedyate kasmāt tasmin kāle nirantaram

bhūta artha bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta jam yat jñānam tat yogi jñānam iti arthaḥ

niḥśeṣa iti

tat pratyakṣam iti

tasya paryantaḥ sphuṭa bha tva avi aja hita pūrva avasthā sphuṭa tva unmukhībhūtā

original: tāmavasthāṃ nidarśanena pradarśayati dharmottarācāryaḥ--'abhrakavya--vahitamiva yadā bhāvyamānaṃ vastu paśyati sā prakarṣaparyantajāvastheti
analyzed: tām avasthām nidarśanena pradarśayati dharmottara ācāryaḥ abhraka vyavahitam iva yadā bhāvyamānam vastu paśyati sā prakarṣa paryanta jā avasthā iti
nyāya bi ṭīkā

original: tasmāt prakarṣaparyantājjātaṃ yat jñānaṃ bhūtārthasphuṭāvabhāsātmakaṃ karatalāmalakāvabhāsavadbhavati tadidaṃ yogipratyakṣamiti yāvat |
analyzed: tasmāt prakarṣa paryantāt jātam yat jñānam bhūta artha sphuṭa avabhāsa ātmakam kara tala āmalaka avabhāsa vat bhavati tat idam yogi pratyakṣam iti yāvat
tat ca idam nivirkalpakam iti kalpanā apoḍham abhrāntam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam upapannam
tat idam abhipretya āha kalpanā apoḍham abhrāntam iti
uktam ca ācārya diṅnāgena yoginām guru nirdeśāt asaṃkīrṇa artha mātra dṛś
pramāṇa samuccaya

original: 'yathā cittaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ tathā yogināṃ jñānamapi bhavati |
analyzed: yathā cittam nirvikalpakam tathā yoginām jñānam api bhavati

original: yogaḥ samādhiḥ sa yasyāsti sa yogī |
analyzed: yogaḥ samādhiḥ sa yasya asti sa yogī
atra viṣayeṇa viṣayi nirdeśaḥ
āgamasya sa vikalpa tvam nirdeśa śabdena uktam tena asaṃkīrṇam rahitam iti arthaḥ
anena sphuṭa ābha tvam api gamyate
mātra śabdaḥ āropita vyavaccheda arthaḥ iti ṭīkāyām vyākhyātam
prasaṅgāt bhūtārthān nirūpayati bhūtārthaḥ ityādinā
ke bhūta arthāḥ
te ca katham bhāvayitavyāḥ
tat etat āha bhūtārthāḥ catur ārya satyam ityādinā pratipattavyam iti antena
catvāri ārya satyāni duḥkham samudayaḥ nirodhaḥ mārgaḥ ca iti

original: tatra duḥkhaṃ yadidaṃ bhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ ye ceme viṣayā rūpādayaḥ,
analyzed: tatra duḥkham yat idam bhūta catuṣṭayam ye ca ime viṣayāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ
yāni ca cakṣuḥ ādīni indriyāṇi
sarvam idam duḥkha pariṇati tvena ekarāśyena duḥkham iti ucyate
yena hetunā asya bhavati samudayaḥ
sa samudayaḥ ucyate

original: yaścāsya duḥkhasya nirodho nirvāṇakakṣaṇaḥ sa nirodha ucyate |
analyzed: yaḥ ca asya duḥkhasya nirodhaḥ nirvāṇa kakṣaṇaḥ sa nirodhaḥ ucyate

original: yo nirodhasya dvāraṃ samyag jñānādiḥ sa mārga ucyate |
analyzed: yaḥ nirodhasya dvāram samyak jñāna ādiḥ sa mārgaḥ ucyate
pañca skandha svabhāvam iti

original: rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandha iti pañcaskandhāḥ |
analyzed: rūpa skandhaḥ vedanā skandhaḥ saṃjñā skandhaḥ saṃskāra skandhaḥ vijñāna skandhaḥ iti pañca skandhāḥ
duḥkha samudaya nirodha mārgāṇām eteṣu anyatama tayā pañca skandha svabhāvam iti ucyate
rūpa skandha ādīnām vivekaḥ tu anyatas bodhyaḥ
nanu tat eva idam iti pratyabhijñāyamānasya sarvasya kṣaṇikatva bhāvanam katham iti atra āha yat sat tat kṣaṇikam iti anumānena iti

original: seyaṃ dīpajvāleti pratyabhijñānamivedamapi pratyabhijñānamanumānapramāṇabādhitatayā bhramarūpamiti yāvat |
analyzed: sā iyam dīpa jvālā iti pratyabhijñānam iva idam api pratyabhijñānam anumāna pramāṇa bādhita tayā bhrama rūpam iti yāvat
viṣaye vipratipattim nirasyan āhatasya ityādinā
vyācaṣṭe tat eva sva vākyam tasya caturvidhasya iti

original: lakṣaṇaṃ--lakṣyate vastu yena rūpeṇa tallakṣaṇaṃ--vastuno rūpam |
analyzed: lakṣaṇam lakṣyate vastu yena rūpeṇa tat lakṣaṇam vastunaḥ rūpam
yat asādhāraṇam rūpam tat svam ucyate
asādhāraṇam vastunaḥ tattvam sva lakṣaṇam iti uktam bhavati
tat etat āha sva lakṣaṇam iti asādhāraṇam vastu rūpam deśa kāla ākāra niyatam iti

original: yatsāmānyaṃ paraiḥ pratyakṣasya viṣaya iṣyate tattu aniyatadeśakālākāram,
analyzed: yat sāmānyam paraiḥ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ iṣyate tat tu aniyata deśa kāla ākāram
tat na pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ iti yāvat
idam eva viśadayati ghaṭa ādiḥ ityādinā
pramāṇa gocaraḥ hi dvividhaḥ
grāhyaḥ prāpaṇīyaḥ ca iti
yad ākāram jñānam utpadyate sa grāhyaḥ
yena rūpeṇa adhyavasyati sa prāpaṇīyaḥ

original: tatra pratyakṣaṃ deśakālākāraniyatena ghaṭādisvalakṣaṇākāreṇaivotpadyate iti pratyakṣasya gocaraḥ svalakṣaṇamucyate |
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣam deśa kāla ākāra niyatena ghaṭa ādi sva lakṣaṇa ākāreṇa eva utpadyate iti pratyakṣasya gocaraḥ sva lakṣaṇam ucyate
tad santāna vartī anyaḥ ghaṭa kṣaṇā udhyavasyate pratyakṣa samanantara bhāvinā adhyavasāyena
anitya tva ādi aneka dharma udāsīnaḥ iti
anitya tva ādibhiḥ dharbhaiḥ aviśeṣitaḥ iti yāvat
etena iti sva lakṣaṇasya eva pratyakṣa viṣaya tva upapādanena iti arthaḥ

original: dravyādiṣu ṣat su dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma ceti trayāṇāṃ sattājātiyogenaikarāśyaṃ parābhimataṃ vyañjayannāha -- yathā'vayavi dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karmeti
analyzed: dravya ādiṣu sat su dravyam guṇaḥ karma ca iti trayāṇām sattā jāti yogena aikarāśyam para abhimatam vyañjayan āha yathā avayavi dravyam guṇaḥ karma iti
sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ samavāya pratiyogi tvam eva
na samavāya anuyogi tā
iti tayoḥ aikarāśyam

original: samavāye tu na tadubhayamapīti tebhyo viṣeṣaḥ |
analyzed: samavāye tu na tat ubhayam api iti tebhyaḥ viṣeṣaḥ
para abhimatāḥ iti
paraiḥ kāṇādaiḥ ākṣapādaiḥ ca iti arthaḥ
paraiḥ dvayam nitya anitya vibhāgena dvedhā iṣyate

original: tatra sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatvasamarthanenaiva nityadravyanirāsāt tasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ nirastaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: tatra sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇika tva samarthanena eva nitya dravya nirāsāt tasya pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam nirastam bhavati

original: atha yadavayavi dravyaṃ tasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ nirasyati -- tathāhi ghaṭādāvityādinā |
analyzed: atha yat avayavi dravyam tasya pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam nirasyati tathā hi ghaṭa ādau ityādinā
ayam āśayaḥ dṛśyate nāma ghaṭa ādi sthūlam vastu
na sthūlam iti etāvatā avayavi vastu antaram tat
ye nāma aṇavaḥ te eva saṃhatāḥ sthūla tayā avabhāsante
na ca aṇavaḥ dṛśya svabhāvāḥ

original: paramāṇavo nityā adṛśyā iti ca yatsattatkṣaṇikamityato nirastam |
analyzed: paramāṇavaḥ nityāḥ adṛśyāḥ iti ca yat sat tat kṣaṇikam iti atas nirastam

original: yadupalabhyate sthūlamiti tatra bhāgā eva aṃśā eva hi dṛśyante natvaṃśī kaścidavayavī,
analyzed: yat upalabhyate sthūlam iti tatra bhāgāḥ eva aṃśāḥ eva hi dṛśyante na tu aṃśī kaścid avayavī

original: pūrvāparādivibhāgeṣu yadā pūrvo bhāgo dṛśyate tadā tu nāparaḥ,
analyzed: pūrva apara ādi vibhāgeṣu yadā pūrvaḥ bhāgaḥ dṛśyate tadā tu na aparaḥ

original: apare vibhāge tu cakṣuḥpathāgocare naiva bhavati nīlādyavadhāraṇam |
analyzed: apare vibhāge tu cakṣuḥ patha agocare nā eva bhavati nīla ādi avadhāraṇam

original: kimaparo vibhāgo nīlo vā śukla iti saṃśaya eva |
analyzed: kim aparaḥ vibhāgaḥ nīlaḥ vā śuklaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ eva
yadi avayavī dṛṣṭaḥ
avadhārita anavadhārita bhāga bheda vyavasthā na upapadyet

original: tasmāt keśa eko nopalabhyate sa eva saṃhata upalabhyate,
analyzed: tasmāt keśaḥ ekaḥ na upalabhyate saḥ eva saṃhataḥ upalabhyate
evam ime ca aṇavaḥ bhāgāḥ saṃhatāḥ upalabhyante
bhāgebhyaḥ nyaḥ bhagī kaḥ upi avayavī syāt

original: ato yuktaṃ bhāgā eva bhāsanta iti |
analyzed: atas yuktam bhāgāḥ eva bhāsante iti
atra āpta saṃvādam darśayati yat āha nyāya parameśvaraḥ iti
tathā tathā saṃniviṣṭāḥ pūrva apara ātmanā saṃniviṣṭāḥ
grīvā ātmanā kambu ātmanā saṃniviṣṭāḥ
ābhyaḥ bhāgebhyaḥ nyaḥ tadvān bhāgavān vibhāgaḥ avayavi vibhāgaḥ nā eva dṛśyate

original: na hi tantubhyo'nyaḥ pato nāmāvayavī dṛśyate,
analyzed: na hi tantubhyaḥ nyaḥ pataḥ nāma avayavī dṛśyate

original: tathā tathā saṃniviṣṭāstantava eva tu dṛśyante |
analyzed: tathā tathā saṃniviṣṭāḥ tantavaḥ eva tu dṛśyante
evam eva tantuṣu api ūhyam
guṇa karma ādīnām ca dūṣaṇam pratyetavyam iti

original: dūṣaṇaprakāraścāyaṃ--gṛhābyantarasthite ghaṭādau mahati kuñcikādisūkṣmavivaravartinā''lokena dṛśyamāne samupalabhyate nīlamaṃśataḥ,
analyzed: dūṣaṇa prakāraḥ ca ayaṃgṛha abyantara sthite ghaṭa ādau mahati kuñcikā ādi sūkṣma vivara vartinā ālokena dṛśyamāne samupalabhyate nīlam aṃśataḥ
tat ca ekam avayavi samavetam anaṃśam abhyupagacchatām eka aṃśa upalambhaḥ na syāt
sarvatas eva upalabhyeta

original: tathā āmraphale kasmiṃścidāsvādyamāne āsvādyamānāṃśe samupalabhyamāno madhurarasaḥ sarvāṃśenopalabhyeta,
analyzed: tathā āmra phale kasmiṃścid āsvādyamāne āsvādyamāna aṃśe samupalabhyamānaḥ madhura rasaḥ sarva aṃśena upalabhyeta
na ca bhavati tathā
tat na rūpa rūpi vibhāgaḥ

original: aṃśā eva tūpalabhyanta iti tu susyitam |
analyzed: aṃśāḥ eva tu upalabhyante iti tu su syitam
evam guṇa antara nirasanam anvataḥ bodhyam

original: kṣaṇavināśiṣu sarveṣu bhāveṣu kriyāyāḥ kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ |
analyzed: kṣaṇa vināśiṣu sarveṣu bhāveṣu kriyāyāḥ kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ
sāmānya ādi nirāsaḥ api anyatas bodhyaḥ
atha pramāṇe phala vipratipattim nirasyan upakramate nanu pramiti rūpām ityādinā
pramīyate enena iti pramāṇa pada vyutpatti anurodhāt

original: pramitau yat karaṇaṃ tat pramāṇamiti siddhyati |
analyzed: pramitau yat karaṇam tat pramāṇam iti siddhi ati
pramāṇam ca jñānam iṣṭam
kā asau pramitiḥ

original: tatkaraṇaṃ ca tato'nyat pramāṇabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ,
analyzed: tad karaṇam ca tatonyat pramāṇa bhūtam jñānam kim
bhedena hi tayoḥ phala phali bhāvaḥ nirūpaṇīyaḥ
pratyakṣa pramāṇa tayā bhavat abhimate pramāṇa tad phalayoḥ bhedaḥ durnirūpaḥ iti āśaṅkituḥ āśayaḥ
āśaṅkām pariharati ucyate ityādinā
nīla ādeḥ arthāt iti
nīla ādi bāhya artha avalambi yat vijñānam utpadyate
tat dvi rūpam utpadyate iti arthaḥ
dvairūpyam āha nīla ākāra nīla bodha svarūpam ca iti

original: tadevamekasyaiva pratyakṣasya dvairūpyate sati tatra yāṃīlākāravyāvṛttilakṣaṇā nīlākāratā jñānasya,
analyzed: tat evam ekasya eva pratyakṣasya sati tatra yā nīla ākāra vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇā nīla ākāra tā jñānasya
tat eva prāmāṇyam

original: yā cānīlabodhavyāvṛttilakṣaṇā nīlabodhātmatā saiva tasya phalarūpatā,
analyzed: yā ca a nīla bodha vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇā nīla bodha ātma tā sā eva tasya phala rūpa tā
iti phala phali bhedaḥ iti āśayena āha tatra ityādinā
nirgalitam artham āha yathā uktam artha ityādinā
asya nīla ādi bāhya ālambanasya pratyakṣasya yathā uktam artha sārūpyam nīla ādi sārūpyam anīla ākāra vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam
pramāṇam ucyate
yathā uktā a nīla bodha vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇā nīla artha avagatiḥ phalam ucyate iti arthaḥ
nanu ekasmin eva pratyakṣe phala phali bhedaḥ katham

original: sādhyasādhanabhāvanibandhano hi sa iti śaṅkāṃ vyudasyannāha--etaccetyanena |
analyzed: sādhya sādhana bhāva nibandhanaḥ hi saḥ iti śaṅkām vyudasyan āha etat ca iti anena
ayam āśayaḥ na sādhya sādhana bhāva niyataḥ phala phali bhāvaḥ

original: ekasyāpyākārabhedena sa hyupapadyate yadyapyatra nāsti paramārthato bhedo vastunaḥ,
analyzed: ekasya api ākāra bhedena sa hi upapadyate yadi api atra na asti paramārthataḥ bhedaḥ vastunaḥ
pratyakṣam tu vastutas ekam eva
atha api idam pramāṇam idam pramāṇa phalam iti ākāra bhedāt bhinnam vyavasthāpyate

original: iyaṃ ca phalaphalibhāvavyavasthā pratyakṣasamanantarasamutpannena savikalpakena vyavasthāpyata iti |
analyzed: iyam ca phala phali bhāva vyavasthā pratyakṣa samanantara samutpannena sa vikalpakena vyavasthāpyate iti

original: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ--'tasmādasārūpyavyāvṛttyā sārūpyaṃ jñānasya vyavasthāpanahetuḥ anīlabodhavyāvṛttyā ca nīlabodharūpatvaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ,
analyzed: āha ca dharmottara ācāryaḥ tasmāt asārūpya vyāvṛttyā sārūpyam jñānasya vyavasthāpana hetuḥ anīla bodha vyāvṛttyā ca nīla bodha rūpa tvam vyavasthāpyam
vyavasthāpakaḥ ca vikalpa pratyayaḥ pratyakṣa bala utpannaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti
āha ca idam atra śāntarakṣitaḥ
pramāṇa phalam iṣyate
sva vittiḥ vā pramāṇam tu sārūpyam

original: iti | vyākhyātaṃ caitat kamalaśīlena--'bāhye'rthe prameye viṣayādhigamaḥ pramāṇaphalaṃ,
analyzed: iti vyākhyātam ca etat kamalaśīlena bāhya ṛthe prameye viṣaya adhigamaḥ pramāṇa phalam
sārūpyam tu pramāṇam
jñāna ātmani tu prameye sva saṃvittiḥ phalam
yogyatā pramāṇam iti

original: samanantaraślokavyākhyāne ca --nīlāspadaṃ saṃvedanaṃ na pītasyeti viṣayādhigati-vyavasthāyā arthasārūpyameva nibandhanaṃ nānyaditi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvena
analyzed: samanantara śloka vyākhyāne ca nīla āspadam saṃvedanam na pītasya iti viṣaya adhigati vyavasthāyāḥ artha sārūpyam eva nibandhanam na anyat iti vyavasthāpya vyavasthāpaka bhāvena

original: ' ' tasmāt sākārameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na nirākāraṃ..................... vyavasthā ca tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena vikalpena veditavye'ti |

idam atra bodhyam nīla ādi bāhya viṣaya sārūpyam pramāṇam
iti vaibhāṣikāḥ

original: nīlādinā bāhyena jñāne āhitaḥ svākāraḥ pramāṇaṃ svasaṃvittiḥ phalaṃ,
analyzed: nīla ādinā bāhyena jñāne āhitaḥ sva ākāraḥ pramāṇam sva saṃvittiḥ phalam
na viṣaya avabhāsaḥ iti sautrāntikāḥ
apratyakṣaḥ hi eṣām bāhyaḥ viṣayaḥ
anumeya artha vādinaḥ hi ete
anādi vāsanā upaplāvitaḥ yaḥ yam jñānasya eva bahis vat avabhāsamānaḥ ākāraḥ
saḥ eva tu prameyaḥ
pramāṇam tu jñānasya sva ākāraḥ
yā grāhaka tā yogya tā iti ca ucyate
sva saṃvittiḥ phalam iti yoga ācārāḥ
ete vijñāna mātra vādinaḥ
imam matabhedaḥ manasi nidhāya ācārya diṅnāgaḥ idam āha
sa vyāpāra pratīta tvāt pramāṇam phalam eva tat
pramāṇa tva upacāraḥ tu nirvyāpāre na vidyate
viṣaya ākāraḥ eva asya pramāṇam tena mīyate
sva saṃvittiḥ phalam vā atra tad rūpāt artha niścayāt
yad ābhāsam prameyam tat pramāṇam atha tad phalam
grāhaka ākāra saṃvittī trayam na atas pṛthakkṛtam
pramāṇasaḥ ślo

original: iti | pratyakṣe pramāṇatatphalayorvastubhedo nāstītyatra dharmakīrtavacanaṃ pramāṇayati-yathoktamiti |

nanu kim sārūpyam jñānasya arthena

iti pratyakṣa paricchedaḥ

original: lakṣaṇa eva hi prathamato jijñāsā samudeti |
analyzed: lakṣaṇe eva hi prathamatas jijñāsā samudeti
satyam

original: sati samanugate lakṣaṇe prathamaṃ tadeva nirūpaṇiyam |
analyzed: sati samanugate lakṣaṇe prathamam tat eva
asati tu viśeṣayoḥ eva
sva artham jñāna ātmakam para artham tu vacana ātmakam
tat enayoḥ visajātīyayoḥ na ekam lakṣaṇam ghaṭate

original: tat prathamaṃ vibhajyaiva tayorlakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti yukto vibhāgaḥ |
analyzed: tat prathamam vibhajya eva tayoḥ lakṣaṇam vaktavyam iti yuktaḥ vibhāgaḥ
sva artham iti etat vyutpādayati svasmai yat tat sva artham iti
parārtha anumānāt bhedam āha jñāna ātmakam iti
svārthatām upapādayati parvata ādau ityādinā
para artham iti etat vyutpādayati parasmai yat tat para artha anumānam iti
parārtha tām upapādayati trirūpa ityādinā
jñāna viśeṣa bodhakasya anumāna śabdasya śabde pravṛttiḥ katham iti atas āha aupacārāt iti
nanu tri rūpa liṅga avabodhakam ekatra darśanam anyatra śabdaḥ
tāvatā katham anumāna dvaividhyam
yadi evam cakṣuṣā api parārtha anumāna tvam prasajet
mā evam
tri rūpa liṅga sūcakaḥ śabdaḥ
śabdaḥ hi arthasya vivakṣā dvāreṇa bhavati sūcakaḥ
cakṣuḥ tu sākṣāt tri rūpa liṅga pratyāyakaḥ
sūcakaḥ eva tu para artha anumānam iti asmākam paribhāṣā iti
tathā ca uktam śāntarakṣitena
tri rūpa liṅga vacasaḥ sattā saṃsūcaka tvataḥ
yat parārtha anumāna tvam uktam tat śrotra apekṣayā
gauṇam sāṅketikam ca evam anumāna tvam āśritam
sakta saṃsūcaka tvena tena na ati prasajyate
tattvasam pa
iti vyākhyātam ca kamala śīlena vacanasya yat parārtha anumāna tvam uktam
tad śrotra apekṣayā
tena vaktra apekṣā bhāvī doṣaḥ na bhavati
śrotra apekṣayā api trirūpa liṅga sūcanāt upacāreṇa anumāna kāraṇa tvāt samayāt vā anumāna tvam uktam

original: saktasaṃsūcaka evānumānasaṃjñāniveśāt tenendriyasyāvinābhāvitvasaṃbandhajñānasya ca parārthānumānatvaprasaṅgādatiprasaṅgo na bhavati |
analyzed: sakta saṃsūcakaḥ eva anumāna saṃjñā niveśāt tena indriyasya avinābhāvi tva saṃbandha jñānasya ca parārtha anumāna tva prasaṅgāt atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati
tayoḥ sakta saṃsūcaka tva abhāvāt iti
sva artha anumanam nirūpayati tatra sva artham iti
tri rūpa liṅga janyam anumeya artha vijñānam sva artha anumānam iti yāvat
kim tat anumeya artha vijñānam
yat tri rūpa liṅga jñānāt bhavati tat āha tat ca iti
dharmi viśeṣa iti
dharmi viśeṣaḥ pakṣaḥ
liṅge iti śeṣaḥ

original: sapakṣeṣu saṃbaddhaṃ vipakṣebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ pakṣe ca saṃbaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ paśyataḥ pakṣāṃśena bhavati liṅge sādhyāvinābhāvitvaniścaya iti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: sapakṣeṣu saṃbaddham vipakṣebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam pakṣe ca saṃbaddham liṅgam paśyataḥ pakṣa aṃśena bhavati liṅge sādhya avinābhāvi tva niścayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
agni adhyavasāyaḥ iti anye iti
atra agniḥ ayam agnimān veti niścayaḥ iti yāvat
sāmānyam asya viṣayaḥ iti tu pūrvam eva uktam
anumāna lakṣaṇe trirūpam liṅgam prasaktam
prasaktam trairūpyam nirūpayati saṃprati ityādinā

original: tatra pakṣadharmatāsaṃjñakaṃ prathamaṃ rūpamāha--anumeye sattvameva niścitamiti |
analyzed: tatra pakṣa dharmatā saṃjñakam prathamam rūpam āha anumeye sattvam eva niścitam iti
kaḥ yam anumeyaḥ
āha parvata ādau dharmiṇi iti
yadi api parvataḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva avagataḥ
atha api na agni dharmā
a toyam agnimān parvataḥ iti agni viśiṣṭa tayā bhavati anumeyaḥ
tat idam jñāpayitum uktam parvate dharmiṇī iti
sati api trairūpye niścite tasmin na anumāna udayaḥ iti etat avagamayan āha niścitam iti
atra sattva grahaṇena iti
liṅgasya anumeya artha avabodhane sapakṣa sattva ādīni trīṇi bhavanti rūpāṇi aṅgāni
eteṣu anyatamena api vikalaḥ bhavati liṅga ābhāsaḥ

original: tatra pakṣa-sattvaṃ cedrūpaṃ neṣyate tadā'siddhe liṅgābhāse'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāttannimasāya tadrūpamupāttamiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tatra pakṣa sattvam ced rūpam na iṣyate tadā asiddhe liṅga ābhāsa iti prasaṅgaḥ syāt tat nimasāya tat rūpam upāttam iti bhāvaḥ
sattvam eva iti ayogavyaccheda arthasya evakārasya prayojanam āha evakāreṇa ityādinā
pakṣa eka deśa asiddham udāharati yathā digambara prayogaḥ iti
na sarveṣu taruṣu iti
yaḥ ayam hetutayā nirdiṣṭaḥ svāpaḥ patra saṅkoca lakṣaṇaḥ
sa sarveṣu taruṣu pakṣeṣu na asti
kecana hi asaṅkucita patrāḥ eva aharniśam

original: nānena sarveṣu taruṣu siṣādhayiṣitaṃ cetanatvaṃ siddhyet,
analyzed: na anena sarveṣu taruṣu siṣādhayiṣitam cetana tvam siddhyet

original: tasmāt pakṣaikadeśāsiddhaḥ asartyevakāre kasmiṃścittarau vivakṣitasya svāpasya sattvādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt |
analyzed: tasmāt pakṣa eka deśa asiddhaḥ asarti evakāre kasmiṃścid tarau vivakṣitasya svāpasya sattvāt atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt
eva kāreṇa pakṣe sattvasya vyavacchedāt na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
niścitam iti asya prayojanam āha niścita grahaṇena iti
ayam āśayaḥ asti nāma parvate dhūmaḥ

original: paśyato'sya taṃ dhūmo vā bāṣpo veti yadā saṃśayo'bhūt,
analyzed: paśyataḥ asya tam dhūmaḥ vā bāṣpaḥ vā iti yadā saṃśayaḥ bhūt
tadā ayam dhūma ādi tvena saṃdihyamānaḥ bhūta saṅghātaḥ sandigdha asiddhaḥ
bāspaḥ eva vā tayā sandigdhaḥ

original: atra pakṣasattvaṃ mātrajñātamiti bhavatyatiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: atra pakṣa sattvam mātra jñātam iti bhavati atiprasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
idam atra bodhyam liṅgena tri rūpeṇa bhāvyam
eka rūpa vaikalye api asat liṅgam eva

original: trarūpyāṃśe ced bhramastena jāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ nānumānaṃ bhrama eva,
analyzed: ced bhramaḥ tena jāyamānam jñānam na anumānam bhramaḥ eva
ced saṃśayaḥ na bhavet eva anumānam

original: na hyakṣamiva sattayaiva liṅgaṃ jñānaṃ janayituṃ prabhavati |
analyzed: na hi akṣam iva sattayā eva liṅgam jñānam janayitum prabhavati
evam sthite kim liṅga lakṣaṇa vicāre niścaya pada grahaṇa vicāreṇa iti
sattva āśabdāt paścāt evakāreṇa iti
ayam āśayaḥ anumeyaḥ eva sattvam ced liṅgasya rūpam ucyeta
pakṣāt anyatas vyāvartyeta
tathā asati sapakṣa sattvam rūpam aparam vyāhatam bhavati

original: tathā ca sati bhavatyasādhāraṇe sapakṣavipakṣavyāvṛtte pakṣamātravṛttāvasādhāraṇe'tiprasaṅga iti |
analyzed: tathā ca sati bhavati asādhāraṇe sapakṣa vipakṣa vyāvṛtte pakṣa mātra vṛttau asādhāraṇa iti prasaṅgaḥ iti
atha dvitīyam rūpam nirūpayati sapakṣaḥ eva ityādinā
iti vartate iti

original: iti ca vartata ityarthaḥ -- liṅgasyedaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamapi vartata iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: iti ca vartate iti arthaḥ liṅgasya idam dvitīyam rūpam api vartate iti bhāvaḥ
tatra sattva grahaṇena iti
a gṛhīte dvitīyam rūpam eva parityaktam
tathā asati śabdaḥ nityaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti asmin viruddha iti prasaṅgaḥ
kṛtaka tvam hi asti pakṣe śabde

original: yadyapi tṛtīyaṃ rūpaṃ vipakṣe'sattvamityetanna viruddha iti na tatrātiprasaṅgāvakāśaḥ |
analyzed: yadi api tṛtīyam rūpam vipakṣesattvam iti etat na viruddhaḥ iti na tatra atiprasaṅga avakāśaḥ
atha api tad rūpam adhunā anupāttam iti abhipretya idam prayojanam uktam

original: saṃpakṣa eva sattvamiti dvitīyarūpagamyaṃ tu tat |
analyzed: saṃpakṣe eva sattvam iti dvitīya rūpa gamyam tu tat

original: upātte tu vipakṣāsattve sapakṣe sattvopādānasya asādhāraṇavyāvṛttiḥ prayojanam |
analyzed: upātte tu vipakṣa asattve sapakṣe sattva upādānasya asādhāraṇa vyāvṛttiḥ prayojanam

original: śabdo nityaḥ śrāvaṇatvādityatra pakṣamātravṛtti śrāvaṇatvaṃ vipakṣata iva sapakṣato'pi hi vyāvṛttam |
analyzed: śabdaḥ nityaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt iti atra pakṣa mātra vṛtti śrāvaṇa tvam vipakṣataḥ iva sapakṣataḥ api hi vyāvṛttam

original: sattvaśabdātpūrvasminnevakāreṇeti sapakṣe sattvamevetyanuktvā sapakṣa eva sattvamityuktyetyarthaḥ |
analyzed: sattva śabdāt pūrvasmin evakāreṇa iti sapakṣe sattvam eva iti an uktvā sapakṣe eva sattvam iti uktyā iti arthaḥ

original: sattvamevetyuktāvayogavyavacchedena sarveṣu sapakṣeṣu sattvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syāt,
analyzed: sattvam eva iti uktau ayoga vyavacchedena sarveṣu sapakṣeṣu sattvam vivakṣitam syāt

original: tathā ca sati--prayatnānantarīyakatvena liṅgena śabde'nityatvasādhanaṃ vyāhanyeta |
analyzed: tathā ca sati prayatna ānantarīyaka tvena liṅgena śabde nitya tva sādhanam vyāhanyeta
yat yat prayatna ānantarīyakam tat tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi

original: nahi vidyudādāvanityatayā niścate prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ netyetāvatā tasyānityatvasādhakatvaṃ hīyate |
analyzed: nahi vidyut ādau anitya tayā prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam na iti etāvatā tasya anitya tva sādhaka tvam hīyate

original: sapakṣeṣu sattvamevetyayogavyavacchedārthakaivakāragrahaṇe tu vidyudādau prayatnānantarīyakatvābhāvena tasya hetutvaṃ hīyate iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: sapakṣeṣu sattvam eva iti ayoga vyavaccheda arthaka evakāra grahaṇe tu vidyut ādau prayatna ānantarīyaka tva abhāvena tasya hetu tvam hīyate iti bhāvaḥ
na vidyut vat iti
ghaṭa ādayaḥ sapakṣāḥ grāhyāḥ yeṣu laṅgam idam asti
na vidyut ādayaḥ iti arthaḥ
atha tṛtīyam rūpam āha a sapakṣe ced ti
asattva grahaṇena iti
ayam āśayaḥ vipakṣe sattvam eva niścitam iti asmin tṛtīye rūpesattvam ced na upādīyeta
a sapakṣe niścitam iti arthaḥ syāt
tathā asati viruddhasya idam rūpam
katham liṅgasya rūpam bhavitum arhati iti
etena viruddhe liṅga lakṣaṇasya katham atiprasaṅga āpādanam ghaṭeta

original: dvitīyasya rūpasya sapakṣe sattvasyābhāvāditi śaṅkā parāstā |
analyzed: dvitīyasya rūpasya sapakṣe sattvasya abhāvāt iti śaṅkā parāstā
eva kāreṇa sādhāraṇasya iti

original: vipakṣaikadeśavṛtteritiśeṣaḥ dhūme sādhye'gnau hetau sādhāraṇe'sti pakṣe sattvaṃ sapakṣe ca mahānasādau sattvam,
analyzed: vipakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ iti śeṣaḥ dhūme sādhya ignau hetau sādhāraṇeḥ sti pakṣe sattvam sapakṣe ca mahānasa ādau sattvam

original: vipakṣe ca kvacit hrade'sattvaṃ ceti trayāṇāmapi rūpāṇāṃ sattvādatiprasaṅgaḥ |
analyzed: vipakṣe ca kvacid ca iti trayāṇām api rūpāṇām sattvāt atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: evakāragrahaṇe cāyogavyavacchedalābhāt sarvebhyo vipakṣebhyo vyāvṛttatvalābhāt vipakṣe'yogolake vahneḥ sattvānnātiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: evakāra grahaṇe ca ayoga vyavaccheda lābhāt sarvebhyaḥ vipakṣebhyaḥ vyāvṛtta tva lābhāt vahneḥ sattvāt na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu sapakṣa eva sattvamityavadhāraṇagarbhaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamuktam,
analyzed: nanu sapakṣaḥ eva sattvam iti avadhāraṇa garbham dvitīyam rūpam uktam
tat ca na sādhāraṇe syāt
katham atiprasaṅga avasaraḥ na
dvitīya rūpa antargata avadhāraṇa arthaḥ eva tu rūpam
tat eva tu nirūpyate

original: tat adhunā avadhāraṇāghaṭitameva tu dvitīyaṃ rūpaṃ bodhyam |
analyzed: tat adhunā avadhāraṇā ghaṭitam eva tu dvitīyam rūpam bodhyam
niścita grahaṇasya prayojanam āha niścita graṇena iti

original: vītarāgo'pi lokakalyāṇāyedaṃ vaktīti vadantaṃ vādiṇaṃ prayogeṇa nirasyati kaścit--avītarāgo'yaṃ puruṣaḥ vaktṛtvāt rathyāpuruṣavat iti |
analyzed: vīta rāgaḥ api loka kalyāṇāya idam vakti iti vadantam vādiṇam prayogeṇa nirasyati kaścid a vīta rāgaḥ ūyam puruṣaḥ vaktṛ tvāt rathyā puruṣa vat iti
ayam ca hetuḥ sandigdha anaikāntikaḥ
vīta rāgā upi kim iti na brūyāt iti asti eva sandehaḥ
yaḥ na a vīta rāgaḥ

original: sa na vaktā iti upalakhaṇḍādinidarśanena vyatireke samarthyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ upalagvaṇḍasyāvaktṛtvaṃ kiṃ vītarāgatvakṛtamuta svata eveti,
analyzed: sa na vaktā iti upala khaṇḍa ādi nidarśanena vyatireke samarthyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ upalagvaṇḍasya avaktṛ tvam kim vīta rāga tva kṛtam uta svatas eva iti
tat vipakṣesattvam na niścitam iti sandigdha anaikāntikaḥ uyam
etad vyāvṛttaye niścita padam iti bhāvaḥ
eva kāreṇa vipakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ ityādi

original: idaṃ ca vākyaṃ 'niścitagrahaṇene'tyataḥ prāk 'evakāreṇa sādhāraṇasye'tyatraiva sthānamarhati |
analyzed: idam ca vākyam niścita grahaṇena iti atas prāk evakāreṇa sādhāraṇasya iti atra eva sthānam arhati

original: iha tu--evakāraḥ asattvagrahaṇātprāgeva 'asapakṣa evāsattva'miti kuto nopātta ityasya prayojanaṃ vaktavyam,
analyzed: iha tu eva kāraḥ asattva grahaṇāt prāk eva asapakṣaḥ eva asattvam iti kutas na upāttaḥ iti asya prayojanam vaktavyam

original: tacca dharmoddharācāryeṇo dāhṛtam--'asattvavacanāt pūrvasminnavadhāraṇe'yamarthaḥ syāt vipakṣe eva yo nā'sti sa hetuḥ |
analyzed: tat ca dharmoddhara ācāryeṇa u dāhṛtam asattva vacanāt pūrvasmin avadhāraṇā iyam arthaḥ syāt vipakṣe eva yaḥ na asti sa hetuḥ

original: tathā ca prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ sapakṣe'pi sarvatra nāsti |
analyzed: tathā ca prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam sapakṣe api sarvatra na asti
tatas na hetuḥ syāt
tatas pūrvam na kṛtam iti
nyāyabim ṭī
śaṅkate nanu iti
pariharati na iti pūrva vṛddhāḥ ityādi

original: ayamāśayaḥ--tridhā bhavanti vipakṣāḥ sādhyābhāvavān sādhyavadanya sādhyaviruddhaśceti |
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ tridhā bhavanti vipakṣāḥ sādhya abhāvavān sādhya vat anya sādhya viruddhaḥ ca iti
tad anurodhena vyatireka avadhāraṇam api bhavati tredhā
yatra na agniḥ na tatra dhūmaḥ
yaḥ niragniḥ sa nirdhūmaḥ yatra agni viruddham jalam
na tatra dhūmaḥ iti
eṣu trividheṣu anyatama niyama jñāpanāya punar upādānam iti bhāvaḥ
yat vā a sādhya hetvoḥ niyamaḥ hi sambaddhayoḥ eva
saṃbandhaḥ ca tādātmyam tad utpattiḥ vā
yatra tad utpattiḥ vahneḥ dhūmasya

original: yatra na vahnistatra na dhūma ityabhāvato bhavati vipakṣaḥ,
analyzed: yatra na vahniḥ tatra na dhūmaḥ iti abhāvataḥ bhavati vipakṣaḥ

original: yatra tu tādātmyaṃ--vṛkṣatādātmyaṃ śiśupāyāṃ tatra yo na vṛkṣaḥ sa na śiśupeti bhedataḥ |
analyzed: yatra tu tādātmyam vṛkṣa tādātmyam śiśupāyām tatra yaḥ na vṛkṣaḥ sa na śiśupā iti bhedataḥ

original: uṣṇo'yaṃ pradeśo vahnerityatra uṣṇaviruddhaḥ śītaḥ pradeśo bhavati vipakṣaḥ,
analyzed: uṣṇaḥ yam pradeśaḥ vahneḥ iti atra uṣṇa viruddhaḥ śītaḥ pradeśaḥ bhavati vipakṣaḥ
yaḥ uṣṇaḥ sa vahnimān
yaḥ tu śītaḥ na sa tadvān
tad viruddha himavān iti

original: teṣveteṣu vipakṣeṣu yathāyogyaṃ vyatireko bodhya iti vivekadyotanāya tṛtīyasya pṛthagupādānamiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: teṣu eteṣu vipakṣeṣu yathāyogyam vyatirekaḥ bodhyaḥ iti viveka dyotanāya tṛtīyasya pṛthak upādānam iti bhāvaḥ
prayoga niyama artham iti kecid iti
para artha anumāne prayoge kārye niyama artham

original: anvayayirūpavat vyatirekirūpamapi yo dhūmavān so'gnimān yo niragnaḥ sa nirdhūma iti prayoktavyamityetajjñāpanāyeti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: vyatireki rūpam api yaḥ dhūmavān saḥ agnimān yaḥ niragnaḥ sa nirdhūmaḥ iti prayoktavyam iti etat jñāpanāya iti bhāvaḥ

original: yadvā--prayoge kartavye niyamajñāpanārtham--ayamāśayaḥ--prayoge hi anvayo vyatireko vā niyamavāneva prayoktavyo na tadvirahitaḥ |
analyzed: yat vā aprayoge kartavye niyama jñāpana artham ayam āśayaḥ prayoge hi anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā niyamavān eva prayoktavyaḥ na tad virahitaḥ

original: anyathā śyāmo'yaṃ tatputratvādityapi prayogaḥ sādhuḥ syāt,
analyzed: anyathā śyāmā uyam tad putra tvāt iti api prayogaḥ sādhuḥ syāt
yaḥ tad putraḥ sa śyāmaḥ putra antara vat

original: yastu na śyāmaḥ sa na tatputra iti anvayavyatirekayoḥ prayogasaṃbhavāt |
analyzed: yaḥ tu na śyāmaḥ sa na tad putraḥ iti anvaya vyatirekayoḥ prayoga saṃbhavāt
param na śyāma tva tad putra tvayoḥ asti kaścana pratibandhaḥ
yat tayoḥ na prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ na vā tādātmyam
tad anvaya vyatirekau niyamavatoḥ eva prayoktavyau

original: sati niyame dvayoranyataraprayoga eva tu paryāptaḥ,
analyzed: sati niyame dvayoḥ anyatara prayogaḥ eva tu paryāptaḥ
na ubhayam api apekṣitam iti dyotanāya pṛthak uktam iti bhāvaḥ

liṅgam vibhajate tri rūpāṇi ca iti
trairūpya lakṣaṇa lakṣitāni liṅgāni tri prakārāṇi bhavanti iti arthaḥ

original: trirūpāṇīti padaṃ vyācaṣṭe--trīṇi rūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tānīti |
analyzed: tri rūpāṇi iti padam vyācaṣṭe trīṇi rūpāṇi yeṣām tāni iti
prakāra bhedam āha anupalabdhiḥ ityādinā
liṅgānām paryāya śabdān āha sādhanam ityādinā

original: sukhapratipatteḥ prasiddheśca vibhajanakramavyutkrameṇa trīṇi tāni nirūpayati--tatra kāryamityādinā prayogamukhena |
analyzed: sukha pratipatteḥ prasiddheḥ ca vibhajana krama vyutkrameṇa trīṇi tāni nirūpayati tatra kāryam ityādinā prayoga mukhena
kāryam liṅgam darśayati yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti anena
dhūmaḥ hi agneḥ kāryam
tena idam kārya liṅgam ucyate
kāryam bhavati hetoḥ gamakam
parārtha anumāne vaktavyam nyāya avayava vibhāga nirṇayam atra eva prasaṅgāt āha vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā saṃjñakam dvayam eva iti
atra pareṣām pakṣam nirasyan anuvadati anye tu ityādinā
nirasyati etat ca ayukta tyādinā
ayam āśayaḥ pratijñā iyam anupayoginī
nahi sādhana aṅgam pratijñā
nanu siṣādhayiṣitasya sādhyasya avabodhanāya tad apekṣā iti ced
katham asambaddham abhidadhyāt śabdaḥ
na hi asti śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ
śabda pramāṇa nirākaraṇa avasare saṃbandha abhāvaḥ samarthitaḥ prāk
nanu vivakṣām avagamayati śabdaḥ
atas pāramparyeṇa sādhya adhigati hetu tvāt bhavati pratijñā sādhana aṅgam
athā api tat anaṅgam eva tat
nahi saktaḥ saṃsūcyate tayā
na hi prathamam siṣādhayiṣita avabodhanam avaśyam apekṣyate
tasmāt asakta saṃsūcaka tvāt pratijñā na anumāna aṅgam
vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā vacanābhyām eva anumāna niṣpatteḥ

original: nanvanavayavabhūtamapi yathā mahānase iti dṛṣṭāntapadaṃ prayujyate,
analyzed: nanu anavayava bhūtam api yathā mahānase iti dṛṣṭānta padam prayujyate

original: tathā pratijñāvacanaṃ prathamaṃ prayoge siṣādhayiṣitajñāpanāya prayoktavyamiticet evaṃ sati vādinaṃ prativādinaṃ vā prayoganirdeśe pravartayat 'śabdasyānityatvaṃ sādhaya,
analyzed: tathā pratijñā vacanam prathamam prayoge siṣādhayiṣita jñāpanāya prayoktavyam iti ced evam sati vādinam prativādinam vā prayoga nirdeśe pravartayat śabdasya anitya tvam sādhaya

original: nityatvaṃ sādhaye' tyādi prerayiturvacanamapi tathā syāt |
analyzed: nitya tvam sādhaye tyādi prerayituḥ vacanam api tathā syāt
āha ca atra śāntarakṣitaḥ
parārtham iti varṇyate
asādhan aṅga bhū tvāt pratijñā anupayoginī
asaṃbaddhāt na sākṣāt hi sā yukta artha upapādikā
asakta sūcanāt na api pāramparyeṇa yujyate
sādhya sādhana dharmasya viṣayasya upadarśanāt
dṛṣṭānta pada vat tu eṣā sādhana aṅgam yadi iṣyate
abhyanujñā ādi vākyena nanu atra vyabhicāri tā
niṣphalam ca tadā tatra viṣayasya upadarśanam
tattvasam pa

original: iti | pratijñāyā avayavānaṅgatvenānupayuktatve siddhe pañcamyantahetuprayogasya kvopayoga ityāha -- pratijñāmantareṇeti |
analyzed: iti pratijñāyāḥ avayava anaṅga tvena anupayukta tve siddhe pañcamī anta hetu prayogasya kva upayogaḥ iti āha pratijñām antareṇa iti
nigamanasya avayava anaṅga tām āha yatra pratijñā eva na asti ityādinā
bodhyam pratijñā vacanāt na adhikaḥ ṛthaḥ siddhi ati nigamanena
tat nigamanam pratijñām abhyupagacchatām mate punaruktam āpadyate
tathā ca ācārya diṅnāgaḥ nigamanam punarukta tvāt eva na sādhanam iti
nanu adhika artham nigamanam
pratijñā hi kevalam sādhya nirdeśaḥ
pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanayaiḥ yā ṛthāḥ abhihitāḥ te eka vākya tayā nigamyante ina ina

original: ataeva ca nigamanamucyate anena cābādhitatvāśaṅkā nirasyata iti cet |
analyzed: ataeva ca nigamanam ucyate anena ca abādhita tva āśaṅkā nirasyate iti ced
na evam

original: yat śaṅkāvakāśa-eva nāstiḥ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvacanābhyāmeva pakṣe sādhyasya niścayāt |
analyzed: yat śaṅkā avakāśaḥ eva nāstiḥ vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā vacanābhyām eva pakṣe sādhyasya niścayāt
nahi tābhyām api a nirasyamānā śaṅkā anena vāryeta
tat idam utprekṣaṇam sva goṣṭyām eva śobhate
uktam ca śāntarakṣitena
trirūpa hetu nirdeśa sāmarthyāt eva siddhitaḥ

original: na viparyayaśaṅkā'sti vyarthaṃ nigamanaṃ vacaḥ ||' iti |
analyzed: na viparyaya śaṅkā asti vyartham nigamanam vacaḥ iti
tatvasam pa
agni ādau sādhyaḥ iti

original: dṛśye agnyādau sādhye dṛśyo dhūmādiriti yāvat |
analyzed: dṛśye agni ādau sādhye dṛśyaḥ dhūma ādiḥ iti yāvat
agnau sati dhūmaḥ dṛśyate
asati na dṛśyate

asati agnau upalabhyet

original: tasmāt pratyakṣānupalabdhā agneḥ kāryaṃ dhūma iti niścīyata iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣa anupalabdhā agneḥ kāryam dhūmaḥ iti niścīyate iti bhāvaḥ
cakṣuḥ ādau sādhyaḥ iti

original: cakṣurāderadṛśyatvena pratyakṣānupalambhasyāsaṃbhavāt kādācitkatvena rūpādijñānasya cakṣurādikāryatvaṃ niścīyate iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādeḥ adṛśya tvena pratyakṣa anupalambhasya asaṃbhavāt kādācitkatvena rūpa ādi jñānasya cakṣuḥ ādi kārya tvam niścīyate iti bhāvaḥ
nanu sambaddhayoḥ eva niyamaḥ
na a sambaddhayoḥ
sambandhaḥ ca na aparaḥ tādātmya tad utpattibhyām
tat kāraṇam kāryeṇa anumīyet
svabhavena vā tādātmya lakṣaṇena tad ātmā anumīyeta
atha katham rasāt rūpa anumānam
nahi tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: na ca rūpātmā rasa iti pareṣāmāśaṅkāyāmucyate -- ekasāmagryadhīnatvena bhavati rasena rūpānumānamiti |
analyzed: na ca rūpa ātmā rasaḥ iti pareṣām āśaṅkāyām ucyate eka sāmagrī adhīna tvena bhavati rasena rūpa anumānam iti
tat idam udāharati rūpa ādi vityādinā
eka sāmagrī adhīna tvam upapādayati atra ityādinā
pūrvakam iti
avyavahita pūrvakam iti arthaḥ
pūrva pūrva rūpāt uttara uttara rūpa utpattiḥ iti yāvat
pūrva pūñjāt uttara puñja utpattau iti
ayam āśayaḥ na kāṇāda ādi abhimata uvayava avayibhāvaḥ saugata saṃmataḥ
nava avayava rūpam avayavi rūpe avayava rasa uvayavi rase kāraṇam iti
na api rūpa rūpi bhedaḥ
kintu pūrva pūrva rūpa ādi lakṣaṇāt puñjāt uttara uttara rūpa ādi lakṣaṇa puñja antara utpattiḥ
tatra uttara rūpa apekṣayā pūrva pūrva tvam rasasya api tulyam
atha api uttara uttara rūpāṇām pūrva pūrva rūpa santāna tā eva
tathā rasānām rasa santāna ānatā eva
tathā ca sva santāna apekṣayā uttarasya svayam eva upādānam

original: tasmin rūpasantānalakṣaṇe puñje pūrvarasaḥ sahakārikāraṇamisyate uttarapuñje rasānubhavāt |
analyzed: tasmin rūpa santāna lakṣaṇe puñje pūrva rasaḥ sahakāri kāraṇam isyate uttara puñje rasa anubhavāt
evam rasa santāne pūrvarūpam sahakāri kāraṇam

original: evaṃ ca sati rūpasāmagrī rasaghaṭitā rasasāmagrī rūpaghaṭitā,
analyzed: evam ca sati rūpa sāmagrī rasa ghaṭitā rasa sāmagrī rūpa ghaṭitā
upādāna nimitta bhāve tu vinimayaḥ

atha svabhāvam liñgam nirūpayati svabhāvaḥ ityādinā
sva sattā mātra bhāvinī iti svaṃhetuḥ

original: hetoryā sattā tayaiva bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa svasattāmātrabhāvī,
analyzed: hetoḥ yā sattā tayā eva bhavitum śīlam yasya sa sva sattā mātra bhāvī

original: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ--'pracuraśiṃśupe deśe'viditaśiṃśupāvyavahāro jaḍaḥ kenaciduccāṃ śiṃśupāmupadarśyocyate vṛkṣo'yamiti,

nyāyabim ṭī
anupalabdhim liṅgam nirūpayati anupalabdhiḥ yathā iti
upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya iti
upalabdhiḥ jñānam
tasyāḥ lakṣaṇam sāmagrī
tatra prāptaḥ
janaka tayā sāmagrī anupraviṣṭaḥ
dṛśyaḥ iti yāvat
viṣayaḥ api jñāna sāmagrī antarbhūtaḥ
śaṅkate nanu iti
dṛśya tā dṛśi gocara tā
dṛśyati na dṛśi gocara tvam vivakṣitam
api tu dṛśi gocara tvena saṃbhāvyamāna tvam eva
tat eva upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam iti ucyate iti abhiprāyeṇa samādhatte eka indriya ityādinā
ghaṭaḥ tad āśrayaḥ pradeśaḥ ca eka indriya grāhyau
sati ghaṭe āśrayeṇa saḥ upi upalabhyeta
yadi nā upalabhyate darśana yogyasya api tasya na dṛśi gocara tā iti etat adarśanam anupalabdhiḥ ucyate
sā iyam anupalabdhiḥ ghaṭa abhāve liṅgam bhavati iti arthaḥ
upalambha pratyaya antarā iti
pratyayaḥ kāraṇam

original: upalambhasya yāni pratyayāntarāṇi--ālambanādanyāni kāraṇāni indriyādīni tatsākalyāt |
analyzed: upalambhasya yāni pratyaya antarāṇi ālambanāt anyāni kāraṇāni indriya ādīni tad sākalyāt
anupalabdhi śabdena vivakṣitam artham āha sacā ityādinā
sa ca anupalabdhi śabda vācyaḥ hetuḥ ca
castu arthe
eka jñāna saṃsargi iti
indriya praṇidhāna yogyam pradeśa tad āśraya vastu dvayam anyonya sāpekṣam eka jñāna saṃsargi iti ucyate
tayoḥ madhye yaḥ ekaḥ padārthaḥ pradeśa viśeṣaḥ
sa kevalam upalabhyamānaḥ
tasmāt tad upalambhāt ca iti arthaḥ
karma kartṛ bhāvena iti
viviktaḥ pradeśaḥ ālambana bhūtaḥ karma ucyate
upalambhaḥ tad prakāśaka tvāt kartṛ ucyate
tat idam ubhayam iha anupalabdhi śabdena vivakṣitam iti bhāvaḥ
upalabdhi nivṛtti mātra paratve asādhakatām āha na tu ityādinā
tat hi svayam eva iti
jñāna abhāva mātram hi asatyām jñāna sāmagryām asti eva iti arthaḥ
na kicid iti
akiñcitkaram iti arthaḥ

original: paryudāsavṛttyāśrayaṇena anyasya yasyakasyacit jñānamanupalabhaśabdārthatayā na grāhyamityāha--nāpītti |

original: na tu yaḥ kaścana pradeśo yatkiñcid jñānamiti bhāvaḥ |

original: uktaṃ ca dharmottarācāryeṇa--'tasmāt sa eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśastadālambanaṃ ca jñānaṃ dṛśyānupalambhaniścayahetutvād dṛśyānupalambha ucyate' iti |

original: tuṣārasparśo yadā nopalambhayogyo nāpi śītaṃ tatra vahnimātropalambhādbhavatyayaṃ hetuḥ |
analyzed: tuṣāra sparśaḥ yadā nā upalambha yogyaḥ nā api śītam tatra vahni mātra upalambhāt bhavati ayam hetuḥ
anyathā tu svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ vā syāt
svabhāva viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā iti

original: pratiṣedhyasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya yo viruddhastasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
analyzed: pratiṣedhyasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya yaḥ viruddhaḥ tasya yat kāryam tasya upalabdhiḥ iti arthaḥ
udāraharatinā atra tuṣāraspaśā dhūmāt iti
dūrāt dharmiṇi dhūma mātram paśyataḥ tuṣāra sparśa abhāva pratipattau bhavati hetuḥ ayam

original: svabhāve upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tu svabhāvānupalabdhyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet tadviruddhe copalabhyamāne viruddhopalambhādeva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet | 9 |
analyzed: svabhāve upalambha yogyena upalabhyamāne tu svabhāva anupalabdhyā eva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet tad viruddhe ca upalabhyamāne viruddha upalambhāt eva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet  /
kārya viruddhā iti

original: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryaṃ tasya yo viruddhastasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
analyzed: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryam tasya yaḥ viruddhaḥ tasya yat kāryam tasya upalabdhiḥ iti arthaḥ
udāharati na iha iti

original: śītakāraṇānāṃ tatkāryasya śītasya tadviruddhasya vahneśca yadā nopalambhayogyatā tadā'yaṃ hetuḥ |
analyzed: śīta kāraṇānām tad kāryasya śītasya tad viruddhasya vahneḥ ca yadā na upalambha yogya tā tadā ayam hetuḥ

original: anyathā tu svabhāve upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet |
analyzed: anyathā tu svabhāve upalambha yogyena upalabhyamāne svabhāva anupalabdhyā eva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet
kārye upalambha yogye nu upalabhyamāne kārya anupalambhāt eva tad pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet
kārya viruddhe tu upalabhyamāne kārya viruddha upalambhāt eva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet  /
kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā iti

original: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yo viruddhaḥ,
analyzed: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇam tasya yaḥ viruddhaḥ

original: tasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdherityarthaḥ udāharati--na romaharṣādīti |
analyzed: tasya yat kāryam tasya upalabdheḥ iti arthaḥ udāharati na romaharṣa ādi iti

original: pratiṣedhye romaharṣādau tatkāraṇe kāraṇaviruddhe copalambhāyogye bhavatyayaṃ hetuḥ |
analyzed: pratiṣedhye romaharṣa ādau tad kāraṇe kāraṇa viruddhe ca upalambha ayogye bhavati ayam hetuḥ
anyathā tu svabhāve

original: kāraṇe vā upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhyā kāraṇānupalabdhyā vā kāraṇaviruddhe upalabhyamāne kāraṇaviruddhopalambhena vā pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet | 11 |
analyzed: kāraṇe vā upalambha yogyena upalabhyamāne svabhāva anupalabdhyā kāraṇa anupalabdhyā vā kāraṇa viruddhe upalabhyamāne kāraṇa viruddha upalambhena vā pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet  /
vyāpaka viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ iti

original: pratiṣedhyasya yad vyāpakaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yatkāryaṃ tadupalabdhirityarthaḥ |
analyzed: pratiṣedhyasya yat vyāpakam tasya yat viruddham tasya yat kāryam tad upalabdhiḥ iti arthaḥ
udāharati na atra iti

original: dūrādeva dhūmamātraṃ paśyatastena bhavati nātra tuṣārasparśa iti tatpratiṣedhānumānam |
analyzed: dūrāt eva dhūma mātram paśyataḥ tena bhavati na atra tuṣāra sparśaḥ iti tad pratiṣedha anumānam

original: tuṣārasparśaṃ tadvyāpake śīte vopalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tadviruddhe vahnau vopalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhiḥ vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhirvā syāt | 12 |
analyzed: tuṣāra sparśam tad vyāpake śīte vā upalambha yogye nu palabhyamāne tad viruddhe vahnau vā upalabhyamāne svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ vā syāt  /
svabhāva viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ yathā iti

original: pratiṣedhyasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya yo viruddhastasya yadyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
analyzed: pratiṣedhyasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya yaḥ viruddhaḥ tasya yat yāptam tasya upalabdhiḥ iti arthaḥ

upalabhyamāne tu śīte svabhāva viruddhā upalabdhiḥ syāt

original: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yadvyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |

original: kārye vahnāvupalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tu kāryānupalabdhiḥ syāt tadviruddhe śīte upalabhyamāne kāryaviruddhopalabdhireva liṅga syāt,

original: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yat viruddhaṃ tasya yadvyāpyaṃ tadupalabdhirityarthaḥ |

original: iha tu kāraṇaviruddhavyāptatuṣāramātramanubhūyata iti tena dhūmapratiṣedhāt kāraṇaviruddhavyāptopalabdherbhavati kāryapratiṣedhaḥ | 15 |

original: pratiṣedhyasya yabdyāpakaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yadavyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |

original: iha tu tadviruddhavyāptopalambhāt vyāpakapratiṣedha iti viśeṣaḥ | 16 |

original: idaṃ ca svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavataḥ prayogasyodāharaṇaṃ bhavitumarhati,

original: jñānamātrāstitve tu sarvamiti nirdeśo nātīva svarasaḥ |

original: tatrāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ neti pareṣāṃ vādastu pratyakṣopahataḥ |

original: saugataṃmanyāḥ vātsīputrīyāḥ punaḥ buddhiśabdādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ ghaṭādīnāmakṣaṇikatvaṃ cābhyupagacchanti |

original: tān pratyeṣa prayogaḥ -- buddhiśabdādaya iva sarvameva kṣaṇikam saṃskṛtatvāditi |

original: kṣaṇikamityetad vyācaṣṭe--utpattikṣāṇa eveti utpattikṣaṇamātrasthāyitā kṣaṇikatvamiti yāvat |

original: nanu kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ tiṣṭhanti khalu te samutpannā utpattyanantaramapīti-śaṅkāṃ nirasyannāha--sarvaṃ tāvadityādinā |

original: nanu nāvinaśvarasvabhāvā na vā vinaśvarasvabhāvā utpadyante kintu kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthitisvabhāvā utpādyante ityāśaṅkāmanūdya nirasyati--athedṛśa eva svabhāva iti |

original: ayamāśayaḥ-- kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthitveti yā kila maryādā kalpyate seyamaniyateti punarapi tāvantaṃ kālaṃ kuto'yaṃ na tiṣṭhet svabhāvāniyateranavasthiteriti

original: utpāde nairantaryaṃ apareṣu pūrvasādṛśyaṃ ca viśadayannāha--pūrvakṣāṇavināśakālaeva tatsadṛśaṃ kṣaṇāntaramudayata iti |

original: avyaktabhede iha tu kiṃpunarnyāya-siddho'bhedabhrama iti bhāvaḥ |

original: ātmākāśādayo hi nityā bhāvāḥ santīti parapakṣavāsanāmūlakāṃ śaṅkāṃ pariharan sarvaśabdena kroḍīkṛtaṃ viśadayati--pramāṇapratītāḥ padārthā iti
analyzed: ātma ākāśa ādayaḥ hi nityāḥ bhāvāḥ santi iti parapakṣa vāsanā mūlakām śaṅkām pariharan sarva śabdena kroḍīkṛtam viśadayati pramāṇa pratītāḥ padārthāḥ iti

original: ātmādiṣu pramāṇaṃ nāstīti te śasaśṛṅgāyanta iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: ātma ādiṣu pramāṇam na asti iti te śasaśṛṅgāyantaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
sa viśeṣaṇa prayogaḥ yathā iti

ayam āśayaḥ yathā a go vyāvṛttaḥ gauḥ iti ucyate
anīla vyāvṛttaḥ nīlaḥ ucyate evam anutpannebhyaḥ vyāvṛtta mātram utpannam iti ucyate

vyāvṛttiḥ ca vyāvṛttasya svabhāvaḥ eva

original: saiva vyāvṛttiḥ kalpitaṃ dharmabhedamāśritya nīlasyotpattiriti anīlavyāvṛttyātmano vyavacchedena vyatiriktevocyate |
analyzed: sā eva vyāvṛttiḥ kalpitam dharma bhedam āśritya nīlasya utpattiḥ iti a nīla vyāvṛtti ātmanaḥ vyavacchedena vyatiriktā iva ucyate
tathā iha śabdasya utpattiḥ iti

original: tamimaṃ kalpitaṃ viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhedamāśritya utpattimattvāditi heturayaṃ prayukta iti saviśeṣaṇasvabhāvaheturayaṃ bhavatīti |
analyzed: tam imam kalpitam viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhedam āśritya utpattimat tvāt iti hetuḥ ayam prayuktaḥ iti sa viśeṣaṇa svabhāva hetuḥ ayam bhavati iti
śaṅkate nanu iti

original: tat sanniti śabdo'pi asadvyāvṛtte'sadvyāvṛttyā pravartate tat satvāditi yaḥ svabhāvahetuḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ so'pyutpattimattvamiva saviśeṣaṇaheturbhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ |

pariharati na etat asti iti
sataḥ eva iti

original: pūrvasmin 'yatsattadanityaṃ santaścāmī bhāvā' ityasmin prayoge sadityeva dharmī nirdiśyate |
analyzed: pūrvasmin yat sat tat anityam santaḥ ca amī bhāvāḥ iti asmin prayoge sat iti eva dharmī nirdiśyate

original: nātra sattvenāsattvavyāvṛttirūpeṇa kalpitena dharmabhedena kimapi viśeṣyate,

original: utpattimāṃśca śabda ityatra yadutpattimadityutpattyā viśeṣato dharmī nirdiśyate anutpattivyāvṛttilakṣaṇayotpattyā viśeṣitastato vyatirikta iva dharmī nirdiśyate |
analyzed: utpattimān ca śabdaḥ iti atra yat utpattimat iti utpattyā viśeṣataḥ dharmī nirdiśyate anutpatti vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇayā utpattyā viśeṣitaḥ tatas vyatiriktaḥ iva dharmī nirdiśyate

original: utpattimāṃśca śabda iti śabdasya dharmiṇo dharma iva samāropitabhedā utpattirnirdiśyate |
analyzed: utpattimān ca śabdaḥ iti śabdasya dharmiṇaḥ dharmaḥ iva samāropita bhedā utpattiḥ nirdiśyate

original: devadattāddharmiṇo bahirbhūtāścitrā gāvo viśeṣaṇatayā viśeṣaṇatayā vivakṣitā iti bhinnaviśeṣaṇatā tatra vyaktaṃ gamyate,
analyzed: devadattāt dharmiṇaḥ bahis bhūtāḥ citrāḥ gāvaḥ viśeṣaṇatayā viśeṣaṇatayā vivakṣitāḥ iti bhinna viśeṣaṇatā tatra vyaktam gamyate

original: kṛtakamiti nirdeśastu kāryamiti nirdeśādaviśiṣṭaḥ kāryasvabhāvaṃ kāryatāmeva gamayatīti kathaṃ bhinnaviśeṣaṇateti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: kṛtakam iti nirdeśaḥ tu kāryam iti nirdeśāt aviśiṣṭaḥ kārya svabhāvam kārya tām eva gamayati iti katham bhinna viśeṣaṇa tā iti bhāvaḥ

original: itthaṃ ca citraguśabdavat dharmisvarūpānantargataparavyāpārasāpekṣatvasya viśeṣaṇasyāvabodhanāt bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvahetorayaṃ prayogo bhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ |

original: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ kṛtaka' iti (nyā. bi. pa. 109) |

original: vyākhyātaṃ caitat dharmottarācāryeṇa--'upādhibhedena svabhāvasya prayoga iti saṃbandhaḥ upādhirviśeṣaṇaṃ,

original: anantarānavasthāyitvābhāvasya yadvyāpakamavinaśvarasvarūpatvaṃ tadrūpādibhyo nivartamānamanantarānavasthāyitvābhāvaṃ tebhyo nivartayat teṣāmantantarānavasthāyitāṃ sādhayati--tadetatpratipāditaṃ vinaśvararūpaṃ ca rūpādikamudayakāla iti |

original: utpattimattvenānityatve sādhye vaidharmyaprayogaṃ pradarśayati--yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatrotpattimattvamapīti |

original: anavadhārite ca kāryakāraṇabhāve pareṇāpādyamānāprayojakāśaṅkā na nivārayituṃ śakyeteti kāryahetuṃ prayuñjatā prathamaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmavadhārya iti bhāvaḥ |
