original: viśeṣaṇavati vartamānastu viśeṣyābhāvarūpa iti sadvyavahārayogye upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvarūpaviśeṣaṇavati vartamāna uktaviśiṣṭābhāvo'nupalabhyamānatvābhavarūpa evetyabhipretya vyatirekavyāptiṃ pradarśayati--yat sadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eveti |
analyzed: viśeṣaṇavati vartamānaḥ tu viśeṣya abhāva rūpaḥ iti sat vyavahāra yogye upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptatva rūpa viśeṣaṇavati vartamānaḥ ukta viśiṣṭa abhāvaḥ anupalabhyamāna tva abhava rūpaḥ eva iti abhipretya vyatireka vyāptim pradarśayati yat sat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam tat upalabhyate eva iti

original: yattu sadapi nopalabhyate tadupalabdhiyogyaṃ neti viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhāvo bodhyaḥ |
analyzed: yat tu sat api nā upalabhyate tat upalabdhi yogyam na iti viśeṣaṇa abhāve viśiṣṭa abhāvaḥ bodhyaḥ
na ca evam iha iti
iha avayave kapāle
pradeśa viśeṣe bhū tala ādau
upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya ghaṭasya
na ca evam iha upalabdhiḥ iti anvayaḥ

original: tathā ca vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyenāpi tato nivṛttena bhāvyamityato'vayavino'vayave'sadvyavahārayogyataiva sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tathā ca vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpyena api tatas nivṛttena bhāvyam iti atas vayavinaḥ uvayave sat vyavahāra yogya tā eva sidhyati iti bhāvaḥ
sādhanasya ca sādhye niyata tva kathanam iti
sādhye sādhana vyāpaka tva kathanam iti yāvat
sādhya abhāvasya ca sādhana abhāve niyata tva kathanam iti
sādhana abhāve sādhya abhāva vyāpaka tva kathanam iti yāvat
vyākhyātaḥ niyata śabda arthaḥ

original: ukteṣu prayogeṣu pareṣāmaprayojakaśaṅkāṃ vārayannāha--tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisiddhāviti |
analyzed: ukteṣu prayogeṣu pareṣām aprayojaka śaṅkām vārayan āha tatas pramāṇena vyāpti siddhau iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ--pratyakṣapramāṇamūlāṃ vyāptiṃ svīkurvatāmasmākaṃ paraiḥ kriyamāṇāyā aprayojakaśaṅkāyā nāvakāśaḥ |
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ pratyakṣa pramāṇa mūlām vyāptim svīkurvatām asmākam paraiḥ kriyamāṇāyāḥ aprayojaka śaṅkāyāḥ na avakāśaḥ
vayam kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt vā svabhāvāt vā siṣādhayiṣitam sādhayāmaḥ
tat ubhayam api pratyakṣa mūlakam
kārya kāraṇa bhavaḥ hi anvaya vyatireka sahacārābhyām pratyakṣa gamyābhyām sidhyati
svabhavaḥ ca sādhya sādhanayoḥ pratyakṣa gamyaḥ
upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ ca upalabhyamāna anupalabhyamānayoḥ svabhāvaḥ eva paryavasyati iti
evam sattvam asattvam ca

original: śṛṅgasyānyatra sattvaṃ śaśe'sattvaṃ ca śaśaśṛṅgayoḥ svabhāvaviśeṣāveva |
analyzed: śṛṅgasya anyatra sattvam śaśe sattvam ca śaśa śṛṅgayoḥ svabhāva viśeṣau eva
pratyakṣa gamyam eva etat iti
prasaṅgāt pareṣām aprayojaka śaṅkām udbhāvayan āha yatra ityādinā
teṣām naiyāyikānām

original: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhavatu mā vā bhūditi |
analyzed: iha anyaḥ sarvajñaḥ bhavatu mā vā bhūt iti

original: atīndriyārthadarśanasamarthaṃ sarvajñaṃ nityamekamīśvaramapyanabhyupagacchanto mīmāṃsakāḥ sarvajñamātranirāsāya prayatante saugatādyabhimatasarvajñapratiṣedhābhiniveśāt
analyzed: atīndriya artha darśana samartham sarvajñam nityam ekam īśvaram api an abhyupagacchantaḥ mīmāṃsakāḥ sarvajña mātra nirāsāya prayatante saugata ādi abhimata sarvajña pratiṣedha abhiniveśāt

original: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ--iha jagati īśvarādanyaḥ sarvajño bhavatu mā vā bhūt |
analyzed: vayam tu brūmaḥ iha jagati īśvarāt anyaḥ sarvajñaḥ bhavatu mā vā bhūt
tad samarthane tad nirasane vā na asmākam abhiniveśaḥ
kintu bhagavān punar īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ asti
yaḥ usya jagataḥ sraṣṭā
śakyate ca asti iti sādhayitum iti
teṣām īśvara sādhana prakāram anuvadati tathā hi ityādinā

original: nirūpayiṣyamāṇe īśvarasādhake prayoge pakṣasapakṣavipakṣavibhāgaṃ prathamataḥ pradarśayannupakramate--trayaḥ khalviti |
analyzed: nirūpayiṣyamāṇe īśvara sādhake prayoge pakṣa sapakṣa vipakṣa vibhāgam prathamatas pradarśayan upakramate trayaḥ khalu iti
sa kartṛka tve sādhye niścita kartṛkāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ sapakṣāḥ
ye ca vyoma ādayaḥ niścita sa kartṛkatva virahāḥ te vipakṣāḥ

original: ye cānye vanaspatyādayo ye ca mahīmahīdharādayaḥ te sandigdhakartṛkā bhavanti |
analyzed: ye ca anye vanaspati ādayaḥ ye ca mahī mahīdhara ādayaḥ te sandigdha kartṛkāḥ bhavanti
mahat tva sāvayava tva ādi sa kartṛka tva upasthāpakam
kartuḥ anupalambhaḥ tad abhāva upasthāpakaḥ
vipratipatteḥ vā saṃśayaḥ
atas te ete mahī mahīdhara ādayaḥ sarve pakṣa koṭau antarbhavanti

original: anye ca bhavāḥ sapakṣakoṭau vipakṣakoṭau cāntarbhavanti |
analyzed: anye ca bhavāḥ sapakṣa koṭau vipakṣa koṭau ca antarbhavanti
na caturthaḥ prakāraḥ bhaveṣu
tat ayam kāryam tat sa kartṛkam
yathā ghaṭa ādi
kṣiti ādikam ca kāryam

original: yanna kāryaṃ tanna sakartṛkaṃ yathā vyomādi,
analyzed: yat na kāryam tat na sa kartṛkam yathā vyoma ādi
kāryam ca idam kṣiti ādi iti
buddhimat kartṛkāḥ iti

original: sādhyaśarīre buddhimattvaniveśena upādānopakaranādyabhijñena kartrā bhāvyamiti niyamo gamyate |
analyzed: sādhya śarīre buddhimat tva niveśena upādāna upakarana ādi abhijñena kartrā bhāvyam iti niyamaḥ gamyate
tena artha antara ādeḥ na avasaraḥ
sakartṛkatva sādhakatayā upanyastasya kāryatva hetoḥ ābhāsatva śaṅkām nivārayan āhana ayam ityādinā
hetoḥ ābhāsa tā ca aṅga vaikalye

original: hetoraṅgāni ca trīṇi pakṣe sattvaṃ sapakṣe ca sattvaṃ,
analyzed: hetoḥ aṅgāni ca trīṇi pakṣe sattvam sapakṣe ca sattvam
vipakṣa itva sattvam iti
etad traya samarthanena ca ābhāsa tā āśaṅkā pratikṣiptā bhavati
tasmāt kramaśas tāni samarthayati
sarveṣām mahī mahīdhara ādīnām
sa pakṣe kumbha ādau
na ca anaikāntikaḥ iti
mā astu buddhimat kartṛkatvam astu ca kāryatvam iti aprayojaka śaṅkā mūlakā iyam anaikāntika tva śaṅkā
sā parihriyate
pakṣa tayā parigṛhīte taru mahī mahā ruha ādau
sādhya viparyaye buddhimat kartṛkatva viparyaye bādhakam pramāṇam asti
bādhaka pramāṇa upahata tvāt viparyayasya na anaikāntika tva prasaṅgaḥ
kim tat bādhaka pramāṇam
tat āha tathā hi ityādinā
kāryam tāvat iti
ghaṭa ādi kāryam tāvat iti arthaḥ
mānasena pratyakṣeṇa iti
atra mānasena iti viśeṣaṇam prāmādikam
ātma sukha ādau eva antare manaḥ prabhavati
na bāhye sākṣāt

original: mano nimittamityetāvatā na bāhyārthapratyakṣaṃ mānasamiti vaktuṃ suśakam |
analyzed: manaḥ nimittam iti etāvatā na bāhya artha pratyakṣam mānasam iti vaktum su śakam
tasmāt alaukika para tayā katham api nā iyam

original: ghaṭādīnāṃ kāryāṇāṃ kumbhakārādikartṛkatvasya bhūyodarśanāt tatsahakṛtena kāryatvasāmānyalakṣaṇāpratyāsattyā jāyamānena kāryamātrasya sakartṛkatvāvagāhinā'laukikena pratyakṣeṇa sarvatra kārye sakartṛkatvaṃ pratyakṣeṇopalabdhamiti tadāśayaḥ |
analyzed: ghaṭa ādīnām kāryāṇām kumbhakāra ādi kartṛka tvasya bhūyas darśanāt tad sahakṛtena kāryatva sāmānya lakṣaṇa a pratyāsattyā jāyamānena kārya mātrasya sa kartṛka tva avagāhinā alaukikena pratyakṣeṇa sarvatra kārye sa kartṛka tvam pratyakṣeṇa upalabdham iti tad āśayaḥ
idam eva ca pratyakṣam sādhya viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇam asti iti āśayaḥ

original: tathāhītyādimūlavākyaṃ kāryaṃ tāvat kumbhakārāderupajāyamānaṃ bhūyodṛṣṭamiti bhūyodarśanasahāyena pratyakṣeṇa kāryaṃ sakartṛkamityupalabhyata iti kathamapi śeṣapūraṇena vyākhyeyam |
analyzed: tathā hi ityādi mūla vākyam kāryam tāvat kumbhakāra ādeḥ upajāyamānam bhūyodṛṣṭam iti bhūyodarśana sahāyena pratyakṣeṇa kāryam sa kartṛkam iti upalabhyate iti katham api śeṣa pūraṇena vyākhyeyam
tasmāt na idam iti

original: yasmāt kāryasya sakartṛkatvaṃ naisargikamiti pratyakṣeṇāvagataṃ tasmānnedaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ,
analyzed: yasmāt kāryasya sa kartṛka tvam naisargikam iti pratyakṣeṇa avagatam tasmāt na idam śaṅkanīyam
kāryam ca syāt kartṛ nirapekṣam api syāt iti arthaḥ
sarva upasaṃhāreṇa iti
sarva vyakti upasaṃhāreṇa iti arthaḥ

original: nahi katipayavyaktīnāṃ mithaḥ sāhacaryadarśanamātreṇā tatsāmānyayorvyāptiḥ saṃbhavati |
analyzed: nahi katipaya vyaktīnām mithas sāhacarya darśana mātreṇa ā tad sāmānyayoḥ vyāptiḥ saṃbhavati

original: nahi katipayaghaṭapaṭavyaktīnāṃ sāhacaryadarśanamātrād bhavati ghaṭapaṭasāmānyayorvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: nahi katipaya ghaṭa paṭa vyaktīnām sāhacarya darśana mātrāt bhavati ghaṭa paṭa sāmānyayoḥ vyāptiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
buddhimat kartṛkatvam vikalpya dūṣayati tatra yadi ityādi

original: ayamāśayaḥ--pratiniyatā hi kāryeṣu tasya tasya sā sā sāmagrī,
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ pratiniyatā hi kāryeṣu tasya tasya sā sā sāmagrī

original: nahi ghaṭasya yā sāmagrī sā paṭasya,
analyzed: nahi ghaṭasya yā sāmagrī sā paṭasya
yā paṭasya na sā ghaṭasya
śarīra indriya manaḥ vyāpāra sāpekṣeṣu kāryeṣu buddhimat kartṛka tā iti tu dṛṣṭam
śarīra vyāpāra sāpekṣāṇi kānicid kāryāṇi yathā upalabhyante
tathā tad nirapekṣāṇi asaṃkhyātāni upalabhyante
yathā tṛṇa taru latā gulma prabhṛtīni
tasmāt dṛśya śarīraka buddhimat kartṛkatva vyabhicaritam tu kāryatvam

original: yāni ca buddhimatkartṛkāṇyupalabhyante tāni ca dṛśyaśarīrakabuddhimatkartṛkāṇyeva |
analyzed: yāni ca buddhimat kartṛkāṇi upalabhyante tāni ca dṛśya śarīraka buddhimat kartṛkāṇi eva

original: tṛṇādīnāmapi pakṣīkaraṇāt na vyabhicārāśaṅketi tu na yuktam |
analyzed: tṛṇa ādīnām api pakṣīkaraṇāt na vyabhicāra āśaṅkā iti tu na yuktam

original: nahi vyabhicāranivāraṇāya vyabhicāraviṣayasya pakṣīkaraṇaṃ yujyata iti |
analyzed: nahi vyabhicāra nivāraṇāya vyabhicāra viṣayasya pakṣīkaraṇam yujyate iti
saṃdigdhe hetu vacanāt iti
ayam āśayaḥ siṣādhayiṣitasya anvaye niścite hetoḥ āśrayaṇam vyartham
vyatireke niścite hetoḥ āśrayaṇam ayuktam anaikāntika tā āpatteḥ
saṃdigdhe tu hetoḥ āśrayaḥ yujyate

original: iha tu tṛṇādau dṛśyaśarīrasya karturvyatirekaniścayāt tatra tatsādhanāya hetorāśrayo'nupapanna iti |
analyzed: iha tu tṛṇa ādau dṛśya śarīrasya kartuḥ vyatireka niścayāt tatra tad sādhanāya hetoḥ āśrayaḥ anupapannaḥ iti
āśaṅkate atha iti
pariharati tat na iti
durārohe parvate vahneḥ vyatirekaḥ durniśceyaḥ
anyatra ca dhūmena niyataḥ vahniḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: ataḥ saṃdehāt parvate vahneḥ sādhanaṃ yuktam |
analyzed: atas saṃdehāt parvate vahneḥ sādhanam yuktam

original: iha tu sādhyavyatireko dṛśyānupalambhena niścita iti mahadasti vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: iha tu sādhya vyatirekaḥ dṛśya anupalambhena niścitaḥ iti mahat asti vaiṣamyam iti bhāvaḥ
vikalpa antaram anūdya dūṣayati atha adṛśya iti
adṛśya śarīreṇa buddhimatā kartrā
buddhimat mātreṇa vā kartrā vyāptiḥ avagamyate iti arthaḥ

original: adṛśyaśarīrakatvasya sādhyatāvacchedakakoṭāvanupraveśe kulālādidṛśyapuruṣakartṛkatayā prasiddhe ghaṭādāvanaikāntyāśaṅkā syāditi pakṣāntaramāśrayat--buddhimanmātrasya veti |
analyzed: adṛśya śarīraka tvasya sādhya tā avacchedaka koṭau anupraveśe kulāla ādi dṛśya puruṣa kartṛkatayā prasiddhe ghaṭa ādau anaikāntya āśaṅkā syāt iti pakṣa antaram āśrayat buddhimat mātrasya vā iti
ayam āśayaḥ buddhimat kartṛkatvam eva tu sādhyam

original: sa ca kartā dṛśyaśarīro vā syādadṛśyaśarīro vā,
analyzed: sa ca kartā dṛśya śarīraḥ vā syāt a dṛśya śarīraḥ vā
yatra dṛsyasya saṃbhavaḥ tatra astu saḥ
yatra na
tatra adṛśyaḥ bhavitum arhati iti
dṛśya anupalambhena vyatireka asiddheḥ iti
vyatirekasya dṛśya anupalambhena asiddheḥ iti arthaḥ
ayam bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ hi dṛśya anupalambha gamyaḥ
sa ca anupalambhaḥ pratiyoginaḥ dṛśya tā sāpekṣaḥ

original: na hyadṛśyasya piśācāderabhāvo neha piśāca iti cakṣuṣā garītuṃ śakyate |
analyzed: na hi adṛśyasya piśāca ādeḥ abhāvaḥ na iha piśācaḥ iti cakṣuṣā garītum śakyate

original: tathā pratiyogiṣu keṣāṃcidadṛsyasvabhāvatvena na tatsāmānyābhāve dṛśyānupalambhasaṃbhavaḥ |
analyzed: tathā pratiyogiṣu keṣāṃcid adṛsya svabhāva tvena na tad sāmānya abhāve dṛśya anupalambha saṃbhavaḥ

original: itthaṃ ca tvayā kartṛṣvadṛśyo'pi kartā yadyabhyupagamyeta taddhiṭitakartṛsāmānyābhāvo dṛśyānupalambhābhāvena naivāvadhāryeta |
analyzed: ittham ca tvayā kartṛṣu adṛśyaḥ api kartā yadi abhyupagamyeta tad hiṭita kartṛ sāmānya abhāvaḥ dṛśya anupalambha abhāvena nā eva avadhāryeta

original: vastuto ghaṭādiṣvapi tvayā kartṛtayā'bhyupagato buddhimān kartā nityaḥ kaścidātmā,
analyzed: vastutas ghaṭa ādiṣu api tvayā kartṛ tayā abhyupagataḥ buddhimān kartā nityaḥ kaścid ātmā

original: so'pyadṛśya eveti yogyānupalambhāsaṃbhavena buddhimataḥ karturabhāvo naivāvadhāryeta |
analyzed: saḥ upi adṛśyaḥ eva iti yogya anupalambha asaṃbhavena buddhimataḥ kartuḥ abhāvaḥ na eva avadhāryeta
tathā ca buddhimataḥ kartuḥ vyatireke saṃśayāt

original: kāryatvasya tato vyāvṛtterapi saṃdehāt tṛṇādiṣvapi tatsaṃdehasyaiva prasaṅgāt kārye kartṛṣāpekṣatvasaṃsayaḥ syādeveti saṃdighavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ hetordoṣo bhavedeveti |
analyzed: kārya tvasya tatas vyāvṛtteḥ api saṃdehāt tṛṇa ādiṣu api tad saṃdehasya eva prasaṅgāt kārye syāt evā iti saṃdigha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam hetoḥ doṣaḥ bhavet eva iti

original: idamabhihitaṃ bhavati -- buddhimatkartṛkatve sādhye buddhimatkartṛkatvābhāvavān vipakṣaḥ |
analyzed: idam abhihitam bhavati buddhimat kartṛka tve sādhye buddhimat kartṛka tva abhāvavān vipakṣaḥ
ayam buddhimat kartṛkaḥ na ayam iti avadhāraṇam durghaṭam
adṛśya viṣaya tvena dṛśya anupalambha asaṃbhavāt

original: tathā ca saṃdehena tṛṇādau tadabhāvaḥ sandigdha eveti saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ saṃdigdhānaikāntikatve paryavasitaṃ hetordoṣa eveti |
analyzed: tathā ca saṃdehena tṛṇa ādau tad abhāvaḥ sandigdhaḥ eva iti saṃdigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam saṃdigdha anaikāntika tve paryavasitam hetoḥ doṣaḥ eva iti
sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam hetu doṣatayā nidarśayatā ācārya dharmakīrtinā idam udāhṛtam asya eva rūpasya sandehe pi anaikāntikaḥ eva

original: yathā'sarvajñaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimānveti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ,
analyzed: yathā a sarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ rāga ādimān veti sādhye vaktṛ tva ādikaḥ dharmaḥ saṃdigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttikaḥ

original: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevaṃprakārasyānupalambhasyādṛśyātmaviṣayatvena saṃdehahetutvā'-diti | (nyā. vi. 112.) |
analyzed: sarvatra eka deśe vā sarvajñaḥ vaktā na upalabhyate iti evaṃprakārasya anupalambhasya adṛśya ātma viṣaya tvena saṃdeha hetu tvāt iti
nanu tṛṇa ādi pakṣīkṛtam
ghaṭa ādi tu sapakṣaḥ
atha vyoma ādi nityam eva tu vipakṣaḥ

original: yadakartṛkaṃ na tadutpattimat yathā vyomādīti nidarśanamupalabhyata evetyatrāha--sādhyābhāvaprayuktasyeti |
analyzed: yat akartṛkam na tat utpattimat yathā vyoma ādi iti nidarśanam upalabhyate eva iti atra āha sādhya abhāva prayuktasya iti
ayam āśayaḥ kim anena nidarśana mātreṇa

original: vyomādau nityatayā'bhimate kāryatvābhāvaḥ kiṃ kartrabhāvaprayukto vā kartṛnirapekṣakāraṇāntarābhāvaprayukto vetyatra niyāmakābhāvāt kāryatvābhāvasya kartrabhāvaprayuktvānavadhāraṇāt vyāpterasiddheriti |
analyzed: vyoma ādau nitya tayā abhimate kāryatva abhāvaḥ kim kartṛ abhāva prayuktaḥ vā kartṛ nirapekṣa kāraṇa antara abhāva prayuktaḥ vā iti atra niyāmaka abhāvāt kāryatva abhāvasya kartṛ abhāva prayuktva anavadhāraṇāt vyāpteḥ asiddheḥ iti
ukta doṣe āpta saṃvādam āha tathā ca iti
kārya tvasya iti
vipakṣa vṛtti hataye anaikāntika tva prasaṅga parihārāya iti yāvat

original: saṃbhāvyate'tīndriyaḥ kartā cet -- buddhimatā hi kartrā śarīrendriyamanoviśiṣṭena bhāvyam |
analyzed: saṃbhāvyate iti indriyaḥ kartā ced buddhimatā hi kartrā śarīra indriya manaḥ viśiṣṭena bhāvyam
buddheḥ śarīra ādi sāpekṣa tva darśanāt
śarīriṇī eva vā dṛṣta tvāt

original: na dṛśyate ca śarīrī kartā tṛṇādau |
analyzed: na dṛśyate ca śarīrī kartā tṛṇa ādau

original: athātīndriyaśarīro buddhimān kartā tṛṇādau kārye'bhyupagamyate cediti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: atha atīndriya śarīraḥ buddhimān kartā tṛṇa ādau kārya abhyupagamyate ced iti bhāvaḥ
vyatireka siddhi vidhurā vyāptiḥ katham sidhyati
tadā tasmin atīndriye dṛśya anupalabdhi asaṃbhavena tad vyatireka asiddheḥ

original: atha vyatirekasiddhyarthaṃ dṛśyaḥ kartā cettṛṇādāvapyāśrīyate tasya tatrānupalambhādanaikāntikataiva hetorityāśayaḥ |
analyzed: atha vyatireka siddhi artham dṛśyaḥ kartā ced tṛṇa ādau api āśrīyate tasya tatra anupalambhāt anaikāntika tā eva hetoḥ iti āśayaḥ
nanu asti svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sa kartṛka tvena saha utpattimat tvasya
tathā utpattimat tva abhāvena saha sakartṛka tva abhāvasya

original: yad utpattimat tat sakartṛkaṃ yathā ghaṭādi,
analyzed: yat utpattimat tat sa kartṛkam yathā ghaṭa ādi
yat akartṛkam tat na utpattimat yathā vyoma ādi iti nidarśanataḥ tad lābhāt
vahninā saha dhūpasya api svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
sa ca avadhāryate bhūyas darśanena

original: tādātmyatatadutpattibhyāṃ nāparaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sādhyena hetoriti tu na |
analyzed: tādātmya tad tad utpattibhyām na aparaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sādhyena hetoḥ iti tu na

original: tathā ca sādhanābhāvasya sādhyābhāvaprayuktatvāditi kiṃ prayojyaprayojakabhāvavicāreṇetīmāṃ śaṅkāṃ pariharan parābhimataṃ hetoḥ sādhyena saha svābhāvikatvasaṃbandhavādaṃ nirasyati--yattu trilocanenetyādinā |
analyzed: tathā ca sādhana abhāvasya sādhya abhāva prayukta tvāt iti kim prayojya prayojaka bhāva vicāreṇa iti imām śaṅkām pariharan para abhimatam hetoḥ sādhyena saha svābhāvika tva saṃbandha vādam nirasyati yat tu trilocanena ityādinā
tad upādheḥ tasya saṃbandhasya upādheḥ iti arthaḥ

original: dhūmena vahneḥ saṃbandhe ārdrendhanasaṃyoga iva vahninā dhūmasya saṃbandhe na ko'pyupādhirityarthaḥ |
analyzed: dhūmena vahneḥ saṃbandhe ārdra indhana saṃyogaḥ iva vahninā dhūmasya saṃbandhe na kaḥ api upādhiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: uktaṃ ca vācaspatimiśrarnyāyavartikatātparyaṭīkāyāṃ--' tathāhi dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ,
analyzed: uktam ca vācaspati miśraḥ nyāyavartikatātparyaṭīkāyām tathā hi dhūma ādīnām vahni ādi saṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ
na tu vahni ādīnām dhūma ādibhiḥ
te hi vinā api dhūma ādibhiḥ upalabhyante

original: yadā tvārdrendhanādisaṃbandhamanubhavanti tadā dhūmādibhiḥ saha saṃbadhyante |
analyzed: yadā tu ārdra indhana ādi saṃbandham anubhavanti tadā dhūma ādibhiḥ saha saṃbadhyante

original: tasmāt vahnyādīnāmardrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ saṃbandhaḥ svābhāviko na bhavati |
analyzed: tasmāt vahni ādīnām ardra indhana ādi upādhi kṛtaḥ saṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ na bhavati
tatas na niyataḥ
svābhāvikaḥ tu dhūma ādīnām vahni ādibhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ
upādheḥ anupalabhyamāna tvāt
kvacid vyabhicārasya adarśanāt
anupalabhyamānasya api kalpanā anupapatteḥ
atas niyataḥ saṃbandhaḥ anumāna aṅgam iti nyā
nirasyati tat na yuktam iti
svābhāvika saṃbandha upapādaka tayā nirūpitayoḥ dvayoḥ madhye prathamam pratikṣipati yatas ityādinā

original: tasya tena saha saṃbandhe saṃbandhibhyāṃ yadanyadapekṣyate tadupādhiśabdenābhidhīyate ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: tasya tena saha saṃbandhe saṃbandhibhyām yat anyat apekṣyate tat upādhi śabdena abhidhīyate iti arthaḥ
katham adarśana mātreṇa na asti eva iti ucyate iti
upādhiḥ na asti eva iti ucyate iti arthaḥ

original: upādhiśaṅkāyā anivāryatayā na svābhāvikasaṃbandhāvadhāraṇaṃ ghaṭeteti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: upādhi śaṅkāyāḥ anivārya tayā na svābhāvika saṃbandha avadhāraṇam ghaṭeta iti bhāvaḥ
dvitīyam hetum pratikṣipati yat api uktam iti
pratyaya antara vakalyena iti
kāraṇa antara vaikalyena iti arthaḥ
na ca evam iti

original: evaṃ sati prāmāṇikānāmanumānena bhavantī lokayātrā nopapadyeta,
analyzed: evam sati prāmāṇikānām anumānena bhavantī lokayātrā na upapadyeta
sarvatra upādhi kalpanāyāḥ prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ
sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāve saṃśayasya vihita tvāt iti

original: idaṃ ca vācaspatimiśrairāśaṅkya parihṛtam--' na cādṛśyamāno'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena saṃdihyamāna upādhiḥ svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti sāṃpratam |
analyzed: idam ca vācaspatimiśraiḥ āśaṅkya parihṛtam na ca adṛśyamānaḥ api darśana anarha tayā sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvena saṃdihyamānaḥ upādhiḥ svābhāvika tvam pratibadhnāti iti sāṃpratam

original: avaśyaṃ śaṅkayā bhavitavyaṃ niyāmakābhāvāditi dattāvakāśā khalviyaṃ laukikapramāṇamaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāpiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacitpravarteta' iti (nyā. vā. ṭī. 165)
analyzed: avaśyam śaṅkayā bhavitavyam niyāmaka abhāvāt iti datta avakāśā khalu iyam laukika pramāṇa maryādā atikrameṇa śaṅkā piśācī labdha prasarā na kvacid nā asti iti na ayam kvacid pravarteta iti nyā vā ṭī
yathā anya tva aviśeṣe pi iti

original: pūrvapūrvakṣaṇānāmuttarottarakṣaṇeṣu hetutve vaktavye pūrvatvasyottaratvasya cāsaṃkhyāteṣu pūrveṣūttareṣu ca sādhāraṇyenātiprasaṅge prasajati deśakāla jātyādinā sādharmasya sarvasya svalakṣaṇatayā anyānyatvaṃ vadatāṃ saugatānāmasaṃbhavādanyatvāviśeṣe'pi kasyacideva kṣaṇasya kasmiṃścideva kṣaṇe hetutvaṃ yathā'bhimataṃ tathā kasyacideva kenacideva svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti mamāpyabhimatamityāśayaḥ |
analyzed: pūrva pūrva kṣaṇānām uttara uttara kṣaṇeṣu hetu tve vaktavye pūrva tvasya uttara tvasya ca asaṃkhyāteṣu pūrveṣu uttareṣu ca sādhāraṇyena atiprasaṅge prasajati deśa kāla jāti ādinā sādharmasya sarvasya sva lakṣaṇatayā anya anyatvam vadatām saugatānām asaṃbhavāt anya tva aviśeṣe pi kasyacid eva kṣaṇasya kasmiṃścid eva kṣaṇe hetu tvam yathā abhimatam tathā kasyacid eva kenacid eva svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti mama api abhimatam iti āśaya
tat na yuktam iti

original: pramāṇasiddhaṃ vahnidhūmayorhetumadbhāvameva tayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ vadatāmasmākaṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ svābhāvikaṃ saṃbandhaṃ tayoḥ kalpayatāṃ yuṣmākaṃ ca mahadasti vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: pramāṇa siddham vahni dhūmayoḥ hetumat bhāvam eva tayoḥ saṃbandham vadatām asmākam pramāṇa śūnyam svābhāvikam saṃbandham tayoḥ kalpayatām yuṣmākam ca mahat asti vaiṣamyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: svābhāvikaśabdārthaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti ko'rtha iti |
analyzed: svābhāvika śabda artham vikalpya dūṣayati svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti kaḥ ūrthaḥ iti

original: bhūyodarśanamātrasya vyāptiniścayādhāyakatvaṃ na yujyata ityāśayenāha--sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāpterapi siddhiriti
analyzed: bhūyas darśana mātrasya vyāpti niścaya ādhāyaka tvam na yujyate iti āśayena āha sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭānta mātram asti iti na vyāpteḥ api siddhiḥ iti
yadṛcchā militayoḥ api iti
karabha viśeṣa gardabha viśeṣayoḥ yadṛcchā militayoḥ bhūyassu syaleṣu darśana mātreṇa tayoḥ api vyāpti niścaya āpātāt iti arthaḥ
nanu tarhi nyāya prayoga sthale nidarśana prayogasya kva upayogaḥ
iti atra āha tasmāt nidarśanam iti
gṛhīta vismṛta pratibandha grāhaka pramāṇa smaraṇa dvāreṇa iti
pūrvam gṛhītaḥ
atha vismṛtaḥ

original: yo vahnidhūmayoḥ pratibandhaḥ hetuhetumadbhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tadgrāhakaṃ yatpramāṇaṃ anvayasahacāravyatirekasahacāralakṣaṇaṃ tatsmaraṇadvāreṇetyarthaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vahni dhūmayoḥ pratibandhaḥ hetu hetumat bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tad grāhakam yat pramāṇam anvaya sahacāra vyatireka sahacāra lakṣaṇam tad smaraṇa dvāreṇa iti arthaḥ

original: gṛhītaṃ vismṛtaṃ ca yatpratibandhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatsmaraṇadvāreṇeti vā tadarthaḥ |
analyzed: gṛhītam vismṛtam ca yat pratibandha grāhakam pramāṇam tad smaraṇa dvāreṇa iti vā tad arthaḥ
na sva sannidhi mātreṇa iti anvaya vyatirekayoḥ nidarśana saṃnidhi mātreṇa iti arthaḥ

original: nahi vyomādau sakartṛkatvābhāvotpattimattvābhāvayoḥ sāhacaryadarśanamātreṇeti prakṛte tātparyam |
analyzed: nahi vyoma ādau sakartṛkatva abhāva utpattimattva abhāvayoḥ sāhacarya darśana mātreṇa iti prakṛte tātparyam
tat etat upapādayati tathā hi ityādinā
ākāśe hi yathā iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ--utpattimattvena buddhimatkartṛkatvaṃ sādhayatā tatra vyomādi vyatirekanidarśanatayā pradarśayatā tvayā vyomādīnāmutpattirāhityasya
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ utpattimattvena buddhimat kartṛkatvam sādhayatā tatra vyoma ādi vyatireka nidarśana tayā pradarśayatā tvayā vyoma ādīnām utpatti rāhityasya
tat na upapadyate

original: tatra buddhimata iva tato'nyasyācetanasyāpi kāraṇasyābhāvo vartata ea |
analyzed: tatra buddhimataḥ iva tatonyasya acetanasya api kāraṇasya abhāvaḥ vartate

original: tathā ca cetanādhiṣṭhitādapi svasvakāraṇād bījādestṛṇādikamudbhavatīti vadatāṃ yo'bhimatastathāvidhakāraṇād bījādestṛṇādikamudbhavatīti vadatāṃ yo'bhimatastathāvidhakāraṇābhāvaḥ tatprayuktatvameva vyomāderanutpattimattve prayojakaṃ kiṃ na syāt |
analyzed: tathā ca cetanā dhiṣṭhitāt api sva sva kāraṇāt bīja ādeḥ tṛṇa ādikam udbhavati iti vadatām yaḥ abhimataḥ tathāvidha kāraṇāt bīja ādeḥ tṛṇa ādikam udbhavati iti vadatām yaḥ abhimataḥ tathāvidha kāraṇāt bīja ādeḥ tṛṇa ādikam udbhavati iti vadatām yaḥ abhimataḥ tathāvidha kāraṇa abhāvaḥ tad prayukta tvam eva vyoma ādeḥ anutpattimat tve prayojakam kim na syāt
tasmāt na utpattimat tve buddhimat kartṛka tva vyāpya tā siddhyet iti

original: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśanādākāśe'pi buddhimadabhāvādeva kartṛtvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyata iti |
analyzed: nā api ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimat anvaya darśanāt ākāśe api buddhimat abhāvāt eva kartṛ tva abhāvaḥ vaktum yujyate iti

original: ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśane taṃ vinā tasyotpattirmābhūt |
analyzed: ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimat anvaya darśane tam vinā tasya utpattiḥ mā abhūt
ākāśasya anutpāde katham tasya prayojaka tā

original: nahyanyatra dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇamanyatra na dṛśyata ityetāvatā'nyasyānutpattau tattantraṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: nahi anyatra dṛṣṭam kāraṇam anyatra na dṛśyate iti etāvatā anyasya anutpattau tat tantram bhavet iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu dhūmena vahnyādau sādhye vipakṣe dhūmasyādarśanāt dhūmābhāvo vahnyabhāvaprayukto yathā bhavati,
analyzed: nanu dhūmena vahni ādau sādhye vipakṣe dhūmasya adarśanāt dhūma abhāvaḥ vahni abhāva prayuktaḥ yathā bhavati

original: tathā vyomni vipakṣe upalabhyamāna utpattyabhāvo buddhimadabhāvaprayuktaḥ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkyāha--kiṃcādarśanamātreṇeti |
analyzed: tathā vyomni vipakṣe upalabhyamānaḥ utpatti abhāvaḥ buddhimat abhāva prayuktaḥ kim na syāt iti āśaṅkya āha kiṃca adarśana mātreṇa iti

original: vipakṣe hetoradarśanamātreṇa cet tasya vyatirekaḥ sidhyet,
analyzed: vipakṣe hetoḥ adarśana mātreṇa ced tasya vyatirekaḥ sidhyet
saṃbhāvyate nāma sādhana abhāve sādhya abhāva prayukta tvam

original: na ca hetoradarśanamātreṇa hetvabhāvaḥ sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: na ca hetoḥ adarśana mātreṇa hetvabhāvaḥ sidhyati iti bhāvaḥ
tat etat upapādayati tathā hi iti
na ca upalambha nivṛtti mātram prayojakam upalambha abhāve bhavitum arhati
upalambha nivṛttiḥ upalambhaka sāmagrī abhāvāt
upalabhya nivṛttiḥ tu sva sāmagrī abhāvāt eva
upalambhaḥ ca na upalabhi niṣpādaka sāmagrī antartaḥ
kintu upalambhaka sāmagryām upalabhyaḥ antarbhavati
cakṣuḥ ādeḥ iva viṣayasya api upalambhe hetu tvāt
tat upalabhya abhāva prayuktaḥ
na tu upalambha abhāva prayuktaḥ upalabhya abhāvaḥ
nahi khala bila antargatam upalabhyate kena api

original: tasmāt sādhyasādhanayorhatuhetumadbhāve tādātmye vā pratibandhe satyeva sādhyābhāvaprayuktaḥ sādhanābhāvo bhavet |
analyzed: tasmāt sādhya sādhanayoḥ hatu hetumat bhāve tādātmye vā pratibandhe sati eva sādhya abhāva prayuktaḥ sādhana abhāvaḥ bhavet

original: anyatra tu saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatve hetordoṣo'parihārya eveti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: anyatra tu saṃdigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tve hetoḥ doṣa uparihāryaḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ
yat api vācaspatiḥ āha iti

original: idaṃ tu vācaspatimiśrāṇāṃ vacanam 'tasmāt prāmāṇikalokayātrāmanupālayatā yathādarśanaṃ śaṅkanīyam |
analyzed: idam tu vācaspatimiśrāṇām vacanam tasmāt prāmāṇika lokayātrām anupālayatā yathādarśanam śaṅkanīyam
na tu a dṛṣṭa pūrvam api
viṣa iṣa smṛti apekṣe hi śaṃśayaḥ na a smṛte bhavati
na ca smṛtiḥ ananubhūta care bhavitum arhati

original: tasmādupādhiṃ prayatnato'nviṣyanto'nupalabhamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ' iti |
analyzed: tasmāt upādhim na asti iti avagamya svābhāvika tvam saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ--nanu sādhyasādhanayostādātmyena tadutpattyā vā saṃbandhena bhāvyam,
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ nanu sādhya sādhanayoḥ tādātmyena tad utpattyā vā saṃbandhena bhāvyam
anyathā iha siṣādhayiṣitam na syāt api

original: sādhanaṃ tu syāditi sādhyasaṃśayasamudbhavādaprayojakaśaṅkā samavataredeveti cenna |
analyzed: sādhanam tu syāt iti sādhya saṃśaya samudbhavāt aprayojaka śaṅkā samavataret eva iti ced na

original: vahnidhūmayoḥ sāhacarye bhūyassvadhikaraṇeṣu bhūyodṛṣṭe dhūmasya vahninā saha saṃbandhe upādhāvanupalabhyamāne parvate dhūmaṃ paśyato na tatra vahneḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt |
analyzed: vahni dhūmayoḥ sāhacarye bhūyaḥsu adhikaraṇeṣu bhūyas dṛṣṭe dhūmasya vahninā saha saṃbandhe upādhau anupalabhyamāne parvate dhūmam paśyataḥ na tatra vahneḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt
saṃśayaḥ tu sati viśeṣa smaraṇe

original: vahnivirahitasya dhūmavataḥ kasyaciddeśasya prāganubhūtasya smaraṇe satyeva bhavet |
analyzed: vahni virahitasya dhūmavataḥ kasyacid deśasya prāk anubhūtasya smaraṇe sati eva bhavet

original: yathā dhūmavahnyośśataśaḥ sahacāradarśane'pi dhūmarahitasya vahnimato'yogolakasya prāganubhūtasya smaraṇāt parvatādau vahnau dṛśyamāne bhavedeva dhūme śaṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: yathā dhūma vahnyoḥ śataśas sahacāra darśane api dhūma rahitasya vahnimat ayaḥ golakasya prāk anubhūtasya smaraṇāt parvata ādau vahnau dṛśyamāne bhavet eva dhūme śaṃśayaḥ

original: tathā pārthivatva lohalekhyatvayoḥ śataśaḥ sahacāradarśane'pi lohalekhyatvābhāvavataḥ pārthivasya vajramaṇeḥ smaraṇe bhavedeva prārthive'pi kvacillohalekhyatve saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: tathā pārthiva tva loha lekhya tvayoḥ śataśas sahacāra darśane api loha lekhya tva abhāvavataḥ pārthivasya vajramaṇeḥ smaraṇe bhavet eva prārthive api kvacid loha lekhya tve saṃśayaḥ
tasmāt yathādarśanam eva āśaṅkanīyam iti
tādātmya tad utpatti saṃbandha tyāgena iti
āśaṅkanīyam iti uttareṇa anveti
tatra prameya tvasya vyabhicāra darśanam eva iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ --katipayaprameyeṣu bhūyodṛṣṭavahnisāhacaryaṣvapi dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasādhāraṇatvena prameyatvasya prameye dṛśyamāne'pi bhavati yathā vahnau saṃśayastathā katipayadhūmeṣu dṛṣṭakatipayavahnisāhacaryeṣvapi dhūmatvasya dṛṣṭasāhacaryādṛṣṭasāhacaryasādhāraṇatayā prabandhaviśeṣānabhyupagame dṛṣṭe'pi dhūme bhavedeva vahnau śaṃśayaḥ,
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ katipaya prameyeṣu bhūyas dṛṣṭa vahni sāhacaryaṣu api dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa sādhāraṇa tvena prameya tvasya prameye dṛśyamāne api bhavati yathā vahnau saṃśayaḥ tathā katipaya dhūmeṣu dṛṣṭa katipaya vahni sāhacaryeṣu api dhūma tvasya dṛṣṭa sāhacarya adṛṣṭa sāhacarya sādhāraṇa tayā prabandha viśeṣa anabhyupagame dṛṣṭe api dhūme bhavet eva vahnau śaṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ katipayakāryeṣu dṛṣṭakartrapekṣeṣvapi kāryatvasya dṛṣṭakartrapekṣādṛṣṭakartrapekṣasādhāraṇatayā dṛśyamāne'pyaṅkurādau kārye bhavedeva kartrapekṣāyāṃ saṃśaya iti yathādarśanameva bhavati saṃśayāvasara iti |
analyzed: evam katipaya kāryeṣu dṛṣṭa kartṛ apekṣeṣu api kārya tvasya dṛṣṭa kartṛ apekṣa adṛṣṭa kartṛ apekṣa sādhāraṇa tayā dṛśyamāne api aṅkura ādau kārye bhavet eva kartṛ apekṣāyām saṃśayaḥ iti yathā darśanam eva bhavati saṃśaya avasaraḥ iti
niranuyojya anuyoga lakṣaṇā iti
nigrahasthānena iti śeṣaḥ

original: saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatve paroktahetoḥ saddūṣaṇe'smābhirāpādite'saddoṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānamityasmān prati vadan vādī asatyapi nigrahasthāne nigrahasthānamudbhāvayan svavacanena svayameva niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānena gṛhīto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: saṃdigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tve para ukta hetoḥ sat dūṣaṇe smābhiḥ āpādite sat doṣa udbhāvanam nāma nigrahasthānam iti asmān prati vadan vādī asati api nigrahasthāne nigrahasthānam udbhāvayan sva vacanena svayam eva niranuyojyānuyoga lakṣaṇena nigrahasthānena gṛhītaḥ bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: “anigrahe nigrahasthānābhiyogo niranuyojyānuyogaḥ“ iti ca niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇam | (nyā. sū. a. 5 ā. 2 sū. 23 )
analyzed: anigrahe nigrahasthāna abhiyogaḥ niranuyojyānuyogaḥ iti ca niranuyojyānuyoga lakṣaṇam
para uktam īśvara anumānam prakāra antareṇa nirasyati kiñca iti
siddha sādhanam iti

original: asarvajñenaikena buddhimatā bahubhirvā taiḥ saṃbhūya kṛtatve'pi siṣādhayiṣitasaṃpattyā'rthāntaramiti yāvat |
analyzed: asarvajñena ekena buddhimatā bahubhiḥ vā taiḥ saṃbhūya kṛta tve pi siṣādhayiṣita saṃpattyā artha antaram iti yāvat
dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi pramāṇena iti

original: ghaṭādau kulālādyasarvajñakartṛkatayā prasiddhe nityasarvajñaikakartṛkatvasya pramāṇāgamyatvena dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatayā'naikāntyamiti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: ghaṭa ādau kulāla ādi asarvajña kartṛkatayā prasiddhe nitya sarvajña eka kartṛkatvasya pramāṇa agamya tvena dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tayā anaikāntyam iti bhāvaḥ
atha sāmānyena vyāptim ādāya iti
sarvajñatva ādi viśeṣaṇa aviśeṣita buddhimat mātra kartṛkatvena sāmānyena eva kāryatvasya vyāptiḥ
siddhi ati tu viśeṣaḥ sarvajña eka kartṛkatvam
katham kāryatvasya tṛṇa latā taru bhū bhūdhara ādi pakṣa dharma tā balāt

original: nahi sarvajñaikakartṛkatvaṃ vinā teṣāṃ kāryatopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: nahi sarvajña eka kartṛkatvam vinā teṣām kāryatā upapadyate iti bhāvaḥ
nirasyati tatra yuktam iti

original: vinā'pi kartuḥ sarvajñatvādiviśeṣaṃ kāryatvasya pakṣadharmatopapadyata eveti kathaṃ pakṣadharmatābalādviśeṣasiddhirityāśayenāha--yenetyādinā
analyzed: vinā api kartuḥ sarvajñatva ādi viśeṣam kāryatvasya pakṣa dharmatā upapadyate eva iti katham pakṣa dharmatā balāt viśeṣa siddhiḥ iti āśayena āha yena ityādinā
asarvajña tve pi iti
tṛṇādā api kartā ced kāryatvena siddhi ati

original: tena sarvajñena bhāvyamiti ko'yaṃ niyama iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tena sarvajñena bhāvyam iti kaḥ ayam niyamaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
eka tva siddhau hi iti

original: tṛṇatarulatābhūbhūdharādīnāṃ sarveṣāmeva kartācedekaḥ syāt tadā tena sarvajñena bhāvyam,
analyzed: tṛṇa taru latā bhū bhūdhara ādīnām sarveṣām eva kartā ced ekaḥ syāt tadā tena sarvajñena bhāvyam
na ca eṣa niyamaḥ

original: tattadupādānādyabhijñaistaistairbahubhiḥ saṃbhūya sarvamidaṃ kṛtamityapi vaktuṃ śakyeta hīti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tad tad upādāna ādi abhijñaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ bahubhiḥ saṃbhūya sarvam idam kṛtam iti api vaktum śakyeta hi iti bhāvaḥ
aneka kartṛkam kāryam nidarśayati yathā aneka kīṭikā śata iti
nitya eka sarvajñe buddhimati sādhyaḥ iti
nitya eka sarvajña kartṛkatve sādhye iti arthaḥ
nitya tā ca atra janma maraṇa rāhitya lakṣaṇā
viruddha tām upapādayati anitya aneka asarvajñena buddhimatā kārya svasya vyāpta tvāt iti
yatra kāryatvam tatra nitya eka sarvajña kartṛkatva abhāvaḥ
yathā ghaṭa ādi
ghaṭa ādīnām keṣāṃcid eka kartṛka tve pi nitya eka sarvajña kartṛka tvam
kulāla ādeḥ asarvajña tvāt janma maraṇa śāli tvāt ca
ratha gopura ādīnam tu kartāraḥ bahavaḥ
asarvajñāḥ anityāḥ ca
atas hetuḥ viruddhaḥ iti arthaḥ
upakrāntam upasaṃharati tasmāt sādhya sādhanayoḥ vyāptiḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi pramāṇena avaśyam darśayitavyā iti sthitam iti
na kevalam bhūyas darśana mātreṇa vyāptiḥ siddhi ati
pramāṇena tu sā dṛṣṭānte pradarśayitavyā

original: sādhyena saha hetoḥ pratibandhaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ kaścidapekṣyate sa ca tādātmyaṃ tadurpattirvā |
analyzed: sādhyena saha hetoḥ pratibandhaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ kaścid apekṣyate sa ca tādātmyam tad durpattiḥ vā

original: svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti tu na pramāṇasiddham |
analyzed: svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti tu na pramāṇa siddham

original: ataḥ kāryatvena karturanumānaṃ nopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: atas kārya tvena kartuḥ anumānam na upapadyate iti bhāvaḥ
nanu prayoga bhedāt sādharmyavat vaidharmyavat ca iti parārtha anumānasya dvaividhyam ucyate
sāmānya lakṣaṇam tu trirūpa liṅga ākhyānam parārtha anumānam iti
tatra sādharmyavatā tu anvaya mātram avagamyate
vaidharmyavatā tu vyatireka mātram avagamyate
atas na ekatra trirūpa pratipattiḥ
atas lakṣaṇam idam asaṃbhavi iti āśaṅkate nanu ityādinā
pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ ityādinā
anvayaḥ ced śabdena gamyate tatra vyatirekaḥ ūrthāt gamyate
vyatirekaḥ ced chadbataḥ gamyeta tatra anvayaḥ ūthataḥ gamyeta
tasmāt ubhayam api tri rūpa ākhyāyakam bhavati iti āha yasmāt sādharmyavatī ityādinā
ārthika tām upapādayati vyatireka agṛhītau iti
sāmarthyam iti
tat idam sāmarthyam iti arthaḥ

original: uktaṃ ca dharmakīrtinā--“sādharmyeṇāpi hi prayoge'rthāt vaidharmyagatiḥ,
analyzed: uktam ca dharmakīrtinā asādharmyeṇa api hi prayoga īrthāt vaidharmya gatiḥ
asati tasmin sādhyena hetoḥ anvaya abhāvāt

original: tathā vaidharmyeṇāpyanvayagatiḥ asati tasmin sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddheḥ“ iti | (nyā. bi. 109)
analyzed: tathā vaidharmyeṇa api anvaya gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhya abhāve hetu abhāvasya asiddheḥ iti

original: vyākhyātaṃ caitaddharmottarācāryeṇa--'nanu ca sādharmyavati vyatireko noktaḥ |
analyzed: vyākhyātam ca etat dharma uttara ācāryeṇa nanu ca sādharmyavati vyatirekaḥ na uktaḥ
vaidharmyavati ca anvayaḥ
tat katham etat tri rūpa liṅga ākhyānam ityādinā nyā bi ṭī
sādhya dharmiṇī eva iti
pakṣa ekadeśe eva iti arthaḥ
antar vyāpti pakṣe iti
vyāpti grahaṇāya pakṣāt anyasya anāśrayaṇāt antar vyāpti pakṣaḥ yam iti arthaḥ
pakṣa eka deśe eva vyāpti grahaṇam paraiḥ api iṣyate

original: teṣāṃ bahirvyāptipakṣo'bhimata iti vyāptigrahaṇāya pakṣādanyasyāśrayaṇād bahirvyāptipakṣa ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: teṣām bahis vyāpti pakṣaḥ abhimataḥ iti vyāpti grahaṇāya pakṣāt anyasya āśrayaṇāt bahis vyāpti pakṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
vyoma ādikam vimatam na sthiram
kintu kṣaṇikam sattvena iṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: yat sattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭa iti bhavati sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaprayoga iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: yat sat tat kṣaṇikam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti bhavati sādharmya dṛṣṭānta prayogaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
vyāpti grāhakam pramāṇam kim
āha prasaṅga prasaṅga viparyayābhyām iti
anupadam evā upapādayiṣyati svayam

original: tatra śiṃśapātvasya vṛkṣavyavahārayogyatve sādhye dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītavyeti |
analyzed: tatra śiṃśapā tvasya vṛkṣa vyavahāra yogya tve sādhye dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām vyāptiḥ grahītavyā iti

original: sādharmyadṛṣṭānte pratyakṣeṇānvayāvagamāt vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte'nupalambhena vyatirekāvagamācca pratyakṣeṇānupalbhena ca vyāptyavagama ityarthaḥ
analyzed: sādharmya dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣeṇa anvaya avagamāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntena anupalambhena vyatireka avagamāt ca pratyakṣeṇa anupalbhena ca vyāpti avagamaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yadvṛkṣavyavahārayogyatvaṃ yacca śiṃśupātvaṃ tadubhayamapi vṛkṣasya svabhāvaviśeṣa iti śiṃśupāntareṣu sādharmyadṛṣṭānteṣu pratyakṣeṇa tayoranvayāvadhāranāt
analyzed: yat vṛkṣa vyavahāra yogya tvam yat ca śiṃśupā tvam tat ubhayam api vṛkṣasya svabhāva viśeṣaḥ iti śiṃśupā antareṣu sādharmya dṛṣṭānteṣu pratyakṣeṇa tayoḥ anvaya avadhāranāt

original: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānteṣu vṛkṣādanyeṣu tayorvyatirekasyānupalanbhenāvadhāraṇāt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptyavadhāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: vaidharmya dṛṣṭānteṣu vṛkṣāt anyeṣu tayoḥ vyatirekasya anupalanbhena avadhāraṇāt pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām vyāpti avadhāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ
sattva kṣaṇikatvayoḥ iti
prasaṅga prasaṅga viparyayau uttaratra yat uktam prāk ityādinā nidarśana upanyāsa mukhena upapādayiṣyati
ayam āśayaḥ prasaṅgaḥ prasañjanam

original: yadi kṣāṇikatā na syāt tarhi sattvaṃ na syāt |
analyzed: yadi kṣāṇikatā na syāt tarhi sattvam na syāt
sattvam hi arthakriyā kāri tvam
sthira tvena abhimatasya tat na upapadyate iti

original: ghaṭādiṣu ca bhāveṣu arthakriyāsamartheṣu kṣaṇikatvameveti prasaṅgaviparyayo dṛṣṭaḥ |
analyzed: ghaṭa ādiṣu ca bhāveṣu arthakriyā samartheṣu kṣaṇika tvam eva iti prasaṅga viparyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tat idam para abhimata vyoma ādi nitya bhāva nirākaraṇa prakaraṇe śāntarakṣitā enā uktam

original: na bhavanti sthirā bhāvā nissattvāste tato matāḥ |'
analyzed: na bhavanti sthirāḥ bhāvāḥ nissattvāḥ te tatas matāḥ
iti tattvasam

original: vyākhyātaṃ ca kamalaśīlena--'kathaṃ punasya hetorvyāptiḥ siddhetyāha--kṣaṇikatvaviyogetvidyādi |
analyzed: vyākhyātam ca kamalaśīlena katham punasya hetoḥ vyāptiḥ siddhā iti āha kṣaṇika tva viyoge tu idyā ādi
iti tatvasam pañci

original: sthiratayā'bhimateṣu bhāveṣvarthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ nopapadyata ityetat 'tathāhī'tyādinā'sā ca sthireṣu bhāveṣu na ghaṭete'tyantena granthena vistaraśa upapāditam (tattvasaṃ. pañci. 144)
analyzed: sthira tayā abhimateṣu bhāveṣu arthakriyā sāmarthyam na upapadyate iti etat tathā hi ityādinā asā ca sthireṣu bhāveṣu na ghaṭeta iti antena granthena vistaraśaḥ upapāditam
sādhya viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇena vā iti

original: sarveṣāmeva ghaṭādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ sattvena kṣaṇikatve sādhye sādhyaviparyaye sthiratve yad bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ tena vipakṣe parābhimate vyomādau vastutvāvastutvābhyaṃ vikalpyamāne sati vyāptiravadhāryata ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: sarveṣām eva ghaṭa ādīnām bhāvānām sattvena kṣaṇika tve sādhye sādhya viparyaye sthira tve yat bādhakam pramāṇam krama yaugapadya nivṛtti lakṣaṇam tena vipakṣe para abhimate vyoma ādau vikalpyamāne sati vyāptiḥ avadhāryate iti arthaḥ

original: ayamāśayaḥ--sarvaṣāmeva bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatve sādhye sapakṣāsaṃbhavena yanna kṣaṇikaṃ tanna sat yathā parābhimataṃ vyomādīti vyatirekavyāptiravadhāryā
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ sarvaṣām eva bhāvānām kṣaṇika tve sādhye sapakṣa asaṃbhavena yat na kṣaṇikam tat na sat yathā para abhimatam vyoma ādi iti vyatireka vyāptiḥ avadhāryā

original: nanu satā kṣaṇikena bhāvyamiti ko'yaṃ niyamaḥ ? |
analyzed: nanu satā kṣaṇikena bhāvyam iti kaḥ ayam niyamaḥ

original: ghaṭādayaḥ santo'pyakṣaṇikā eva kiṃ na syuriti tu nāśaṅkanīyam |
analyzed: ghaṭa ādayaḥ santaḥ api akṣaṇikāḥ eva kim na syuḥ iti tu na āśaṅkanīyam
yat u evam sattvam api eṣām mā bhūt

original: nanu vyomādisthirabhāvamanaṅgīkurvatāṃ mate vyomādervipakṣasyāprasiddhervipakṣe dharmiṇīti kathamucyate |

iti udāhṛtam ca etat

original: pratyakṣaṃ cānupalambhaśca tayoḥ samāhāraḥ pratyakṣānupalambhaṃ tena |
analyzed: pratyakṣam ca anupalambhaḥ ca tayoḥ samāhāraḥ pratyakṣa anupalambham tena

ayam āśayaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhā grāhakau anvaya vyatirekau

vyatirekaḥ na upalambhena
dhūmaḥ sati vahnau upalabhyate iti etat pratyakṣam
asati na upalabhyate iti ayam anupalambhaḥ
ayam ca anupalambhaḥ prāk paścāt ca
utpatteḥ prāk kāraṇasya vahneḥ abhāvāt

evam pūrva apara kāla bhedāt anupalambha dvaividhyam
āhatya pratyakṣa anupalambha lakṣaṇa kāraṇa trikeṇa kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇa dvārā bhavati vyāpti avadharaṇam iti
yadā dhūmaḥ tadā vahniḥ

original: yadā na vahnistadā na dhūma' iti kālata upalambhānupalambhābhyāṃ traividhyamuktam |
analyzed: yadā na vahniḥ tadā na dhūmaḥ iti kālataḥ upalambha anupalambhābhyām traividhyam uktam

original: atha 'yatra dhūmastatra vahniryatra na vahnistatra na dhūmaḥ' iti deśata upalambhānupalambhābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ militāste trayaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇe kāraṇamiti bhavati kāraṇapañcakamityabhipretyāha--pañcavidhapratyakṣamupalambhato veti |
analyzed: atha yatra dhūmaḥ tatra vahniḥ yatra na vahniḥ tatra na dhūmaḥ iti deśataḥ upalambha anupalambhābhyām dvābhyām militāḥ te trayaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇe kāraṇam iti bhavati kāraṇa pañcakam iti abhipretya āha pañcavidha pratyakṣam upalambhataḥ vā iti

vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yam
ayam hetuḥ iti

original: sādhyasya sapakṣeṃiścayāt vipakṣe sādhanābhāvasya sato'pi sādhyābhāvaprayuktatvāniścayāt jīvaccharīre sātmakatvasādhanāya paraiḥ prayujyamānaḥ saprāṇatvaheturasādhāraṇa iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: sādhyasya sapakṣe niścayāt vipakṣe sādhana abhāvasya sataḥ api sādhya abhāva prayukta tva aniścayāt jīvat śarīre sātmaka tva sādhanāya paraiḥ prayujyamānaḥ sa prāṇa tva hetuḥ asādhāraṇaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
para matena āha aparaḥ ca asādhāraṇaḥ iti

ghaṭa vat ākāśa vat iti

original: yadanekagataṃ tadanekam anekavṛtti ca sāmānyam yat sat tat kṣaṇikam sacca vyometi vadadbhirasmābhiḥ sāmānyaṃ vyoma vā'bhyupagamya tatra darmaviśeṣasya sādhanāya neha vyāptiḥ pramāṇīkriyate,

original: tayoranabhyupagamāditi cet kimartho'yaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvopanyāsa iti bhāvaḥ |

original: iti paraṃ pratyaniṣṭe āpādayitavye'nekagatatvānekatvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāve aniṣṭāpādakāṃśe'nekānugataikasāmānyavādinaṃ prati pradarśite ekatvaṃ vā parityājyaṃ,

analyzed: yathā katipaya vahni dhūma vyaktīnām katipaya sthāneṣu yathā mahānase iti eka aṃśa bodhane sakala vahni dhūmayoḥ avinābhāvaḥ upapādyaḥ smāritaḥ bhavati tathā iti

original: tasmāt gāmānayeti śabdaṃ śṛṇvataḥ puruṣasya sapadi bhavatyapoḍhādhyavasāyaḥ,

original: ataḥ śabdānāmapoḍhe saṅketa iti susthitamiti bhāvaḥ |

adhyavasāyāt eva iti
apoha adhyavāsāyāt eva iti arthaḥ
śabdena bhavati adhyavasāyaḥ

bāhya artha pratipatti ādhāyaka apoha adhyavasāya prayojaka tā eva śabdasya bāhya artha vācaka tā iti yāvat

na pratyakṣeṇa iva sva lakṣaṇa parisphūrtti ādhānena iti arthaḥ
tatra kāraṇam āha pratyakṣa vat iti
atra āpta saṃvādam āha yat āha iti
avyāpṛta akṣasya śabdena śabda arthayoḥ vācya vācaka bhāva tattvam śāntarakṣitena nirūpitam
tatra ayam prathamaḥ śabdaiḥ apohaḥ pratipādyate
bāhya artha ādi avasāyinyāḥ buddheḥ śabdāt samudbhavāt
tad rūpa pratibimbasya dhiyaḥ śabdāt ca janmani
vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ yam jātaḥ hetu phala ātmakaḥ
iti tattvasam pa
vyākhyātam ca kamala śīlena prathamaḥ iti
yathā ukta artha pratibimba ātmā
yathā ukta arthaḥ ca paryudāsa ātmaka upohaḥ
tatra kāraṇam āha bāhya artha adhyavasāyinyā ityādi

original: ya eva hi śabde jñāne pratibhāsate sa eva śabdārtho yuktaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ eva hi śabde jñāne pratibhāsate saḥ eva śabda arthaḥ yuktaḥ
na ca atra prasajya pratiṣedha adhyavasāya usti
kim tarhi
bāhya artha adhyavasāyinī kevalam śābdī buddhiḥ upajāyate

original: tena tadevārthapratibimbakaṃ śābde jñāne sākṣāt tadātmatayā pratibhāsanācchābdo'rtho yukto nānya iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tena tat eva artha pratibimbakam śābde jñāne sākṣāt tad ātma tayā pratibhāsanāt śābdaḥ ūrthaḥ yuktaḥ na anyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: yaścāpi śabdasyārthena saha vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ prasiddho nāsau kāryakāraṇabhāvādanyo'tratiṣṭhate;
analyzed: yaḥ ca api śabdasya arthena saha vācya vācaka bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ prasiddhaḥ na asau kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt anyaḥ atra tiṣṭhate
api tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva ātmakaḥ eva iti darśayati tad rūpa pratibimbasya atyādi

original: tat adhyavasitabahirbhāvalakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya tattathoktam,
analyzed: tat adhyavasita bahirbhāva lakṣaṇam rūpam svabhāvaḥ yasya tat tathā uktam

original: tadrūpaṃ ca tat pratibimbaṃ ceti samāsaḥ |
analyzed: tad rūpam ca tat pratibimbam ca iti samāsaḥ

original: tasya tadrūpapratibambasya dhiyaḥ saṃbandhinaḥ śabdāt janmanyutpāde sati sa vācyavācakalakṣaṇo nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvātmaka eva jātaḥ
analyzed: tasya tad rūpa pratibambasya dhiyaḥ saṃbandhinaḥ śabdāt janmani utpāde sati sa vācya vācaka lakṣaṇaḥ nirūpyamāṇaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva ātmakaḥ eva jātaḥ
tathā hi śabdaḥ pratibimbasya janaka tvāt vācakaḥ ucyate
tat ca pratibimbam śabdena janyamāna tvāt vācyam
iti tattvasam pa
tattvataḥ sva lakṣaṇasya śabda vācya tve doṣam āha kiñca iti

original: idaṃ ca śabdaprāmāṇyamanabhyupagacchataḥ svasamayaniṣṭhān prati pratipādyate |
analyzed: idam ca śabda prāmāṇyam anabhyupagacchataḥ sva samaya niṣṭhān prati pratipādyate
ayam āśayaḥ yadi śabdasya tattvataḥ bāhya artha vācaka tā sākṣāt iṣyeta

original: tadā tasminnarthe śabdasya prāmāṇyāpātena śabdapramāṇato'vagatasyārthasya sattvaviniścayāt ' ayaṃ gaurastī' ti astipadaprayogo vyarthaḥ,
analyzed: tadā tasmin arthe śabdasya prāmāṇya āpātena śabda pramāṇataḥ uvagatasya arthasya sattva viniścayāt ayam gauḥ asti i ti asti pada prayogaḥ vyarthaḥ
na asti iti ca anupapannam iti
upasaṃharati tasmāt na sva lakṣaṇam iti

original: śabdaśravaṇasamantaraṃ yathāsaṅketaṃ samupajātāduktalakṣaṇādhyavasāyādbhavati bāhyārthāvabodhaḥ tasya sattā tu nāvagamyate,
analyzed: śabda śravaṇa samantaram yathāsaṅketam samupajātāt ukta lakṣaṇa adhyavasāyāt bhavati bāhya artha avabodhaḥ tasya sattā tu na avagamyate
atas tat avabhdhanāya asti iti
uktam artham śaṅkā tad parihāra mukhena viśadayati nanu iti
pratyakṣāt śābde vaiṣamyam āha pratyakṣyasya aniścaya ātmaka tvāt ityādinā
vikalpasya tu iti
pratyakṣam hi sva lakṣaṇa mātram gṛhṇāti
na ekam api vikalpam anyat tu vikalpa viśiṣṭam eva
atas eva pratyakṣāt anyat viniścaya ātmakam eva iti
śabdasya ced bāhya arthe sākṣāt vācaka tā
tena tad artha avabodhaḥ viniścaya ātmakaḥ eva syāt

original: tathā ca svalakṣāṇasya tadarthasya sattā tenaivāvadhṛteti na tadavabodhanāya astītipadāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tathā ca sva lakṣāṇasya tad arthasya sattā tena eva avadhṛtā iti na tad avabodhanāya asti iti pada apekṣā iti bhāvaḥ
na kiñcid pramāṇam upalabhāmaha eti
pramāṇa asaṃbhavam eva upapādayati tathā hi ityādi nā

original: yā vyaktiryenendriyeṇa gṛhyate tanniṣṭhā jātirapi tenaivendriyeṇa gṛhyata ityeṣa pareṣāṃ svagoṣṭhīniṣṭhaḥ samayaḥ kevalam,
analyzed: yā vyaktiḥ yena indriyeṇa gṛhyate tad niṣṭhā jātiḥ api tena eva indriyeṇa gṛhyate iti eṣa pareṣām sva goṣṭhī niṣṭhaḥ samayaḥ kevalam
na hi unmīlita nayanam paśyataḥ api puṃsaḥ nīla ādi varṇāt sāsnā lāṅgūla ādi sanniveśa viśeṣa lakṣaṇa ākṛteḥ ca anyat nayana pathā ivatarati

original: tat sāmānye na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tat sāmānye na pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu mā bhūt sāmānye pratyakṣam

original: athāpi gamekāṃ purataḥ paśyato'nubhūtānekagovyakteḥ puṃso bhavati kaścidekākāraparāmarśalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayaḥ,
analyzed: athā api gam ekām puratas paśyataḥ anubhūta aneka go vyakteḥ puṃsaḥ bhavati kaścid eka ākāra parāmarśa lakṣaṇaḥ pratyayaḥ
tatra ca ālambanam kim api nimittam kalpanīyam

original: anyathā tadanupapattestadeva ca sāmānyamityāśayena pareṇa kriyamānāmāśaṅkāmanūdya nirasyati--naceti |
analyzed: anyathā tad anupapatteḥ tat eva ca sāmānyam iti āśayena pareṇa kriyamānām āśaṅkām anūdya nirasyati na ca iti
vyaktibhyaḥ eva sva hetu datta śaktibhyaḥ iti

original: gavādivyaktayaḥ svahetubhyo jāyamānāṃ śaktiviśeṣaviśiṣṭā eva jāyante,
analyzed: gavā ādi vyaktayaḥ sva hetubhyaḥ jāyamānām śakti viśeṣa viśiṣṭāḥ eva jāyante

original: yayā mitho bhinnā api gośabdābhilapyāḥ kāścideva vyaktayo gaurityekākāraparāmarśe hetavo bhavanti,
analyzed: yayā mithas bhinnāḥ api go śabda abhilapyāḥ kāścid eva vyaktayaḥ gauḥ iti eka ākāra parāmarśe hetavaḥ bhavanti
tasmāt na eka ākāra parāmarśa pratyaya upapattaye sāmānyam ālambana antaram kalpanīyam iti bhāvaḥ
bhinnānām api satām katham eka ākāra parāmarśa prati ahetu tvam iti atra āha bhede pi ityādi
atra āpta saṃvādam āha bhede pi niyatāḥ kecid iti
indriya ādi vat iti

original: indriyatvāviśeṣe'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnāṃ rupagrahaṇasāmarthyaṃ kāsāñcideva rasagranaḥasāmarthyamiti yathā niyataṃ tathetyarthaḥ |
analyzed: indriya tva aviśeṣe api kāsāñcid eva vyaktīnām rupa grahaṇa sāmarthyam kāsāñcid eva rasa granaḥ asāmarthyam iti yathā niyatam tathā iti arthaḥ
ādi śabdāt harītakī ādayaḥ gṛhyante
nanu sati api sāmānya āśrayaṇasya āvaśyaka tve kim sāmānyena
vyaktibhiḥ eva alam

original: tāsāmeṣa svabhāvaviśeṣo yadekākārapratyavamarśahetutvamiti svabhāvāśrayaṇetottaraṃ pramāṇikavastvapalāpāyaivetyāśaṅkāṃ parihannāha-- kiñceti
analyzed: tāsām eṣa svabhāva viśeṣaḥ yat eka ākāra pratyavamarśa hetutvam iti svabhāva āśrayaṇa itas uttaram pramāṇika vastu apalāpāya eva iti āśaṅkām parihannāha kiñca iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ--dravyādibhyo vyāvṛttaṃ bhinnaṃ sāmānyamatiriktaḥ padārthaṃ iti vadatāṃ mate jātivyaktyoratyantabhedo bhavatyabhimataḥ,
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ dravya ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttam bhinnam sāmānyam atiriktaḥ padārtham iti vadatām mate jāti vyaktyoḥ atyanta bhedaḥ bhavati abhimataḥ
go tva aśva tva ādi tu sutarām bhinnam

original: evaṃ bhedāviśeṣe'pi gotvaṃ govyaktiṣveva samavaiti nānyatra,
analyzed: evam bheda aviśeṣe pi go tvam go vyaktiṣu eva samavaiti na anyatra

original: aśvatvamaśvavyaktiṣveva samavaiti nānyatretyatra kiṃ niyāmakamiti śaṅkāyāṃ svabhāva evaiṣa gotvādīnāṃ,
analyzed: aśva tvam aśva vyaktiṣu eva samavaiti na anyatra iti atra kim niyāmakam iti śaṅkāyām svabhāvaḥ eva eṣa go tva ādīnām
yat na anyatra samavaiti iti svabhāva āśrayaṇena eva uttaram taiḥ api deyam
tat asmān prati kaḥ yam ākṣepaḥ svabhāva āśrayaṇena uttaram asaṃgatam iti

original: asmābhiḥ pratipādyamānaṃ svabhāvāśraṇenottaraṃ prāmāṇikaṃ paraiḥ pratipādyamānaṃ tvaprāmāṇikamityeṣa viśeṣa iti |
analyzed: asmābhiḥ pratipādyamānam svabhāva āśraṇena uttaram prāmāṇikam paraiḥ pratipādyamānam tu aprāmāṇikam iti eṣa viśeṣaḥ iti
sāmānya sādhaka tayā paraiḥ āśritam anumānam dūṣayan āha tathā idam aparam ityādinā
atra ucyate iti
sādhyam vikalpya dūṣayati viśiṣṭa vuddheḥ ityādinā
bhinna viśeṣaṇa iti

original: viśeṣyāt bhinnaṃ yadviśeṣaṇam--viśiṣṭabuddhau viśeṣyatayā bhāsamānasya yadviśeṣaṇatayā bhāsate viśeṣyato bhinnaṃ,
analyzed: viśeṣyāt bhinnam yat viśeṣaṇam viśiṣṭa buddhau viśeṣya tayā bhāsamānasya yat viśeṣaṇa tayā bhāsate viśeṣyataḥ bhinnam
tad grahaṇa nāntarīyaka tvam iti arthaḥ
prathama vikalpe dūṣaṇam āha vastu grāhiṇi pratyakṣe ubhaya pratibhāsa abhāvāt iti
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya ubhaya pratibhāsa abhāvāt iti arthaḥ

original: gauriti yadvastupratyakṣaṃ tat piṇḍaṃ tato bhinnaṃ gotvaṃ sāmānyaṃ cobhayamavabhāsayatītyetat sarvānubhavaviruddham,
analyzed: gauḥ iti yat vastu pratyakṣam tat piṇḍam tatas bhinnam go tvam sāmānyam ca ubhayam avabhāsayati iti etat sarva anubhava viruddham

original: puraḥsthitaṃ paśyato hi sphurati vastumātramiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: puras sthitam paśyataḥ hi sphurati vastu mātram iti bhāvaḥ
dūṣaṇa antaram āha viśiṣṭa buddhi tvam ca iti
anekāntika tām upapādayati bhinna viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam antareṇa api iti
yathā svarūpavān ghaṭaḥ iti
ghaṭasya svarūpam hi ghaṭāt na atiricyate
go tvam sāmānyam iti vā iti
na sāmānyam go tvāt anyat

original: gotve sāmānyatvamiti ca na gotvato bhinnaṃ,
analyzed: go tve sāmānya tvam iti ca na go tvataḥ bhinnam
tad svarūpam eva tu tat
dvitīya vikalpe dūṣaṇam āha dvitīya ityādinā
siddhasādhanam upapādayati svarūpavān ghaṭaḥ ityādi vat iti

original: ayaṃ gauriti pratyakṣe vastuto vastumātragrāhiṇyapi svarūpavān ghaṭa ityatra kalpitabhedamādāya viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvopapattivat piṇḍādananyatve'pi gotvasya kalpitabhedamādāya viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvopapattyā arthāntaraprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: ayam gauḥ iti pratyakṣe vastutas vastu mātra grāhiṇī api svarūpavān ghaṭaḥ iti atra kalpita bhedam ādāya viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāva upapatti vat piṇḍāt ananyatve pi gotvasya kalpita bhedam ādāya viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāva upapattyā artha antara prasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
gauḥ ayam iti anugata vyavahāraḥ tu a go vyāvṛttim eva avalambate
sā ca vyāvṛttiḥ vyāvarttyāt na atiricyate iti āha ago vyāvṛtti anubhava bhāvi tvāt iti

original: evaṃ sāmānyasādhakatayā parābhimataṃ prayogaṃ nirasya sāmānyanirāsakaṃ prayogaṃ pradarśayati--sāmānyasya niṣedhāyetyādinā--yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate iti |
analyzed: evam sāmānya sādhaka tayā para abhimatam prayogam nirasya sāmānya nirāsakam prayogam pradarśayati sāmānyasya niṣedhāya ityādinā yat yatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sat na upalabhyate iti
upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptatve sati api anupalabhyamāna tvam hetuḥ
hetoḥ asiddhi śaṅkām nivārayati na ca asiddhi saṃbhāvanā iti
varṇa saṃsthāna sahitam iti

original: satyapīndriyasaṃprayogādāvupalambhakasamavāye upalabhyamāne ca vyaktiviśeṣe tatra gotvaṃ vipratipannaṃ naivopalabhyate,
analyzed: sati api indriya saṃprayoga ādau upalambhaka samavāye upalabhyamāne ca vyakti viśeṣe tatra go tvam vipratipannam na eva upalabhyate
upalabhyamānam vyakteḥ svarūpam tu varṇa saṃsthāna ātmakam

original: na tato'nyā gotvajātirupalabhyate iti nāsiddho heturiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: na tatonyā go tva jātiḥ upalabhyate iti na asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu darśanāgocarasyāpi jñānasyeva cākṣuṣopalambhāgocarasyāpi sāmānyasya nāsadbhāva ityāśaṅkāmanūdya pariharati--nāpītyādinā |
analyzed: nanu darśana agocarasya api jñānasya iva cākṣuṣa upalambha agocarasya api sāmānyasya na asadbhāvaḥ iti āśaṅkām anūdya pariharati nā api ityādinā
upakrāntam sāmānya nirasanam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
nā api iti prasakta anuprasaktyā prāptaḥ ayam vicāraḥ
hetu doṣa nirūpaṇa prakaraṇe siddhi nirūpaṇa avasare sāmānya vicāraḥ prasaṅgataḥ prāptaḥ

original: sa ca prāsaṅgiko vicāraḥ 'tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu paraparikalpitasāmānyena śūnya' miti samupasaṃhṛtaḥ |
analyzed: sa ca prāsaṅgikaḥ vicāraḥ tasmāt sarvam saṃskṛtam vastu para parikalpita sāmānyena śūnya miti samupasaṃhṛtaḥ

original: yathā saṃskṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vastu niḥsāmānyakaṃ tathā na kenāpyuparacitamiti prasaktamanuprasaktametat |
analyzed: yathā saṃskṛtam sarvam vastu niḥsāmānyakam tathā na kena api uparacitam iti prasaktam anuprasaktam etat

original: nanu śākhācaṅkramaṇaṃ yat saṃskṛtavastunirdeśamanupravṛttirasmin vicāra iti |
analyzed: nanu śākhā caṅkramaṇam yat saṃskṛta vastu nirdeśam anupravṛttiḥ asmin vicāre iti
na etat

original: ' yadi nityaḥ kartā jagato na kāraṇaṃ kimasya tarhi kāraṇam,
analyzed: yadi nityaḥ kartā jagataḥ na kāraṇam kim asya tarhi kāraṇam

original: sattvānāṃ śubhāśubhākhyaṃ karma' ityādinā pramāṇanirūpaṇāt prameyanirūpaṇe'vatarato dvārametat |
analyzed: sattvānām śubha aśubha ākhyam karma ityādinā pramāṇa nirūpaṇāt prameya nirūpaṇā iva tarataḥ dvāram etat

original: etena pūrvameveśvaro jagataḥ kartā nirasta iti punaruktametaditi śaṅkā parihṛtā,
analyzed: etena pūrvam eva īśvaraḥ jagataḥ kartā nirastaḥ iti punar uktam etat iti śaṅkā parihṛtā
prakara antareṇa tad niṣedhaḥ utra pravartate iti

original: tatreśvarasādhakatayā paropanyastasya prayogasya nirasanamiha tu tasya sargādikartṛtvānupapattiriti nirasanaprakārabhedaḥ |
analyzed: tatra īśvara sādhaka tayā para upanyastasya prayogasya nirasanam iha tu tasya sarga ādi kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ iti nirasana prakāra bhedaḥ
tatra tāvat na nityaḥ yuktaḥ iti
nityaḥ janana maraṇa śūnyaḥ
asamarthaḥ
atha api kartā iti vyāhatam
atha samarthaḥ nityaḥ ca

original: tadā tvayaṃ doṣa ityāha--nityeṃ kartari samarthe satīti |
analyzed: tadā tu ayam doṣaḥ iti āha nitye kartari samarthe sati iti
tat asya svarūpam pralaya kāla ipi iti
nahi nityasya svarūpam kāla bhedāt bhidyeta
yadi bhidyeta
tarhi anitya tā eva āpatet iti bhāvaḥ
sarga ādīnām ayaugapadyasya saha kārya samavadhāna mūlaka tām āśaṅkya nirasyati
sahakāri virahāt ityādinā
anityasya sahakāriṇaḥ api tad āyatta tvāt iti

original: kāryamātraṃ prati tasya kāraṇatvena sahakāriṇo janayanneṣa nityaḥ samarthaḥ kuto yugapanna janayatītīyamāśaṅkā tatrāpi tulyaiveti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: kārya mātram prati tasya kāraṇa tvena sahakāriṇaḥ janayan eṣa nityaḥ samarthaḥ kutas yugapad na janayati iti iyam āśaṅkā tatra api tulyā evā iti bhāvaḥ
nanu satyam eṣa samarthaḥ nityaḥ ca
param īśvaraḥ yam

original: satyāmicchāyāṃ kuryāt na cenna kuryāditi na sarvakāryayaugapadyaprasaṅga ityāśayena śaṅkate--buddhimatvādīśvarasyeti |
analyzed: satyām icchāyām kuryāt na ced na kuryāt iti na sarva kārya yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ iti āśayena śaṅkate buddhimatvāt īśvarasya iti
adhiṣṭhātṛ nirapekṣa pradhāna kāraṇa vāde sā iyam āśaṅkā avataret
jaḍa tvāt tasya

original: cetanaṃ kāraṇamabhyupagacchato'smān prati tu nāsyāḥ śaṅkāyā avasara iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: cetanam kāraṇam abhyupagacchataḥ usmān prati tu na asyāḥ śaṅkāyāḥ avasaraḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: icchānāṃ vā kuto na yaugapadyamityāśayenāha -- tā apīti |
analyzed: icchānām vā kutas na yaugapadyam iti āśayena āha tāḥ api iti
sahakāri lakṣāṇayā āgantuka śaktayā iti
ayam āśayaḥ satyam sahakāriṇyaḥ api etad āyattāḥ

original: śaktasyāsyāsya śaktiviśeṣarūpāstāḥ ayaṃ ca nityaḥ samarthaśca sarvakāryorpādane,
analyzed: śaktasya asya asya śakti viśeṣa rūpāḥ tāḥ ayam ca nityaḥ samarthaḥ ca sarva kāryoḥ pādane

original: athāpi tāḥ sahakārilakṣaṇāḥ śaktayastvāgantukyaḥ ataḥ sargādīnāṃ na yaugapadyaprasaṅgaṃ iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: atha api tāḥ sahakāri lakṣaṇāḥ śaktayaḥ tu āgantukyaḥ atas sarga ādīnām na yaugapadya prasaṅgam iti bhāvaḥ
sa ca nityaḥ
sāmarthyam ca asya avyāhatam
sahakāri sarvam tad adhīnam

original: athāpi te sahakāriṇaḥ kādācitkā ityatat vyāhataṃ vaca ityāśayenāha--tarhi mātā'pi satīti |
analyzed: atha api te sahakāriṇaḥ kādācitkāḥ iti atat vyāhatam vacaḥ iti āśayena āha tarhi mātā api satī iti
yat kiñcid etat asāram iti arthaḥ

original: kāryasya svabhāvaviśeṣamavalambhya pratyavatiṣṭhate--nanveṣa eva kāryasya svabhāva iti |
analyzed: kāryasya svabhāva viśeṣam avalambhya pratyavatiṣṭhate nanu eṣaḥ eva kāryasya svabhāvaḥ iti
nirasyati tat na iti
samarḥ ced kasmāt na sva kāryam sādhayati

original: yadi na sādhayedasamrtha eva sa iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: yadi na sādhayet asamrthaḥ eva saḥ iti bhāvaḥ
dūṣaṇa antaram āha na api iti

original: sraṣṭā'yaṃ kramāt bhāvān sṛjatīti hi bhavān manyate |
analyzed: sraṣṭā ayam kramāt bhāvān sṛjati iti hi bhavān manyate
samarthasya nityasya kramāt kārya ādhānam iti anupapannam
nairapekṣyāt samartha tvāt ca kartuḥ iti bhāvaḥ
atra āpta saṃvādam āha yat āha iti
kālayoḥ kārya niṣpādana kāle
a tad kāla iciti arthaḥ

original: sadṛśātmanaḥ--samarthasya nityasya svarūpaṃ hi na viparivartate jātu,
analyzed: sadṛśa ātmanaḥ samarthasya nityasya sva rūpam hi na viparivartate jātu
tathā asati anitya tā āpatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
etena iti nityānām nitya tayā abhimatānām jīvātmanām
akṣaṇikānām akṣaṇika tayā abhimatānām ghaṭa ādīnām ca

original: yadidaṃ kramāt kāryādhānaṃ dṛśyate tat sthira tayā'bhimate kasmiṃścadapi na ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: yat idam kramāt kārya ādhānam dṛśyate tat sthira tayā abhimate kasmiṃścana api na ghaṭate iti bhāvaḥ
uktam ca śāntarakṣitena
kāryāṇi hi vilambante kāraṇa asannidhānataḥ
samartha hetu sadbhāve kṣepaḥ teṣām hi kiṃkṛtaḥ
iti tattva pa
ataeva kārya kriyā samarthānām sarveṣām kṣaṇika tā evā iti susthitam
nanu sarvasya kṣaṇika tā iti pratyakṣa viruddham

original: pratyakṣeṇākṣaṇikataiva hi gamyata ityāśaṅkate--nacātra pratyakṣavirodha iti |
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa akṣaṇika tā eva hi gamyate iti āśaṅkate na ca atra pratyakṣa virodhaḥ iti
atra pratividhante pratyakṣeṇa ityādinā
akṣaṇikasya iti
akṣaṇika tvasya iti yāvat
nahi iti
ayam āśayaḥ pratyakṣam hi sākṣātkāraḥ
sa ca kṣaṇikaḥ

original: yadā svayamudbhavati tadā vartamānaṃ vastumātraṃ gṛhṇāti,
analyzed: yadā svayam udbhavati tadā vartamānam vastu mātram gṛhṇāti
na tasya pūrva apara kṣaṇa yogam ca

original: svayaṃ ca kṣaṇāntare vinaśyan anekakṣaṇayogamekasya gṛhītuṃ na kalpante iti |
analyzed: svayam ca kṣaṇa antare vinaśyan aneka kṣaṇa yogam ekasya gṛhītum na kalpante iti

original: pūrvāparakṣaṇayośca na vartamāne sākṣātkārakāle prakāśo ghaṭeta,
analyzed: pūrva apara kṣaṇayoḥ ca na vartamāne sākṣātkāra kāle prakāśaḥ ghaṭeta
tathā asati tayoḥ api kālayoḥ vartamāna tā āpatteḥ iti āha na hi prāk ūrdhvam iti

original: yadi punaḥ pratyakṣakāle pūrvāparakṣaṇayogasyāpi prakāśa iṣyeta,
analyzed: yadi punar pratyakṣa kāle pūrva apara kṣaṇa yogasya api prakāśaḥ iṣyeta

original: tarhi sākṣātkriyamāṇasya vastunastadaivājanmata āvināśamanuvartamānaḥ kālānvayo'pi prakāśeta,
analyzed: tarhi sākṣātkriyamāṇasya vastunaḥ tadā eva ājanmataḥ ā vināśam anuvartamānaḥ kāla anvayaḥ upi prakāśeta

original: tathāsatyutpannasya vastuno vināśāvadhirapi bhavatāṃ mate vijñāta eva bhavedityāśayenāha--janmavināśāvadhīti |
analyzed: tathā asati utpannasya vastunaḥ vināśa avadhiḥ api bhavatām mate vijñātaḥ eva bhavet iti āśayena āha janma vināśa avadhi iti
nanu pratyabhijñā pratyakṣam kāla dvaya saṃbandham gṛhṇāti iti atra āha etena iti
etena iti anena abhipretam pratyabhijñāyāḥ apratyakṣa tvam upapādayati sākṣātkāri hi jñānam ityādinā
sākṣāt kartavyam
sākṣātkartum kṣamam iti yāvat
na ca smaraṇam pratyakṣam iti
smaraṇam pratyakṣa ātmakam na bhavati iti arthaḥ
atra kumārila matam nirasyan tad matena ākṣipati atha iti
idānīntanam avasthānam na sākṣātkuryāt iti
ayam iti tu bhavati idānīntanasya grahaṇam
tat ca akṣasa apekṣam
tat aindrikasya asya pratyakṣa tā avyāhatā eva iti
pratyakṣa viruddhā ca kṣaṇika tā iti bhāvaḥ
tasya kārikām anuvadati yat āha ityādinā
atirekiṇī iti
smṛtitaḥ bhinnā
sākṣātkara pramā iti arthaḥ

original: tadetat kumāriloktaṃ pratikṣipati--smaraṇagrahaṇarūpaṃ tarhi pratyabhijñānaṃ syāditi |
analyzed: tat etat kumārila uktam pratikṣipati smaraṇa grahaṇa rūpam tarhi pratyabhijñānam syāt iti
nanu nā iyam pratyabhijā smṛteḥ atiricyate
ayam iti vat saḥ iti avi grahaṇāt
smaryamāṇe ca tad avasthā īkṣā yogāt na sākṣātkāra rūpa tā
gṛhyamāṇe ca idam avasthe na smaraṇa ātma tā
tasmāt smaraṇa grahaṇa ubhaya ātma tā eva prasajet
na tu smṛti vyatirikta sākṣātkāri pramā ātma tā
ubhaya rūpa tā ca eka jñānasya na ghaṭeta iti bhāvaḥ
nanu ekam eva anyena rūpeṇa smaryate
anyena rūpeṇa tu gṛhyate
prādhānyam tu gṛhyamāṇa rūpataḥ
saṃskāra sāpekṣa tā tu gṛhyamāṇasya upalakṣaṇa aṃśe

original: ataḥ purasthitavastugrahaṇarūpaiveyaṃ pratyabhijñetyāśayena parasya pratyavasthānamanūdya nirasyati -- yena hītyādinā |
analyzed: atas pura sthita vastu grahaṇa rūpā eva iyam pratyabhijñā iti āśayena parasya pratyavasthānam anūdya nirasyati yena hi ityādinā
an unmattena na śakyate vaktum iti

original: ekaṃ vastu rūpe ca bhinne dve iti vadannunmatta eva syāt,
analyzed: ekam vastu rūpe ca bhinne dve iti vadan unmattaḥ eva syāt
rūpa bhedaḥ hi sva rūpa bhedāt ananyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
bhāve api iti ekasya smaraṇa grahaṇa bhāva abhyupagame api iti arthaḥ
pratyakṣa apratyakṣa tvam syāt iti
ekasya eva jñānasya aṃśataḥ pratyakṣa tvam aṃśatas upratyakṣa tvam ca āpatet
na tu pratyakṣa tā eva iti arthaḥ
tasmāt pratyabhijñā pratyayaḥ bhrāntaḥ eva nirviṣaya tvāt iti
nirviṣaya tva atyathā avasthita vastu aviṣaya tvāt iti arthaḥ
āha ca śāntarakṣitaḥ
nanu ca pratyabhijñānam saḥ eva iti upajāyate
akṣa vyāpāra sadbhāve niṣprakampam abādhitam
tatas pratyakṣa bādheyam durvārā sarva hetuṣu
kṣaṇa bhaṅga prasiddhi artham upātteṣu na yujyate
na khalu pratyabhijñānam pratyakṣam upapadyate
vastu rūpam anirdaśyam sa abhilāpam ca tat yatas
bhrāntam ca pratyabhijñānam pratyekam tad vilakṣaṇam
abheda adhyavasāyena bhinna rūpe api vṛttitaḥ
iti tattva pa
pratyabhijñāyāḥ bhrama tve prayogam āha prayogaḥ ca evam iti
sa tattvataḥ na eka ālambanaḥ iti
tattvataḥ na abhinna ālambanaḥ
adhyasta abheda ālaṃbanaḥ iti yāvat
viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ iti
viruddha vyāpta upalabdhim upapādayati ekatva anekatvayoḥ igyādinā
ekatva anekatvayoḥ bheda abhedayoḥ
viṣaya virodhāt viṣayiṇoḥ api upalambhayoḥ virodhaḥ iti āha tad viṣayayoḥ api iti
na pratyabhijñānam kṣaṇika anumāne bādhakam iti
bhrānti tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
viruddha vyaptiḥ na asti iti āśaṅkatena ca iti
atas eva iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ -- nanu viruddho'yaṃ hetuḥ--pratyabhijñā hi deśāre kālātare vā'nubhūtasya taddeśakālayogaṃ tadevedaṃ nīlamiti gamayati,
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ nanu viruddhaḥ ayam hetuḥ pratyabhijñā hi deśa are kāla atare vā anubhūtasya tad deśa kāla yogam tat eva idam nīlam iti gamayati
autsargikam etat
lūna punarjāta ādiṣu ca sāmānya aikyam
tat evam pratyabhijñā tvam viruddham
vahneḥ iva jalam
virodhāt eva ca anaikāntika tā api iti ced na
sthirasya krameṇa akrameṇa vā kriyā kāri tvam anupapannam iti asakṛt uktam eva

original: tat pratyabhijñānasyaikālambanatvaṃ naivopapadyate iti na viruddhatvamanaikāntikatā veti |
analyzed: tat pratyabhijñānasya eka ālambana tvam na eva upapadyate iti na viruddha tvam anaikāntika tā vā iti
nanu pratyabhijñānam eva svarasataḥ vastu aikvam avagamayati

original: tasyaikālambanatvaṃ kiṃ yuktaṃ na vetyetadevādya vicāryata iti pratyabhijñānato vastvaikyopapādanamanupapannamipyāha--naca pratyabhijñānameveti
analyzed: tasya eka ālambana tvam kim yuktam na vā iti etat eva adya vicāryate iti pratyabhijñānataḥ vastu aikya upapādanam anupapannam ipya āha na ca pratyabhijñānam eva iti
jagataḥ buddhimat viracita tva asaṃbhavam upakrāntam upasaṃharati tasmāt sthitam etat iti
sattva lokam iti
sattva ani prāṇinaḥ
tad lakṣāṇaḥ lokaḥ sattva lokaḥ

original: bhājana lokaḥ--sattvānāṃ prāṇināṃ bhājanabhūtaḥ-- āśrayabhūto loko bhājanalokaḥ,
analyzed: bhājana lokaḥ sattvānām prāṇinām bhājana bhūtaḥ āśraya bhūtaḥ lokaḥ bhājana lokaḥ
tat imam ati vicitram cittam eva racayati cittam buddhiḥ jñānam iti paryāyāḥ

original: cittamevabāhyātmanā bhāsata iti cittavilāsa eva sarmaviti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: cittam eva bāhya ātmanā bhāsate iti citta vilāsaḥ eva bhāvaḥ
karma jam hi jagat uktam aśeṣam

original: karma cittamavadhūya na cānyat--dvividhaṃ satyaṃ--pāramārthikasatyaṃ sāṃvṛtika satyaṃ ceti |
analyzed: karma cittam avadhūya na ca anyat dvividham satyam pāramārthika satyam sāṃvṛtika satyam ca iti

original: tatra pāramārthikadṛṣtayā tu cittameva sarvasya mūlam sāṃvṛtidṛṣṭayā tu aśeṣaṃ jagat sattvānāṃ karmaṇā jātam |
analyzed: tatra pāramārthika dṛṣtayā tu cittam eva sarvasya mūlam sāṃvṛti dṛṣṭayā tu aśeṣam jagat sattvānām karmaṇā jātam

original: tadevaṃ karma cittaṃ cetyubhayaṃ vinā jagato na kiñcinmūlamiti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tat evam karma cittam ca iti ubhayam vinā jagataḥ na kiñcid mūlam iti bhāvaḥ

original: vaibhāṣikādyavāntarabhedo hi bhagavataḥ paścāttanaḥ yadvacanamāśritya vaibhāṣikāḥ pravartante iti yāvat |
analyzed: vaibhāṣika ādi avāntarabhedaḥ hi bhagavataḥ paścāttanaḥ yat vacanam āśritya vaibhāṣikāḥ pravartante iti yāvat
atha sarvajñām sādhayan parasya āśaṅkām anuvadati nanu iti
kim pramāṇam pramāṇam na asti iti arthaḥ

original: asti pramāṇamanumānamityabhiprāyeṇāha--ucyate iti catvāryāsatyāni teṣāṃ sākṣātkāro yasya bhavati sa sarvajñaḥ,
analyzed: asti pramāṇam anumānam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha ucyate iti catvāri āsatyāni teṣām sākṣātkāraḥ yasya bhavati sa sarvajñaḥ

original: sākṣātkāraśca sphuṭāvabhāsa ityabhiprāyeṇa teṣāṃ sphuṭāvabhāse prayogaṃ darśayati--yo ya ityādinā |
analyzed: sākṣātkāraḥ ca sphuṭa avabhāsaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa teṣām sphuṭa avabhāse prayogam darśayati yaḥ yaḥ ityādinā
vyāpti avabodhakam prathamam vākyam
dvitīyam ca pakṣa dharmatā avabodhakam
tatra sādara nirantara dīrgha kāla abhyāsa sahita cetaḥ guṇa tā hetuḥ
sphuṭi bhāva yogya tā sādhyam
udāharaṇam kāminī ākāraḥ kāmuka citta gataḥ
catur ārya satya viṣaya ākārāḥ bodhi citta gatāḥ pakṣaḥ

original: svabhāvahetunā'nena caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ sphuṭībhāvayogyatve siddhe sphuṭāvabāṣāsaṃbhavanirasanamukhena sarvajñāsiddhirnirastā bhavati |
analyzed: svabhāva hetunā anena caturṇām ārya satyānām sphuṭībhāva yogya tve siddhe sphuṭa avabāṣa asaṃbhava nirasana mukhena sarvajña asiddhiḥ nirastā bhavati
idam atra bodhyam

original: sarvajñe pramāṇaṃ neti vadato'yamāśayaḥ--na tasmin pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
analyzed: sarvajñe pramāṇam na iti vadataḥ yam āśayaḥ na tasmin pratyakṣam pramāṇam
na hi dṛśyate kaścid sarva darśī
na api anumānam
dṛṣṭa sajāteyeṣu eva tad prasarāt
na ca śabdaḥ tad bodhake prāmāṇya saṃśayāt
sarvajña tā ca na ghaṭate
na hi atīndriyān arthān kaścid draṣṭum śaknoti
indriya āyatta prakāśāḥ hi arthaḥ

original: prajñāprakarṣe'pi nendriyārthayoḥ svabhāvaṃ samatilaṅghya kiñcit jñātuṃ śaknoti | uktaṃ ca --
analyzed: prajñā prakarṣe api na indriya arthayoḥ svabhāvam samatilaṅghya kiñcid jñātum śaknoti uktam ca
ye pi sa atiśayāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ prajñā megha abalaiḥ narāḥ
stoka stoka antara tvena na tu atīndriya darśanāt

original: prājño'pi hi naraḥ sūkṣmānarthān draṣṭuṃ kṣamo'pi san |
analyzed: prājñaḥ api hi naraḥ sūkṣmān arthān draṣṭum kṣamaḥ api san
sva jātīn an atikrāman atiśete parān narān
iti tattvasam pa
tasmāt abhyāsa atiśaye sati api niravadhau artha indriyayoḥ svabhāva atilaṅghanam durghaṭam eva
yat tu yoga abhyāsa balāt atīndriya artha darśanam ghaṭeta iti
tat api anupapannam

original: so'pi vicāryamāṇoṃavaratānudhyānalakṣaṇaḥ avicchinnasmṛtidhārārūpaḥ svayaṃ na sākṣātkārātmā,
analyzed: saḥ api avicchinna smṛti dhārā rūpaḥ svayam na sākṣātkāra ātmā
smṛtiḥ api anubhūta artha avalaṃbanī iti na yoga abhyāsataḥ upi atīndriya artha sākṣātkāri tā iti na sarvajñaḥ siddhyati iti
sarvajñam samarthayataḥ tu ayam āśayaḥ yāvat na bādhakam upalabhyate
tāvat na asti iti na niścīyeta
na haya dṛṣṭi mātreṇa arthasya asambhavaḥ

original: tat sarvajñe pratyakṣādipramāṇānupalambhamātreṇa kathaṃ tatpratiṣedhaḥ kartuṃ śakyeta,
analyzed: tat sarvajñe pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa anupalambha mātreṇa katham tad pratiṣedhaḥ kartum śakyeta
na ca svāpnikānām tad tad puruṣa mātra vedyānām aparaiḥ anupalabhyamānānām apalāpaḥ kartum śakyeta

original: yāvadbādhakaṃ nopalabhyate tāvat tatra saṃśayastu syādeva,
analyzed: yāvat bādhakam na upalabhyate tāvat tatra saṃśayaḥ tu syāt eva

original: evaṃ sati kathaṃ bhavān sugatasārvajñyaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ prabhavati |
analyzed: evam sati katham bhavān sugata sārvajñyam pratiṣeddhum prabhavati

original: nanu bādhakaṃ pradarśitam--'sarvajñatā ca na ghaṭate' ityādinā |
analyzed: nanu bādhakam pradarśitam sarvajña tā ca na ghaṭate ityādinā
atrā ucyate na kim api daurghaṭyam
yaḥ ca ayam svabhāva viśeṣaḥ indriya arthayoḥ cakṣuḥ rūpam eva gṛhṇīyāt

original: na śrotrādi śrotraṃ śabdameva gṛhṇīyānna rūpam,
analyzed: na śrotra ādi śrotram śabdam eva gṛhṇīyāt na rūpam

śabdaḥ śrotreṇa eva na itareṇa indriyeṇa iti
satyam
indriyeṇa ced gṛhyeta tadā tathā eva
cittena ced na ayam niyamaḥ

original: nanu mano nāmāntaramindriyaṃ bāhyendriya dvāreṇaivārthe pravartetetyanullaṅghanīyo niyamaḥ |

mā evam
na manaḥ nāma indriyam kiñcid ānantaram
manaḥ cittam buddhiḥ vijñānam iti anartha antaram
pratisattvam bhinnā citta dhārā anuvartate
ca rāga ādi vividha mala āvilā bhavati
āvidyam ca mala jālam āgantukam
