original: yathā yathā nairātmyabhāvanayā'pacīyante rāgādayo malāstathā tathā caturāryabhavanayā ca prakarṣaṃ gatayā pravardhate prajñā,
analyzed: yathā yathā nairātmya bhāvanayā apacīyante rāga ādayaḥ malāḥ tathā tathā catur ārya bhavanayā ca prakarṣam gatayā pravardhate prajñā
aneka bhava anusyūta sādara nirantara ārya satya bhāvanayā kāṣṭām gatayā yoga lakṣaṇayā bhavati caturṇām api ārya satyānām aparokṣam
yoga jam api hi pratyakṣam
sphuṭa avabhāsa tvāt
indriya artha svabhāva niyamaḥ tu aindriyake na aparokṣa mātre
catur ārya aparokṣeṇa bhavati sarvajñaḥ

original: sādaranirantarābhyāsāt prajñāprakarṣo bhatītyatra tu bhavatyayaṃ prayogaḥ--'yo yaḥ sādare' tyādi riti |
analyzed: sādara nirantara abhyāsāt prajñā prakarṣaḥ bhati iti atra tu bhavati ayam prayogaḥ yaḥ yaḥ sādare tyādi riti
yathā yuvatī ākāraḥ kāminaḥ puruṣasya iti
sphuṭa avabhāsa yogyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
kāmi cittam bhavati kāmyamāna ākāram
tasmāt kāmyamāna yuvati ākāraḥ cittasya guṇaḥ bhavati

original: so'yaṃ kāmicittaguṇabhūto yuvatyākāraḥ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitaḥ sphuṭībhāvayogyo bhavati (sphuṭāvabhāso bhavati)
analyzed: saḥ ayam kāmi citta guṇa bhūtaḥ yuvatī ākāraḥ sādara nirantara dīrgha kāla abhyāsa sahitaḥ sphuṭībhāva yogyaḥ bhavati sphuṭa avabhāsaḥ bhavati

original: tathā vivekinaścittaṃ vibhāvyamānacaturāryasatyākāraṃ bhavatīti so'yaṃ caturāryasatyākāraścetoguṇabhūtaḥ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsayogyo bhavati,
analyzed: tathā vivekinaḥ cittam vibhāvyamāna catur ārya satya ākāram bhavati iti sā uyam catur ārya satya ākāraḥ cetaḥ guṇa bhūtaḥ sādara nirantara dīrgha kāla abhyāsa sahitaḥ sphuṭa avabhāsa yogyaḥ bhavati
sphuṭa avabhāse ca tad aparokṣataḥ sarvajñaḥ bhavati iti
kāni catur ārya satyāni
duḥkham samudayaḥ nirodhaḥ mārgaḥ ca iti

original: rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandha iti tadetat skandhapañcakaṃ duḥkha mucyate |
analyzed: rūpa skandhaḥ vedanā skandhaḥ saṃjñā skandhaḥ saṃskāra skandhaḥ vijñāna skandhaḥ iti tat etat skandha pañcakam mucyate
yena asya skandha pañcakasya samudayaḥ saḥ ayam samudayaḥ
yaḥ nirodhaḥ duḥkhasya sa nirodhaḥ

original: nirodhasyāsya yat dvāraṃ sa mārga ucyate |
analyzed: nirodhasya asya yat dvāram sa mārgaḥ ucyate
hetoḥ dūṣaṇa traya rahita tām upapādayan tatra āśraya asiddhi hetu asiddhi rāhityam upapādayati na tāvat āśraya dvāreṇa iti
dharmiṇām āśrayāṇām pakṣa tayā nirdiṣṭānām

original: te hi saṅkalpapathamārūḍhā duḥkhādyāryacatuṣṭayākārāḥ pratyātmaṃ cetastale prakāśanta eveti nāśrayāsiddhiḥ |
analyzed: te hi saṅkalpa patham ārūḍhāḥ duḥkha ādi ārya catuṣṭaya ākārāḥ pratyātmam cetaḥ tale prakāśante eva iti na āśraya asiddhiḥ
cetaḥ guṇa mātrasya iti
mātra śabdaḥ kṛṣna arthaḥ

original: cittasyālambanākāratayā ālambanamātraṃ cittākāra eveti te cetoguṇāḥ pratyātmaṃ prakāśanta eveti na hetvasiddhiḥ |
analyzed: cittasya ālambana ākāra tayā ālambana mātram citta ākāraḥ eva iti te cetaḥ guṇāḥ pratyātmam prakāśante eva iti na hetu asiddhiḥ

original: dharmiṇi ca sādara nirantaradīrghakālābhyāsaviśiṣṭacetoguṇatāyāḥ saṃbhavena pakṣadharmatā na nopapadyate |
analyzed: dharmiṇi ca sādara nirantara dīrgha kāla abhyāsa viśiṣṭa cetaḥ guṇa tāyāḥ saṃbhavena pakṣa dharma tā na na upapadyate
na ca eṣa viruddhaḥ iti
kāminī ākāre kāmini citte yogyam yuvatī ākāraḥ tasmin

original: kāminyā yuvatyā ākāre kāminā'nudhyāyamāne iti vā |
analyzed: kāminyāḥ yuvatyāḥ ākāre kāminā anudhyāyamāne iti vā
virodhaḥ hi sādhya abhāvena ced vyāptaḥ hetuḥ
na ca iha tathā

original: sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsaviśiṣṭā ye ye cetoguṇā yuvatyākārādayaste sarve'pi sphūṭāvabhāsayogyā eva na tu sarva te sphuṭāvabhāsāyogyāḥ
analyzed: sādara nirantara dīrgha kāla abhyāsa viśiṣṭāḥ ye ye cetaḥ guṇāḥ yuvatī ākāra ādayaḥ te sarve api sphūṭa avabhāsa yogyāḥ eva na tu te sphuṭa avabhāsa ayogyāḥ

original: nanu sādaranirantaradīrdhakālābhyāsaviśiṣṭeṣu katipayacetoguṇeṣu sphuṭāvabhāsayoghyatvadarśane'pi sarveṣāṃ tathātve ko niyamaḥ,
analyzed: nanu sādara nirantara dīrdha kāla abhyāsa viśiṣṭeṣu katipaya cetaḥ guṇeṣu sphuṭa avabhāsa yoghya tva darśane api sarveṣām tathātve kaḥ niyamaḥ
tasmāt anaikāntikaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti śaṅkāḥ vārayan āha na ca anaikāntikaḥ iti
na vayam sahacāra darśana mātreṇa vyāptim brūmaḥ
kintu kāya kāraṇa bhāvāt pratibandhāt iti āha abhyāsa ityādinā
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vā katham etayoḥ siddhi ati iti atra āha pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ iti
pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām iti arthaḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tu anvaya vyatireka sacārābhyām siddhi ati
tatra anvaya sahacāraḥ pratyakṣa gamyaḥ
vyatireka sahacāraḥ anupalambha gamyaḥ

original: itthaṃ ca sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ siddhyantīti kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇāt pratibandhādhvayāptisiddhiriti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: ittham ca sarva upasaṃhāreṇa pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ siddhi antī iti kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇāt pratibandha adhva yāpti siddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
prakṛte pratyak sa anupalambhau upapādayati tathā hi iti
kāmi antarvarttini kāmi citta antarvattini
trividha pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhyaḥ iti
pratyakṣam anupalaṃbhaḥ ca iti anayoḥ samāhāraḥ pratyakṣa anupalambham
anupalabdhiḥ sphuṭa ābha tvasya iti iyam ekā anupalabdhiḥ
pascāt abhyasa saṃvedanam sphuṭa basa saṃvedanam ca iti pratyakṣa dvayam
taiḥ etaiḥ tribhiḥ prakāra ryuktaḥ pratyakṣa anupalambha samudāyaḥ
tad sādhyaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: idamatrāvedyate--yathā paścādabhyāsasaṃvedanaṃ sphuṭābhasaṃvedanaṃ ceti pratyakṣadvayam tathā pūrvamabhyāsaviśiṣṭacetoguṇānupalambhaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsānupalambhaścetyanupalambhadvayaṃ kiṃ na syāt,
analyzed: idam atra āvedyate yathā paścāt abhyāsa saṃvedanam sphuṭa ābha saṃvedanam ca iti pratyakṣa dvayam tathā pūrvam abhyāsa viśiṣṭa cetaḥ guṇa anupalambhaḥ sphuṭa avabhāsa anupalambhaḥ ca iti anupalambha dvayam kim na syāt

original: vastutastu svetarayāvatkāraṇfsamavadhāne satyapi yasminna sati kāryānupalambha ityeko'nupalambhaḥ,
analyzed: vastutas tu sva itara yāvat kāraṇ samavadhāne sati api yasmin na sati kārya anupalambhaḥ iti ekaḥ anupalambhaḥ

original: sati tu yasmin kāryopalambha iti pratyakṣamekam,
analyzed: sati tu yasmin kārya upalambhaḥ iti pratyakṣam ekam

original: itthaṃ ca pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇamiti tu yuktam |
analyzed: ittham ca pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇam iti tu yuktam

original: evaṃ sthite kāraṇopalambhaṃ kāryopalambhaṃ ca pṛthak gaṇayitvā pratyakṣadvayaṃ cet saṃpādyeta kāraṇānupalambhaṃ kāryānupalambhaṃ ca pṛthaggaṇayitvā'nupalambhadvayāśrayaṇena cāturvidhyaṃ kiṃ na syāt |
analyzed: evam sthite kāraṇa upalambham kārya upalambham ca pṛthak gaṇayitvā pratyakṣa dvayam ced saṃpādyeta kāraṇa anupalambham kārya anupalambham ca pṛthak gaṇayitvā anupalambha dvaya āśrayaṇena cāturvidhyam kim na syāt

original: anayaivāśaṅkayā pūrvaṃ 'kāryahetordhūmādervahnyādinā mahānasādau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi trividhapratyakṣānupalambhena pañcavidhapratyakṣānupalambhato ve' tyetadvākyaṃ prakārāntareṇonnītam |
analyzed: anayā eva āśaṅkayā pūrvam kārya hetoḥ dhūma ādeḥ vahni ādinā mahānasa ādau dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi trividha pratyakṣa anupalambhena pañcavidha pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ vā iti etat vākyam prakāra antareṇa unnītam

original: nibandhakārasya tu hārdamiha paśyatāṃ naḥ pūrvavyākhyānaṃ nibandhakarturhārdaṃ nānusaratīti |
analyzed: nibandha kārasya tu hārdam iha paśyatām naḥ pūrva vyākhyānam nibandha kartuḥ hārdam na anusarati iti
śaṅkate nanu iti

original: caturāryasākṣātkāritvasiddhāvapi na sarvasākṣātkaritvaṃ saṃbhavati atha kathaṃ sarvajñatāsiddhiriti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ yadyapi catuṣvāryasatyeṣvanangargato naiko'pi bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: catur ārya sākṣātkāri tva siddhau api na sarva sākṣātkari tvam saṃbhavati atha katham sarvajña tā siddhiḥ iti śaṅkituḥ āśayaḥ yadi api catuṣu ārya satyeṣu anangargataḥ na ekaḥ api bhāvaḥ
atha api sarvajña tām vyaktam prasādhayan śaṅkate aśeṣeṇa iti
sākalyena iti arthaḥ
sarva dharma iti
dharma śabdaḥ bhāva mātra vacanaḥ

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvāpannaṃ yadbījāṅkurādi yacca citta caittaṃ sa dharma iti paribhāṣyate |
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāva āpannam yat bīja aṅkura ādi yat ca citta caittam sa dharmaḥ iti paribhāṣyate
yat pramāṇa saṃvādi iti
sākṣātkāri jñānam iti
sākṣātkāri yat jñānam iti arthaḥ
sākṣāt
sākṣātkāra pūrvaka tvam sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā iti arthaḥ
agneḥ dāhaka tvam svayam sākṣātkṛtya procyamāne sākṣāt

original: tathāvidhajñānapūrvakatvaṃ svayamananubhūya sākṣātkarturvacane prāmāṇyamanu prayujyamāne paramparayā,
analyzed: tathāvidha jñāna pūrvaka tvam svayam an anubhūya sākṣātkartuḥ vacane prāmāṇyam anu prayujyamāne paramparayā

original: tathā sugatānuyāyināṃ 'kṣāṇikaḥ sarva eva saṃskārā' ityasmin vacane ca |
analyzed: tathā sugata anuyāyinām kṣāṇikaḥ sarve eva saṃskārāḥ iti asmin vacane ca
kārya hetuḥ iti
ukta vacanasya ukta sākṣātkāra kārya tvāt
hetoḥ isiddhi ādi dūṣaṇa tra rāhityam upapādayati na asya asiddhiḥ ityādinā
sarva dharma kṣaṇa bhaṅga prasādhanāt asya vacanasya iti

original: kṣāṇabhaṅgo hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ tadarthāvabodhakatayā cāsya vākyasya pramāṇasaṃvādiniścitārthāvabodhatvarūpahetornāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: kṣāṇa bhaṅgaḥ hi sarva dharmāṇām svabhāvaḥ tad artha avabodhaka tayā ca asya vākyasya pramāṇa saṃvādi niścita artha avabodha tva rūpa hetoḥ na asiddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: pramāṇaniścitārthakatvasya hetuviśeṣaṇasya prayojanaṃ prakāśayannanaikāntikatāṃ vārayati--vacanamātrasya saṃśayapiparyāsapūrvakatve'pīti |
analyzed: pramāṇa niścita arthaka tvasya hetu viśeṣaṇasya prayojanam prakāśayan anaikāntika tām vārayati vacana mātrasya saṃśaya piparyāsa pūrvaka tve pi iti
pramāṇa niścita arthasya iti
pramāṇena niścita ūrthaḥ yasya tasya vākyasya iti arthaḥ
nanu anayoḥ vyāpau kim pramāṇam
tatra āha pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām iti
pramāṇa saṃvādi vacanam hi sva artha sākṣātkāra kāryam
kāraṇe sati kārya upalambhaḥ

original: asati kāraṇe kāryānupalambha iti pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇavyorvyāptirnirābādhā gṛhyata eveti bhāvaḥ,
analyzed: asati kāraṇe kārya anupalambhaḥ iti pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām kārya kāraṇa vyoḥ vyāptiḥ nirābādhā gṛhyate eva iti bhāvaḥ
tatra api ced āśaṅkā
kārya hetu mātra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ iti āha anyathā iti
atrā ayam sarvajña samarthana saṅgrahaḥ
prakāśita pūrvaḥ ca asmābhiḥ anyatra

original: pramāṇānāṃ nivṛttyā tu prameyaṃ na nivartate |
analyzed: pramāṇānām nivṛttyā tu prameyam na nivartate
avyāpaka nivṛttyā syāt na avyāpyasya nivartanam

original: sā pramāṇanivṛttiśca kvacid dṛṣṭā na sādhanam |
analyzed: sā pramāṇa nivṛttiḥ ca kvacid dṛṣṭā na sādhanam
sarva pramātṛ sandohe tad dṛṣṭiḥ tu mudurgrahā
sarvajñe bādhakam nā api pramāṇam upalabhyate

original: ye nāma bodhisattvāḥ syuḥ prakṛtyaiva kṛpāmayāḥ |
analyzed: ye nāma bodhisattvāḥ syuḥ prakṛtyā eva kṛpā mayāḥ
aśeṣa dharma nairātmya bhāvanā abhyāsa pāṭavāt
vyapeta sarva āvaraṇāḥ rāga ādi mala varjitāḥ
prajñā prakarṣa yogena sārvajñyam samupāgatāḥ
kṛpā prakaṣa yogena sarva sattva uddidḥirṣayā
āsaṃsāram vartamānāḥ su accha spaṭika nirmalāḥ
doṣa vātaiḥ aprakampyāḥ te buddhāḥ jagataḥ hitāḥ iti
bhava praramparā siddhaye tu kim pramāṇam iti

original: kiṃ śabdaḥ pratikṣepe--pramāṇa nāstītyarthaḥ lokāyata tānuyāyinaḥ seyamāśaṅkā |
analyzed: kim śabdaḥ na asti iti arthaḥ sā iyam āśaṅkā
anyeḥ tad a pratikṣepāt

original: ayamabhiprāyaḥ--astu nāma ye sthiramātmānamabhyupacchanti teṣāṃ kathamapi punarbhavapratyāśā |
analyzed: ayam abhiprāyaḥ astu nāma ye sthiram ātmānam abhyupacchanti teṣām katham api punarbhava pratyāśā

original: sarvasya kṣaṇikatāṃ vadataḥ kathaṃ punarbhavakathā ghaṭeteti |
analyzed: sarvasya kṣaṇika tām vadataḥ katham punarbhava kathā ghaṭeta iti
pratividhatte ucyate ityādinā

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgavādibhirasmābhirapyahaṃpratyayāspadabhūtā vijñānadhārā pratisattvaṃ bhinnā'nuvartata eva bhave bhava ityabhyupagataṃ nāma,
analyzed: kṣaṇabhaṅga vādibhiḥ asmābhiḥ api ahaṃpratyaya āspada bhūtā vijñāna dhārā pratisattvam bhinnā anuvartate eva bhave bhave iti abhyupagatam nāma
pūrva pūrva cittasya eva svabhāvaḥ uttarottaram cittam janayati iti
tasmāt maraṇa kāla bhāvi cittasya api citta antara utpādaka tvam asti eva

original: atrāyaṃ prayoto bhavatītyāśayenāha--yaccittaṃ taccittāntaraṃ pratisandhatte iti |
analyzed: atra ayam prayotaḥ bhavati iti āśayena āha yat cittam tat citta antaram pratisandhatte iti
utpādayati iti etat
ayam ca utpādya utpādaka bhāvaḥ eka santāna anvayinoḥ eva pūrva apara cittayoḥ
maraṇa kāla bhāvi cittam pakṣaḥ
citta antara utpādaka tvam sādhyam citta tvaḥ hetuḥ
idānīntana cittam dṛṣṭāntaḥ
na ca arhat caramacittena vyabhicāraḥ iti

original: arhatāmapagatarāgādīnāṃ caramaṃ cittaṃ cittāntaraṃ notpādayatīti saugaterapīṣyata iti tasmiṃścitte vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: arhatām apagata rāga ādīnām caramam cittam citta antaram na utpādayati iti saugateḥ api iṣyate iti tasmin citte vyabhicāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
imām anaikāntika āśaṅkām pariharati tasya āgama mātra pratīta tvāt iti
ayam āśayaḥ parakīya āgama eka siddhena arhat caramacittena aṃna aikāntika āśaṅkā para āgamasya aprāmāṇyam vadatā nā udbhāvyā
paramata abhupagamena ced abhyupagamyatām tathā eva punar bhavaḥ pi iti
niṣkleśa citta antara jananāt vā iti

original: ayamāśayaḥ--na saugatānāṃ sarveṣāmabhimatametat arhato bhavati caramaṃ cittaṃ,
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ na saugatānām sarveṣām abhimatam etat arhataḥ bhavati caramam cittam
yat cintā antaram na utpādayata iti
kecid kathayanti nāma evam

original: vastutasteṣāmapi vītarāgāṇāṃ vyapetasakalāvidyāmūlāṇāṃ kleśādimalairanāliptā vimalā cittasantatiranuvartata eveti nānaikāntikapralaṅga iti |
analyzed: vastutas teṣām api vīta rāgāṇām vyapeta sakala avidyā mūlāṇām kleśa ādi malaiḥ an āliptā vimalā citta santatiḥ anuvartate eva iti na anaikāntika pralaṅgaḥ iti
uktam ca śāntarakṣitena
kṣīṇa āsravasya vijñānam asandhānam kutas bhavet
parakīya kṛtāntāt ced na
prāmāṇya a parigrahat
ye ca iha sudhiyaḥ kecid apratiṣṭhita nirvṛtīn
yānayoḥ ca pracakṣate
tān pratyayam asiddhaḥ ca sādhya dharma samanvitaḥ
dṛṣṭāntaḥ prativādi iṣṭa siddhānta āśrayaṇe pi te
iti tattvasam

original: kamalaśīlena cetthaṃ vyākhyātam--'kutaḥ prasiddhamarhatāṃ na cittāntaraṃ pratisandhatte maraṇacittamiti,
analyzed: kamalaśīlena ca ittham vyākhyātam kutas prasiddham arhatām na citta antaram pratisandhatte maraṇa cittam iti

original: athā'pi syāt parakīye bauddhasiddhānte paṭhyate kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmāt bhavaṃ prajānāmīti,
analyzed: atha api syāt parakīye bauddha siddhānte paṭhyate kṣīṇā me jātiḥ uṣitam brahmacaryam kṛtam karaṇīyam na aparam asmāt bhavam prajānāmi iti
atas siddham asādhanam iti
tat etat ayuktam parakīyasya siddhāntasya prāmāṇyena aparigrahāt
katham tathā prāmāṇyena parigṛhītāt niścayaḥ
para lokasya api niścaya prasaṅgāt

original: x x x x parasiddhāntāśrayaṇenāpi kāṃścid bauddhān prati sādhyadharmasamanvito na siddho dṛṣṭānta iti darśayannāha--yeceha sudhiya itī'ti (tattvasaṃ. pañci. 538-539)

tat evam sarvasmin viśīryamāṇe kā uparādhyatu
bhāvānām śūnyatā eva svabhāvaḥ iti taulyāt na ekasya apekṣā apāvasaraḥ

original: nanu ayaṃ baddho'yaṃ mukta iti vyavasthā'pi vyāhanyeta |
analyzed: nanu ayam baddhaḥ iyam muktaḥ iti vyavasthā api vyāhanyeta
satyam

original: iyaṃ vyavasthā'pi saṃvṛttyaiva na paramārthata iti |
analyzed: iyam vyavasthā api saṃvṛttyā eva na paramārthataḥ iti
niḥsvabhāva tā eva ca śūnyatā
uktam ca etat anyatra api
niḥsvabhāvāḥ amī bhāvāḥ tattvataḥ sva para uditāḥ
eka aneka svabhāvena viyogāt pratibimba vat
iti tarhi kim tattvam
na sat na asat na sat asat na ca api anubhaya ātmakam
catuṣkoṭi vinirmuktam tattvam mādhyamikāḥ jaguḥ

original: svabhāvarāhityādbhāvānāmapāramārthye prayogaṃ pradarśayati--prayogaḥ punarevamiti ekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavatīti |
analyzed: svabhāva rāhityāt bhāvānām apāramārthye prayogam pradarśayati prayogaḥ punar evam iti eka aneka svabhāvam na bhavati iti
eka svabhāvam aneka svabhāvam vā yat na bhavati iti arthaḥ
vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ iti
paramārtha sattvasya vyāpakam eka svabhāva aneka svabhāva anyatara tvam
tasya anupalabdhiḥ
vyāpaka anupalbdhyā vyāpyasya paramārtha sattvasya nivṛttiḥ siddhi ati

original: hetoḥ pakṣe sattvamupapādayannasiddhiśaṅkāṃ vārayati--na tāvada siddho hetuṃriti |
analyzed: hetoḥ pakṣe sattvam upapādayan asiddhi śaṅkām vārayati na tāvat a siddhaḥ hetuḥ iti

original: sākāre vijñāne bahirartha eva ekānekasvabhāvāyogyatvasya parispuṭatvāditi |
analyzed: sa ākāre vijñāne bahis arthe eva eka aneka svabhāva ayogya tvasya parispuṭa tvāt iti

original: nīlapītādāvaṇusamudāye bāhyārthatayā iṣyamāṇe aṇurayamekasvabhāvo vā naikasvabhāvo vā ubhayathā'pi nopapadyata iti yo doṣa udbhāvitaḥ,
analyzed: nīla pīta ādau aṇu samudāye bāhya artha tayā iṣyamāṇe aṇuḥ ayam eka svabhāvaḥ vā na eka svabhāvaḥ vā ubhayathā api na upapadyate iti yaḥ doṣaḥ udbhāvitaḥ
sa vijñāna vādinaḥ vijñānam eva

original: nīlapītadyākāraṃ sadvabhāsate iti vadato'pi samāna eveti sphuṭameveti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: nīla pīta di ākāram sat avabhāsate iti vadataḥ api samānaḥ eva iti sphuṭam eva iti bhāvaḥ
sphuṭa tām eva upapādayati yatra hi ityādinā

original: idaṃ nīlamidaṃ pītamiti idantayā loke vyavahriyamāṇo nīlapītādiraṇusamudāyo bāhyo'rtha iti sarvāstitvavādinā iṣyate,
analyzed: idam nīlam idam pītam iti idantayā loke vyavahriyamāṇaḥ nīla pīta ādiḥ aṇu samudāyaḥ bāhyaḥ ṛthaḥ iti sarva astitva vādinā iṣyate

original: vijñānavādinā tu vijñānameva ttattadākāraṃ bahirvadavabhāsata iti vadatā vijñānākāratayā nīlapītādyabhyugataṃ bhavatīti nīlapitādi tu na sarvathā'pohyate,
analyzed: vijñāna vādinā tu vijñānam eva ttat tad ākāram bahis vat avabhāsate iti vadatā vijñāna ākāra tayā nīla pīta ādi abhyugatam bhavati iti nīla pita ādi tu na sarvathā apohyate

original: tathāca bāhyatve ya ākṣepaḥ sa āntaratve'pi samāna eveti bhāvaḥ |
analyzed: tathāca bāhya tve yaḥ ākṣepaḥ saḥ āntara tve pi samānaḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ
nahi tad bahirbhāva nibandhanam dūṣaṇam iti
nīla pīta ādeḥ vijñānāt bahirbhāve na tat dūṣaṇatayā upanyastam
kintu nīla pīta ādi abhyugama mātre

original: tathāca bāhyaṃ vā bhavatu āntaraṃ vā,
analyzed: tathā ca bāhyam vā bhavatu āntaram vā
samānaḥ eva ayam doṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu bāhyaṃ nīlapītādyabhyupagacchatā mūrtaṃ taditi svīkṛtaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: nanu bāhyam nīla pīta ādi abhyupagacchatā mūrtam tat iti svīkṛtam bhavati

original: vijñānamātraṃ taditi vadatāṃ tu tadamūrtaṃ bhavatīti neyaṃ śaṅkā'mūte prasaredityāśaṅkā paraharannāha--mūrtanimittamityādinā |
analyzed: vijñāna mātram tat iti vadatām tu tat amūrtam bhavati iti na iyam śaṅkā mūte prasaret iti āśaṅkā
sa ākāra tāyām jñānasya api mūrta tvāt iti

original: sākāratve mūrtatā katha mityatrāha--ayameva hi cittānāmākāro mūrtiriti |
analyzed: sa ākāra tve mūrtatā katham iti atra āha ayam eva hi cittānām ākāraḥ mūrtiḥ iti
iṣyamāṇaḥ ayam ākāraḥ eva bhavati cittasya mūrttiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nirākārajñānamātrapāramārthyavāde tu prakārāntareṇa bhāvamātrasādhāraṇo doṣo vistaraśo nirūpito'nyatra--
analyzed: nirākāra jñāna mātra pāramārthya vāde tu prakāra antareṇa bhāva mātra sādhāraṇaḥ doṣaḥ vistaraśaḥ nirūpitaḥ anyatra

original: 'na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ |
analyzed: na svatas nā api paratas na dvābhyām nā api ahetutaḥ

original: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana |
analyzed: utpannāḥ jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana
ityādinā
diṅnāga ādi nibandha anavahita dṛṣṭyā muhur vibhāvayatā
parimita matinā api mayā vyākhyeyam vyaraci tarkabhāṣāyāḥ
nindantu vā abhinandantu kṛtim enām vipaścitaḥ
a doṣa darśī kaḥ nu syāt kṛtiḥ vā doṣa varjitā
gurjareṣu vasan yoṣā ādṛta aneka bhūmikaḥ
nānā ākṛtikam ātmānam parebhyaḥ naṭa vat vyadhāt
padmanābha pada ambhoja saurabha ullāsa vāsite
viṣaye api vasan eṣa tāthāgata kṛtim vyadhāt
aneka tantra kāntāre viśataḥ bahuśas mama
viṣṇuḥ avyāhataḥ panthāḥ hṛdayām āpasarpatāt
iti tarkabhāṣā vyākhyā samāptā
